The Atlanta Hawks ( 46 - 12 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 41 ) 95 - 88 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . Taking their second loss in a row , the Magic were finally eliminated from playoff contention in the East . The Hawks , on the other hand , continued to build their lead as the top overall projected playoff seed . Despite losing five of their last ten games , they 're still seven and a half games ahead of the second place Cleveland Cavaliers . Both teams struggled shooting the ball , as the Hawks went 44 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic finished at just 45 percent from the floor and a meager 35 percent from deep . The Hawks also forced the Magic into 17 turnovers , while committing just 18 of their own . The Hawks were led by the duo of Nikola Vucevic and Victor Oladipo . Vucevic shot 10 - for - 16 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also recording 15 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 47 points and 41 rebounds over his last two games . Tobias Harris had a solid showing as well , finishing with 15 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and four rebounds . Considering he 's only averaging 10 points per game so far this season , it was a nice surprise for the Hawks in this one . Jeff Teague shot only 6 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also handing out seven assists . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Magic will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host New York Knicks , 95 - 82 , at Madison Square Garden on Wednesday . These are two teams who will battle to sneak into the playoffs , but the Bucks looked like the far superior team in this game . They nearly pulled out a wire - to - wire win , as the Knicks never led by more than one and failed to tie or recapture the lead after the first quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with the Bucks recording 23 assists to 18 turnovers , while the Knicks committed 16 turnovers to just 23 assists . Giannis Antetokounmpo and Tim Hardaway Jr. led the team in scoring , as they dropped 17 points a piece off the bench . Giannis Antetokounmpo was the player of the game , as he tallied 16 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Giannis Antetokounmpo was just as good , accumulating 16 points , 12 rebounds and two steals of his own . Zaza Pachulia got his first start of the season and contributed 16 points and 14 rebounds . Brandon Knight led the Bucks in scoring , as he dropped 17 points on 6 - of - 13 shooting . Cole Aldrich recorded a double - double in the loss , accumulating 16 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Zaza Pachulia was the only other Bucks player to score 12 points , accruing 12 points , seven rebounds and three blocks . Milwaukee will host the Boston Celtics on Saturday for their next game .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 102 - 91 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Saturday . This game meant much more to Memphis than the Suns and that proved to be the case in the final scoreline . Despite the Grizzlies leading for the final 25 minutes , this game was close throughout , with the Suns never leading by more than 2 points . Defense was key for Memphis , as they held Phoenix to 46 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range . Memphis also dominated down low , winning the rebounding battle , 37 - 35 and the points in the paint differential , 48 - 26 . The Suns ( 3 - 2 ) continue to fly under the radar and they may have pulled out their biggest win of the season against the Suns here . Mike Lee continued his fantastic season , as he led the team with 22 points , three rebounds and three assists . Marc Gasol was second on the team , totaling 18 points , five rebounds , six assists and four steals . Zach Randolph was a nice spark off the bench , providing 10 points and six rebounds . Memphis will return to action on Saturday , when they host the Memphis Grizzlies for their next game . Phoenix ( 3 - 2 ) has really struggled on defense this season and this blowout loss only adds to those troubles . Markieff Morris continued his good play though , as he tallied 20 points , five rebounds and two steals . Markieff Morris was second on the team , finishing with 20 points and five rebounds . Goran Dragic was n't far behind , totaling 23 points and four assists . The Suns ( 3 - 2 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and they nearly pulled out another upset here . It was a team effort for Phoenix , as they had six players score in double - figures . Courtney Lee led the team in scoring , dropping 22 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting . Zach Randolph and Zach Randolph were the only other reserves in double figures , as they scored 10 a piece . Phoenix will look to bounce back on Sunday in a road matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder .
The Toronto Raptors ( 29 - 15 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 17 - 28 ) 114 - 110 on Monday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 26 - 25 right away in the first quarter . The Raptors shot 53 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons finished at 46 percent from the floor and 35 percent from deep . What really made the difference though was turnovers . The Raptors forced the Pistons into 26 turnovers , while committing just eight of their own . The Raptors were led by D.J . Augustin in this one , going 12 - for - 20 from the field and 5 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 35 points , while also adding eight assists and four blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 57 points and 17 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 14 points and 17 rebounds on the year . Kyle Lowry was able to record a double - double of his own . He finished with 11 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , eight assists and three steals in 37 minutes . He had had a poor showing in Friday 's game against the Heat , shooting just 26 percent ( 1 - 11 FG ) , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Coming off the bench , Lou Williams had arguably his best game of the season . He went 5 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding three assists . He 's now averaging 14 points and 7 rebounds on the year . The only other Raptor to reach double - digit points was Louis Williams , who also came off the bench . In 22 minutes , he finished with 12 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , two rebounds and four steals . The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Pistons will travel to New York to play the Knicks on Saturday .

The Pistons were the superior shooters in this game , going 42 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went 49 percent from the floor and just 58 percent from beyond the arc . It was a new season - high in points for him , while also marking his first double - double since his first game of the season back in November . It was a nice surprise for the Bucks , as he 's averaging only 10 points per game so far this season . He was able to get to the free throw line a wopping 6 times , and converted on 1 - of - 2 free throws . Tobias Harris also had a strong showing , posting 15 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , four rebounds and four blocked shots . He 's had a nice stretch of three games , averaging 27 points and 5 rebounds over that span . Giannis Antetokounmpo has been a model of consistency for the Bucks all season long and Tuesday night was his most impressive performance of the season , as he posted 34 points , 12 rebounds , five assists and five steals . The 34 points was a season - high , while the 12 rebounds was his second highest total of the season . Tuesday also marked the second time this year Antetokounmpo recorded 20 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and five steals as he continues to stuff the stat sheet as well as any player in the NBA . However , it was the play of Michael Beasley that may have been just as , if not more , important for Milwaukee 's upset victory . Beasley 's 17 points Tuesday night were his second highest total of the season and the seventh time he has reach double - digit scoring . In those seven games , the Bucks are 6 - 1 , as Beasley 's contributions off the bench have had a positive effect on Milwaukee 's offensive attack . Milwaukee will look to build on their eighth - straight playoff game when they take on the Nets in the second half of a back - to - back on Monday . The Bucks , meanwhile , will hope to bounce back from the loss as they face off against the Suns on Wednesday . For the Cavs , the loss was the team 's second straight loss . The Cavs shot just 43 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line . The Cavs had all five starters score in double figures and three players reaching double - digits in points . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the team with 34 points and 12 rebounds , while Kevin Love had 13 points and 13 rebounds . Malcolm Brogdon had 10 points on 4 - of - 5 shooting , while Malcolm Brogdon , Malcolm Brogdon and Malcolm Brogdon each finished with 10 points off the bench .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 4 - 0 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 0 - 4 ) 101 - 93 on Monday at the Quicken Loans Arena in Boston . The Celtics had a strong first half where they out - scored the Celtics 29 - 19 . With the strong start , they were able to use that momentum and coast through the rest of the game to finish with an 16 - point victory . The Cavaliers out - rebounded the Celtices 53 - 45 , giving them a huge advantage in that category . That advantage may have given them just enough to steal the win on the road . The Cavaliers were led by LeBron James , who nearly recorded his triple - double , with 27 points ( 10 - 24 FG , 1 - 7 3Pt , 6 - 10 FT ) , 10 rebounds and eight assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 42 points , 17 rebounds and 4 steals over his last two games . Jared Sullinger was the only other Celtic to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 15 points ( 3 - 4 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) and two steals . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , while the Celtics will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Wednesday . The Celtics ' Celtics will be at home against the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday , as the Celtics will attempt to keep their playoff hopes alive .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 8 - 13 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 11 - 12 ) 114 - 101 on Thursday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Oklahoma City . The Thunder was the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 19 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 41 percent from the floor and 19 percent from beyond the arc . The Thunder also forced the Bucks into 14 turnovers , while committing just 20 of their own . The Thunder were led by Kevin Durant , who nearly recorded a triple - double with 23 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , nine rebounds and seven assists . The 23 points were a season - high for Durant , while it was also his third double - double in his last four games . He 's now pushed his season averages to 14 points and 2 rebounds per game on the year . Also off the bench , Jerryd Bayless added 11 points ( 3 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) and six assists . Despite the loss , the Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Bucks will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the New York Knicks in quadruple overtime , 142 - 139 , at Phillips Arena on Sunday . A game that started off with very little defense being played over the first two quarters ended up becoming much tighter over the third and fourth periods . After the Knicks ( 21 - 28 ) held a 65 - 61 lead going into halftime , the two teams combined for just 84 points in the second half . With five overtimes , there were plenty of opportunities for heroics , and Carmelo Anthony and Courtney Lee capitalized on three of them . Anthony 's driving layup with two seconds left in regulation and 18 - footer with six ticks in the first overtime helped Atlanta stay alive , while Lee 's 30 - foot three - point jumper with one second on the clock in the second overtime sent matters into a third extra period . Dennis Schroder then turned the tables , draining a driving layup with three seconds remaining in the third overtime . Finally , it was Paul Millsap who put an end to the Hawks ' first three - overtime tilt since 1951 , pouring in a shot with 27 seconds remaining that gave Atlanta ( 28 - 20 ) a 141 - 139 lead they would n't relinquish . In all , four Knicks players , including Anthony , fouled out , while Millsap played a whopping 60 minutes . Anthony led the way for Atlanta with a season - high 45 points , along with six rebounds , four assists and one block over 46 minutes , taking a whopping 36 shots in the process . Brandon Jennings , starting for Derrick Rose ( ankle ) , totaled 18 points , 11 assists , three rebounds and one steal . Lee had a near double - double with 17 points , nine rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Kristaps Porzingis managed 15 points , five boards , one assist and three blocks . Justin Holiday stepped up with a bench - leading 15 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds , two assists and one steal . Mindaugas Kuzminskas posted 13 points , four rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block in a reserve role as well . Kyle O'Quinn hauled in 12 boards off the bench , and Joakim Noah had a modest six points but added 14 rebounds , five assists , three steals and two blocks . Millsap paced Atlanta with a 37 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists , one steal and one block . Kent Bazemore managed 24 points and nine rebounds . Schroder posted a 23 - point , 15 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds , while Dwight Howard posted a 19 - point , 13 - rebound effort of his own . Tim Hardaway , Jr. matched Howard 's point total while dishing out eight assists , hauling in five rebounds and recording a steal . Mike Dunleavy led the reserves with 12 points . The Hawks travel to Minnesota for a Monday evening date with the Timberwolves , while the Knicks head west to Portland for a Saturday night showdown with the Timberwolves .
The visiting Golden State Warriors took down the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday , 133 - 120 . The Warriors ( 43 - 7 ) saw stellar top - down play even despite the absence of All-Star Draymond Green . The reigning conference Player of the Month duo , Steph Curry and Kevin Durant , recorded a pair of double - doubles . Curry led the team with 29 points and dished out 11 assists , while Durant scored 26 to go with 10 assists and eight rebounds . It was a typically dominant game for the loaded superteam , as the Warriors shot over 52 percent from the field and poured in 14 three - pointers . Seven players scored in double - digits and the team dished out a whopping 38 assists . Golden State was able to quickly get ahead of the Clippers with a 33 - 22 advantage in the first quarter . The Clippers ( 31 - 19 ) remain without injured superstar Chris Paul , and could have used him in Thursday 's double - digit loss . Star forward Blake Griffin took the reigns on offense in Paul 's stead , scoring a game - high 31 points . Off the bench , sixth man Jamal Crawford scored 21 and hit five three - pointers . However , not even 50 percent shooting as a team and ten three - pointers was enough for LA to best the stacked Warriors ' squad . 15 team turnovers did little to help the Clippers ' case . The Warriors will travel to Sacramento on Saturday , while the Clippers will play in Boston on Sunday .

Bryant on the other hand had 14 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and two rebounds . Off the bench , Louis Williams chipped in with 15 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) and five assists off the bench . Milwaukee has been one of the darlings of the NBA so far this season . They 're playing better than any expert expected , and that 's why Friday 's drubbing at the hands of the Raptors was more of a surprise than it would have been in the past . The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Washington Wizards , 117 - 80 , at Verizon Center on Wednesday . The Nets ( 37 - 42 ) came into Wednesday 's contest looking to keep their faint playoff hopes alive and to complete a season sweep of the Wizards ( 45 - 34 ) . Given that they 'd blasted Washington by 50 points in their most recent meeting , it appeared the chances for another win were high . The hosts had other plans , though , as they jumped out to a 54 - 48 halftime lead . Their stellar 51 percent shooting helped them stave off a second - half comeback from the Wizards ( 45 - 34 ) , which outscored them by a 58 - 46 margin over the third and fourth quarters . The visitors were led by Bradley Beal 's 24 points , which he supplemented with five assists , three rebounds , a steal and a block . Bradley Beal followed with 24 points , three rebounds , an assist and a steal . Deron Williams totaled nine points , nine assists , seven rebounds and one steal . Jarrett Jack led the second unit with 14 points , five rebounds and three assists . Bojan Bogdanovic 's 22 points led the bench , and Bojan Bogdanovic followed with 14 points , while Jarrett Jack led the second unit with 14 points .
The Washington Wizards ( 36 - 37 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 15 - 58 ) 101 - 88 on Sunday at the Verizon Center in Washington . Despite being down 76 - 64 coming out of the first quarter , the Wizards had a monster second quarter , out - scoring the Lakers 27 - 29 , which set them up to secure a 9 - point victory on the road . The Wizards were the superior shooters in this game , going 54 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers finished at 38 percent from the floor and just 25 percent from deep . Along with the strong start , the Wizards also out - rebounded the Lakers 42 - 42 . John Wall led the charge for the Wizards , finishing with 22 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and two assists . He 's now averaging 14 points and 7 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , both Nene Hilario posted 10 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and three rebounds in 30 minutes . The Wizards ' next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday . The Lakers ' Lakers ' woes have been the second - best team all season long and they were able to win by a much - needed victory .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 53 - 29 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 46 - 36 ) 113 - 108 on Friday . The Cavs haven now clinched the Central Division title , but remain in a dogfight for the top seed in the Eastern Conference with the Toronto Raptors . With only a 1 - 4 lead coming in to the night , Cleveland finds itself in a must - win scenario for the time being every time they take the court . Fortunately , they were back at full health Wednesday , with Kevin Love back after a one - game absence due to an illness . The power forward was outstanding in his return , taking advantage of the Cavaliers ' nototriously vulnerable frontcourt to post a 19 - point , 3 - rebound double - double that also included three blocks , a steal and a block . Love was next with a near double - double of his own , tallying 19 points , nine dimes and three boards . Ramon Sessions was second on the team in scoring with 14 points , his second - highest total of the season , and added a pair of assists and a pair of steals . Kevin Seraphin also managed to pitch in with eight points and six boards , while Kyrie Irving , drawing the start in Wall 's stead , added nine points , two rebounds , three assists and a steal . The Cavaliers improved to 53 - 29 and remain atop the Eastern Conference 's Central Division . They head back to home to face off against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday . Love supplemented his team - high scoring total with a game - high 19 points , and added three rebounds and a block . The big man was also a force on the boards , grabbing three rebounds and recording a block . Love managed a double - double of his own with 19 points , and added three rebounds and a steal . Kyrie Irving contributed nine points , seven assists and two rebounds , while Ramon Sessions led the bench with 14 points and six assists . The two teams reconvene for Game 1 on Saturday night at the Time Warner Cable Arena .

The Nuggets were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 48 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Nuggets were also able to force the Lakers into 11 turnovers , while only committing 11 of their own . It was a season - high in points for Barton and a nice surprise for the Nuggets , as he 's averaging only 12 points per game so far this season . Nearly recording a triple - double , Jordan Clarkson finished with 19 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 7 - 9 FT ) , eight rebounds and two assists . It was a new season - high in points for him and also a nice bounce back game after posting only three points in Saturday 's game against the Bulls . Lou Williams also had a productive game off the bench , as he scored 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 5 FT ) in 37 minutes . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Utah Jazz on Friday .
It was a big night for the Mavericks behind the arc , as the team shot a whopping 17 - of - 31 from three - point range . Nine of these threes came from D-League call - up Yogi Ferrell , who led the team with a career - high 32 points . Sharpshooter Wesley Matthews , meanwhile , scored 27 points and splashed in three three - pointers on the night . The Mavs also shot a respectable 82 percent from the free - throw line and 46 percent from the field in what was a stellar night on the offensive end for the team . For Portland , star point guard Damian Lillard delivered what was possibly his worst statistical night of the season . The All-Star went just 4 - of - 20 from the field and turned the ball over three times . His fellow guards , Evan Turner and C.J . McCollum , picked up the slack , however , as they combined for 52 points on the night . Both teams will enjoy three days of rest before taking the court on Wednesday . The Trail Blazers will visit Utah on Wednesday , while the Trail Blazers will host the Blazers on Wednesday . The Trail Blazers ( 22 - 29 ) had dropped three of four games in this game , but it was easily their best performance of the season . Evan Turner did all he could to keep Portland hanging around , as he led the team with 24 points , four rebounds and three assists off the bench . Seth Curry led the starters with 19 points , three rebounds and two assists . Damian Lillard accumulated 13 points , nine rebounds and six assists , but shot just 4 - of - 20 from the field in a game - high 38 minutes .

The Heat did most of their damage in the first half , out - scoring the Celitcs 52 - 28 . They were able to finish the game shooting 50 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors shot 47 percent from the field and only 25 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat were led by the duo of DeMar DeRozan and DeMar DeRozan . DeRozan went 11 - for - 22 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 30 points , while also adding three rebounds and four steals . He 's now averaging 18 points and 8 rebounds on the year . The only other member of the starting five to reach double figures in points was Mario Chalmers , who scored 12 points ( 3 - 10 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) in 24 minutes . Coming off the bench , Mario Chalmers took most of the minutes and shot an efficient 3 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for3 from the three - point line to score 12 points in 24 minutes . Chalmers finished with 12 points ( 3 - 10 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and three assists , while Vasquez had 12 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) and four assists off the bench . The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 133 - 105 at Staples Center on Saturday . Both teams were shorthanded in the contest , however . The Pelicans ( 7 - 17 ) were without Anthony Davis ( rest ) , Jrue Holiday ( toe ) and E'Twaun Moore ( toe ) , making the game very one sided from the gate . The New Orleans reserves played physical basketball and found scoring lanes in the first half , falling just six points short of the Clippers ( 17 - 7 ) at the end of the second quarter . The second half was a different story , as Los Angeles outscored the Pelicans by 12 points in the third quarter and 10 points in the fourth quarter . Chris Paul dropped one of the biggest double - doubles of the season , racking up 20 points and 20 assists , with 18 of those assists coming in the first three quarters of action . Paul added five rebounds and three steals on 8 - of - 16 shooting in 30 minutes of action , which was even more helpful given Blake Griffin 's ( knee ) absence . DeAndre Jordan worked the pick and roll with Paul to perfection , and with no Anthony Davis clogging the lane on the other end , Jordan found his way to 19 points and nine rebounds rather easily . Jamal Crawford and Marreese Speights added scoring help from the bench , as they finished with 22 points and 17 points , respectively . Tim Frazier led the Pelicans on the other end , scoring 20 points and adding 11 assists on 6 - of - 13 shooting . Buddy Hield drew 36 minutes and contributed 15 points on 2 - of - 5 shooting from behind the arc . Next up , the Pelicans play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Phoenix Suns , while the Clippers host the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Orlando Magic , 88 - 69 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Monday . The Pacers ( 5 - 6 ) were n't sure that they 'd have Paul George ( ankle ) available to help try to break a two - game losing streak until late in the afternoon , but he ultimately was able to suit up and share the co - lead in scoring among the starting five . He also helped spearhead a defensive effort that saw Indiana limit the Magic ( 4 - 7 ) to a 32 percent success rate from the field and a 20 percent tally from three - point range , while also holding them to a season - low point total . They also elicited a total of 14 turnovers from Orlando while turning the ball over just nine times in their own right . The key for the Pacers was their play in the two middle quarters , as they outscored the visitors by a 55 - 38 margin over the second and third periods . Orlando was paced by Evan Fournier , who supplied 14 points , two rebounds , two assists and a steal . Elfrid Payton managed 12 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals , while Nikola Vucevic struggled through an uncharacteristic 1 - of - 10 effort from the field , an unsightly performance that he nevertheless managed to somewhat compensate for with 12 rebounds . Aaron Gordon was the only other Magic player to hit double digits in the scoring column , pacing the bench with 11 points , three boards and an assist . George and Monta Ellis each turned in 13 - point efforts , with the former posting six rebounds , five assists , two steals and a block , while the latter had a pair of rebounds and assists , to go along with a block . Thaddeus Young provided a solid complementary effort with 11 points , five rebounds , an assist , two steals and a block . Jeff Teague filled out the stat sheet with 11 points , eight rebounds , five assists , a steal and three blocks . C.J . Miles led the reserves with 16 points , four rebounds , an assist , two steals and two blocks . The Magic head back home to await the New Orleans Pelicans for a Wednesday visit , while the Pacers have their own Wednesday home date with the Cleveland Cavaliers .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 8 - 7 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 9 - 6 ) 110 - 96 on Tuesday at the American Airlines Center in Memphis . Despite being down 51 - 46 at halftime , the Grizzlies were able to out - score the Mavericks 28 - 36 in the fourth quarter , giving them enough of an edge to get the victory on the road in Dallas . The Grizzlies also out - shot the Mavericks 42 percent to 39 percent from the field , which also may have given them just enough of an advantage to take the win . The Grizzlies ' big three did most of the damage in this game . Mike Green went 8 - for - 14 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 19 points , while also adding seven rebounds and three assists . He 's on a nice two - game stretch where he 's combined for 54 points , 11 assists and five steals . Dirk Nowitzki was the only other member of the starting lineup to reach double figures in points , as Nowitzki finished with 14 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) . He had only reach double figures in points twice before , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Coming off the bench , Raymond Felton added 16 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , seven rebounds and two steals . The Mavericks ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Mavericks will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Seth Curry , 123 - 0 , Wednesday night at Toyota Center . The Rockets ( 24 - 9 ) jumped out of the gate to a 31 - 31 first - quarter lead , and even increased their lead to 73 - 54 by halftime . The Mavericks ( 4 - 23 ) rallied back late in the fourth quarter , bringing it to a two - point game , 117 - 100 , with 2:3 to go but missed shots and turned the ball over down the stretch , which cost them their fourth loss in a row . James Harden led the way for Houston with 34 points , 11 assists and five rebounds , in 30 minutes . Wesley Matthews added 19 points , while the only other player to score in double digits for Dallas was Justin Anderson , who chipped in 13 points on 4 - of - 8 shooting , in 21 minutes off the bench . The Rockets shot 53 percent from the field and 53 percent from long range , as they cruised to the win . Harrison Barnes was the high - point man for the Mavericks , with 21 points , to go along with three rebounds and one assist , in 32 minutes . Ryan Barnes added 21 points , while Nene added 13 points , seven rebounds , one steal and one assist , in 19 minutes off the bench . The Mavericks will look to build on this win , as they go on to visit Philadelphia on Monday . Meanwhile , the Seth Harden led the way for the Mavericks ( 9 - 23 ) with 34 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , along with 11 assists and five rebounds , in 30 minutes . Wesley Matthews added 19 points , one assist , one rebound and one steal , while Wesley Matthews chipped in 19 points , three rebounds and two steals . The Mavericks go on to host the Mavericks on Sunday .
The Denver Nuggets ( 15 - 20 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 5 - 28 ) 110 - 101 on Monday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . Despite a fierce comeback by the Timberwolves , who out - scored the Timberwolves 58 - 48 in the second half , the Timberwolves were able to hold them off and steal the victory on the road . The Timberwolves were able to out - rebound the Timberwolves 41 - 42 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Nuggets were led by Arron Afflalo in this one , as he went 11 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 34 points , while also adding two rebounds and two steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points and 12 rebounds per game . Coming close to a triple - double , Mo Williams finished with 17 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt ) as well . The only other Timberwolve to reach double figures in points was Jusuf Nurkic , who recorded 14 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 0 - 0 FT ) , six rebounds and four steals . The Washington Wizards defeated the Indiana Pacers , 118 - 104 , at Verizon Center on Saturday . The Wizards were expected to win this game rather easily and they took care of business after the first quarter . Indiana actually led for the majority of the game , as the Pacers never led by more than two points . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Wizards going 14 - of - 19 and the Pacers hitting just 2 - of - 27 from long distance . Washington also dominated the steal differential , winning that battle , 5 - 2 . The Pacers ( 22 - 18 ) had a tough task here against one of the best home teams in the league and they fell just shy in this close loss . John Wall carried the load , as he tallied 28 points , seven rebounds and eight assists . George Hill was n't far behind , finishing with 19 points and eight rebounds . Lavoy Allen led the bench with 15 points and three rebounds . The Pacers ( 19 - 19 ) have been dominant at home all season , but this was a devastating loss in a game they were supposed to win . John Wall did all he could for Indiana , as he accumulated 28 points , seven rebounds and eight assists . Monta Ellis was n't far behind , tallying 22 points and three assists . Monta Ellis was a nice spark off the bench , providing 17 points , three rebounds and three assists on 7 - of - 14 shooting . Gary Neal got the start for Otto Porter and contributed 12 points , four rebounds and three assists .

The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 32 - 25 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 23 - 34 ) 116 - 105 in an overtime thriller on Sunday . This was anticipated to be a high - scoring game and while it was , it took overtime to get there . It was amazing how much three - point shooting there was in this game , as the two teams combined for 69 three - point attempts . The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game , as the Thunder recorded 21 assists and 12 turnovers , while the Thunder committed 15 turnovers to their 19 assists . The Thunder was unconscious from the field , shooting 47 percent from the field , 52 percent from three - point range and 86 percent from the free - throw line . The starters were the big difference , as the Oklahoma City starters scored 64 points to New York 's 43 points . Russell Westbrook continued his amazing season , as he tallied 38 points , four rebounds and four assists in the loss . Victor Oladipo also had a good game , as he totaled 21 points , four rebounds and two assists . Steven Adams was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 11 points and eight rebounds . Jerami Grant was the only other player in double figures , as he amassed 13 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Thunder will look to build off this win when they take on the Philadelphia 76ers in their next game on Monday .
The Utah Jazz ( 18 - 33 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 17 - 32 ) 102 - 90 on Friday . A thoroughly dominating performance by Utah was perhaps to be expected , considering that the Jazz came into the contest surrendering the second - lowest amount of points per game ( 97 ) , while the Kings checked in with the second - highest turnover rate ( 9 ) on a nightly basis . Both figures proved to be prophetic Thursday , as the Jazz held Sacramento to a season - low scoring total , and also set a season - best total in points surrendered . The Jazz elicted 12 turnovers from the Kings as well , and held them to 39 percent and 26 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively . Utah 's domination was even more evident in the second half , when they held the helpless visitors to 29 total points . The Kings were led by Derrick Favors 's 20 points , which he complemented with nine assists , nine rebounds , three blocks and a steal . Derrick Favors was next with 20 points , nine rebounds , five assists , three blocks and a block . Ben McLemore was next in line with 15 points , two rebounds , and a steal and a block in 25 minutes off the bench . The Kings remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They head to Oklahoma City to take on the Thunder on Monday night . Ramon Sessions paced the bench with 11 points , four rebounds and five assists . The Kings remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are currently one game behind the eighth - seeded Dallas Mavericks . They head to Sacramento to take on the Kings on Sunday night .

Russell Westbrook has been virtually unstoppable the majority of the season , but had been somewhat human the last three games after seeing a streak of six consecutive triple - doubles snapped against the Celtics on Dec. 11 . However , matched up Saturday against one of the most porous defenses in the league , especially against point guards , the perennial All-Star exploded for 38 points , 12 rebounds , a career - high 12 assists and three steals . Meanwhile , Zach Randolph ( 16 points ) and Zach Randolph ( 16 points ) rounded out the first unit , while Mike Allen ( nine points , four rebounds , two assists and a steal ) and Chandler Parsons ( 12 points , three rebounds ) put together a pair of performances from an outstanding Mike Conley and Marc Gasol . Steven Adams provided 16 points , 12 rebounds , two blocks and a steal . Tony Allen contributed 11 points , four rebounds , three assists , two blocks and a steal . Victor Oladipo poured in seven points and added three assists , three rebounds and two steals . Marc Gasol led the way for the Thunder with 31 points , four rebounds , eight assists , two blocks and two steals . Mike Conley tallied 18 points , two assists , one rebound and three steals . Steven Adams registered 16 points and eight boards . Cameron Payne led the bench with nine points , and Cameron Payne was the only other member of the first unit with double digits in the scoring column , as Payne had nine points in 19 minutes . Andre Roberson and Domantas Sabonis combined for 19 points as well , with the former also hauling in 12 boards , dishing out three assists , recording a steal and two blocks . The Thunder head back home to take on the Rockets on Saturday night , while the Thunder hit the road to take on the Houston Rockets on Monday evening as well .
The Sacramento Kings ( 3 - 5 ) defeated the Ty Lawson ( 5 - 0 ) 96 - 83 on Sunday evening at Sleep Train Arena in Toronto . The Kings out - scored the Raptors 24 - 25 in the fourth quarter , leading to a 15 - point victory on the road . The Kings were the superior shooters in this one , going 44 percent from the field and 31 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors finished at 36 percent from the floor and just 23 percent from deep . It was a team - effort win for the Kings , who had seven players reach double figures in points . DeMarcus Cousins led the way , going 7 - for - 21 from the field to score 22 points , while also adding 14 rebounds and three blocked shots . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 24 points and 9 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 21 points and 16 rebounds on the year . Kyle Lowry was able to record a double - double of his own . He finished with 15 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 3 - 10 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and 10 assists , marking a new season - high in points . He 's scored in double figures for three straight games now , after only doing it five times previously in the season . In his Sixers debut , Kyle Lowry took advantage of the extra playing time and went 5 - for - 16 from the field and 3 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score 15 points . Lowry finished with 15 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 3 - 10 FT ) , 10 assists and two steals , while Koufos recorded 23 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and six rebounds of his own . The Kings ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Raptors will be at home against the Boston Celtics on Friday .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Isaiah Whitehead , 126 - 98 , at Staples Center on Monday . The Nets ( 15 - 56 ) improved to 15 - 9 at home as they narrowly escaped with the win , fighting - off a go - ahead and then a tying bucket by the Suns in the last minute . Down four to end the fourth quarter , the Suns ( 15 - 56 ) managed to grab a one - point lead heading into the final frame . The Nets came out with intensity in the fourth , and closed out strong , as they out - scored the Suns 42 - 28 in the quarter to seal their 50th win of the season . This marks Brooklyn 's third straight win , while the Suns ' three game winning streak was put to rest . Devin Booker led the way for the Suns , with 23 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting , to go along with 11 rebounds , three blocks and one steal , in 31 minutes . Brook Lopez finished with 19 points , six rebounds , two blocks and one steal , in 25 minutes , while Tyler McDaniels chipped in 12 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 24 minutes off the bench . The Suns will face the second night of a back - to - back , as they play host to the Grizzlies on Saturday . Meanwhile , Brook Lopez led the way for the Suns ( 22 - 50 ) with 19 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting , to go along with six rebounds , in 25 minutes . Marquese Chriss followed up with 23 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting , in 31 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , the Suns struggled from the field , shooting a poor 37 percent , including 31 percent from long range .
The Sacramento Suns defeated the Sacramento Kings , 105 - 103 , at Golden 2 Center on Monday . The Suns ( 19 - 31 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Kings ( 19 - 31 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Sacramento forced the Cavs into an uncharacteristic 13 turnovers and made the shots when it counted most to emerge as surprising victors . DeMarcus Cousins naturally played a pivotal role , posting a near triple - double with a game - high 22 points , 11 rebounds , a pair of assists and a steal . Meanwhile , the dynamic duo of Eric Bledsoe and Darren Collison put on a pair of spectacular dueling performances , with the former posting 33 points , four assists , two rebounds , two steals and a block , and the latter posting 21 points , an assist and a steal . Warren followed with a 21 - point , 5 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a steal . Ty Collison was next with 19 points , three assists , two rebounds and two steals . Tyson Chandler generated a modest seven points but hauled in 12 rebounds . P.J . Tucker paced the bench with 12 points , two rebounds and an assist . The Kings return home to face off with the San Antonio Spurs on Friday evening , while the Kings remain home and await the Portland Trail Blazers on Tuesday evening .
The Chicago Bulls ( 8 - 3 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 5 - 4 ) 105 - 89 on Tuesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Bulls were down 81 - 78 following the third quarter , but were able to make a run in the final quarter , out - scoring the Clippers 26 - 25 to finish off the 12 - point victory on the road . The Bulls were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 44 percent from the floor and 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Bulls were also able to force the Clippers into 12 turnovers , while committing only eight of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Bulls were led by Jamal Crawford , who went 10 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 24 points , while also chipping in five assists . It was one point shy of a season - high for him , as he 's now put together a very strong string of games over the last two weeks . The majority of the rest of the Clippers production came from Mike Dunleavy and Mike Dunleavy . Crawford added 14 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt ) and five assists , while Mirotic had 12 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and seven rebounds as well . Doing his best to keep the Clippers in the game was Jamal Crawford . Crawford went 10 - for - 17 from the field and 0 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 24 points , while also handing out five assists . He was able to get to the free throw line seven times and converted on all six attempts . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice surprise , as he 's only reached double figures in points once again . Kirk Hinrich was the only other Clipper to score in double figures , as he had 14 points in 34 minutes . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Clippers will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Grizzlies ( 34 - 23 ) came in to Thursday 's contest hoping to snap a five - game losing streak , but were also running on fumes after two games in the previous three nights . Fatigue may have played a role in the first half , as the Grizzlies ( 34 - 23 ) built a 62 - 51 lead by halftime . The second half was much tighter , but Memphis eventually pulled away on the strength of a highly productive night for their starting five . All first unit members hit double digits in the scoring column , and the Grizzlies managed to shoot 51 percent from the field overall , and an equally impressive 41 percent tally from beyond the arc . The Grizzlies visit the Detroit Pistons on Friday night , while the Nets visit the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday evening as well .

In fact , the Heat went on a 29 - 11 run in a 13 - minute span between the third and fourth quarters to overcome a 11 - point deficit and eventually pull away . The game was relatively close up to that point though , as there were nine lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 16 points until the final six minutes . Eric Dragic carried the load for Eric Gordon , as he tallied 23 points and seven rebounds on 8 - of - 14 shooting . Tyler Johnson also scored 16 points off the bench , going 6 - of - 11 from the field and 2 - of - 3 from the free - throw line . The Heat ( 25 - 32 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 13 tries . Ryan Anderson totaled 17 points , six rebounds and four assists . Tyler Johnson was huge off the bench , providing 16 points , seven rebounds and four assists on 6 - of - 11 shooting .
The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Detroit Pistons , 109 - 86 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . New Orleans was desperate for a win and this dominating victory inches them a little closer to the eight - seed in the west . They did all their damage in the first and fourth quarter , as they outscored Detroit , 62 - 34 . The Pistons had one of the worst shooting games of the season , as they went 40 - of - 103 from the field , 3 - of - 17 from the free - throw line and 8 - of - 23 from three - point range . The Pelicans shot well on their end , hitting 50 percent of their shots , while going 22 - of - 23 from the free - throw line . Defensive rebounding was decisive as well , with New Orleans winning that battle , 45 - 27 . The Pistons ( 29 - 32 ) had won three of four headed into this matchup , so this 23 - point loss is obviously disappointing . Jon Leuer led Detroit , as he collected 22 points , seven rebounds and three steals . Andre Drummond did get ejected , but still totaled 13 points and 17 rebounds , despite going 1 - of - 10 from the free - throw line . Tobias Harris led the bench with 15 points and six rebounds . The Pelicans ( 24 - 37 ) were 0 - 3 with DeMarcus Cousins and this marks their first win since the trade , despite the fact that Cousins was suspended for this matchup ( technicals ) . Anthony Davis carried the load , as he tallied 33 points , 14 rebounds and three assists on 11 - of - 17 shooting . Jrue Holiday finished second on the team with 22 points , four rebounds and five assists . Dante Cunningham was a surprise , providing 16 points and five rebounds .

The host Los Angeles Lakers handily defeated the Golden State Warriors on Friday , 117 - 97 . It was Lakers ( 3 - 3 ) coach Luke Walton 's first game against the Warriors since leaving the organization over the offseason . Walton coached the Warriors for the beginning of their historic 2015 - 16 regular season in place of an injured Steve Kerr , but later left to pursue the head coaching job in Los Angeles . Walton certainly got the best of his former team , as the Lakers were able to maintain their hefty halftime lead down the stretch . The team successfully capitalized on their size advantage , holding a 51 - 40 advantage in the rebounding column . Third-year forward Julius Randle led the team with 20 points and was a monster on the boards , pulling down 14 rebounds . The Lakers also saw success from the line , hitting over 90 percent of their free - throws . For the Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) , it was a tough night from beyond the arc . After showing dominant offensive flow on Thursday in a rout of the Thunder , the Warriors shot just 5 - for - 32 from three in Friday 's contest . This included 0 - for - 10 for Steph Curry , whose NBA-record streak of 157 games with a three - point make finally came to an end . The results were n't much better for Klay Thompson , who went just 2 - for - 10 . Kevin Durant , meanwhile , continued to perform with his new team , leading the game with 27 points . The Lakers will host the Suns on Sunday , while the Warriors will host the still - winless Pelicans on Monday .
The Houston Rockets ( 40 - 17 ) took care of business against the Phoenix Suns ( 17 - 38 ) on Thursday in a 133 - 102 win . The Suns have now won five - straight games , as they are reeling headed into the All-Star break . This was a wire - to - wire win for the Rockets , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 35 minutes . The Rockets were unconscious from deep , as they hit 49 percent of their shots from the field , 80 percent from the free - throw line and 36 percent from three - point range . The bench differential was huge as well , with the Rockets bench scoring 50 points to the Suns 20 . The Rockets also dominated the rebounding , as they won that battle 55 - 42 . These teams are going in opposite directions right now and this result is indicative of the two teams recent play . Houston has the second - best defense in the NBA and they did a heck of a job today if slowing down a potent Suns attack . Alex Len was a beast down low , as he totaled 13 points , five rebounds and two blocks in the defeat . James Harden continued his torrid form , as he accumulated 40 points , six rebounds and eight assists in the win . Jared Len was the only other player who played well , as he amassed 13 points and nine rebounds in the defeat . Houston 's next game will be on Friday against the Utah Jazz in Salt Lake City .

Recent results from these teams would indicate a different outcome , but the Knicks showed some resiliency here on the road . New York actually led by 16 at times in the first quarter , before allowing the Bulls to take their first lead in the second quarter . The Knicks responded by recapturing the lead in the third and kept it for the entirety of the fourth quarter . New York shot 52 percent from the field and assisted on 31 of their 46 made baskets . They did that dominating the turnover differential as well , committing just five , while forcing 12 from the Bulls . The Knicks ( 2 - 3 ) got some great performance from their starters here , as all five scored at least 15 points . Kristaps Porzingis led the team , scoring 27 points to go along with his five boards . Carmelo Anthony was n't far behind , tallying 25 points , six rebounds and four assists of his own . The Chicago Bulls opened their season Thursday with a 105 - 99 victory against the visiting Boston Celtics . Chicago ( 10 ) jumped out to an early lead , finishing the first quarter with a 30 - 20 lead . The Bulls new - look backcourt of Dwyane Wade and Rajon Rondo quickly made contributions , with Wade scoring 14 points in the first half . The group managed to combat concerns about poor floor - spacing , with Wade and Rondo contributing five combined three - point makes . Chicago was able to keep the Celtics off the glass extremely effectively , winning the rebounding battle 55 - 36 . The Bulls ' edge was particularly pronounced on the offensive end , as they earned 18 offensive rebounds compared to Boston 's three . Boston ( 1 - 1 ) , meanwhile , managed to keep the game close throughout . All-Star point guard Isaiah Thomas led the charge for the Celtics ' offense , scoring 25 points . With bench guard Marcus Smart sidelined by injury , sophomore Terry Rozier saw 22 minutes coming off the bench . He made the most of his time on the floor , scoring eight points and recording four rebounds and four assists while recording no turnovers . Boston had a solid shooting night , converting on half of their shots from the floor overall . However , struggles on the glass ended up weighing the Celtics down despite keeping Chicago to just 43 percent shooting . The Bulls will face the Pacers on Saturday , while the Celtics will take on the Hornets . Meanwhile , the Celtics will take on the Hornets on Sunday , while the Celtics will host the Hornets on Friday .

It was his fifth double - double of the season . The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Chicago Bulls , 103 - 91 , at Spectrum Center on Friday night . The Bulls ( 14 - 15 ) checked in to Friday night on a downturn , as they 'd lost four of their last five . They were able to get off to a fast start , however , outscoring the host Hornets ( 17 - 13 ) by a 26 - 22 margin in the first quarter . Charlotte turned the table quickly in the second period , however , almost doubling up the visitors with a 26 - 14 advantage . Although the Bulls bounced back in the third , the Hornets were able to keep pace every step of the way throughout the second half , which resulted in their tenth home win of the season . While Chicago failed to find much scoring from their starting five outside of Jimmy Butler , Charlotte benefited from a balanced effort across their first unit . As customary , the effective backcourt duo of Kemba Walker and Nicolas Batum led the way , as they supplied matching 20 - point contributions . Butler 's 24 points led the Bulls , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , four assists and a block . Frank Kaminsky III paced the bench with 13 points , five boards , an assist and a block . The Bulls are in San Antonio on Christmas Day to take on the Spurs , while the Hornets visit the Brooklyn Nets on Monday evening .

He 's averaging just 8 points and seven rebounds on the season . Zach LaVine really struggled with his shot in this one , as he went just 5 - for - 13 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 13 points . He had six points , so he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 52 points and nine assists . Gorgui Dieng was the third Nets starter to reach double - digit points , as he finished with 11 . The Nets ' next game will be at home against the Chicago Bulls on Friday , while the Timberwolves will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 100 - 93 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Sunday . More often than not , the trio of LeBron James , Kevin Love and Kyrie Irving are essentially enough to overcome most opponents . It was a different story Sunday , however , as veteran Channing Frye actually led the way with a season - high 20 - point effort in 25 minutes off the bench . The aforementioned starters were n't necessarily underwhelming , as they combined for 55 points , including four total three - pointers from Love and James . Defense was also undeniably a factor , as Cleveland ( 8 - 1 ) held the Hornets ( 6 - 3 ) to 38 percent success rates from both the field and three - point range . The Hornets were led by Kemba Walker , who tallied 21 points , four assists , two rebounds and a steal . Marvin Williams posted 16 points , six rebounds and two assists . Nicolas Batum managed a near double - double with 15 points , nine boards , seven assists , two steals and a block . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist did get there , supplying 11 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and a steal . Frye added three rebounds and three blocks to his team - high scoring total . A pair of 19 - point efforts from James and Irving paced the starting five , with the former also filling out the stat sheet with eight rebounds , eight assists , a steal and a block and the latter dishing out four assists , posting three rebounds and recording a steal . Love was strong as well , pouring in 17 points and bringing in 11 rebounds , four assists and a steal . Tristan Thompson mustered a modest four points , but did bring in 12 rebounds . The Hornets move on to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Tuesday night , while the Cavaliers remain home to take on the Raptors on Tuesday evening as well .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Charlotte Hornets 105 - 90 at Spectrum Center on Monday . The Grizzlies ( 9 - 5 ) pulled out their fifth straight win behind a strong effort from Mike Conley . The floor general for the Grizzlies was an all around force from end - to - end , especially after losing James Ennis ( calf ) . The calf injury flared up after returning to the lineup on Monday , and is another blow to the front court for Memphis given Chandler Parsons ( bruised left knee ) inability to play for roughly two more weeks . Memphis controlled the pace of the game from start to finish and never let the Hornets ( 8 - 5 ) get close enough to make it a game . The game got blow fully open after Conley buried a 27 - foot three point shot to take a 69 - 45 lead with just a few seconds left in the third quarter . The Grizzlies point guard finished with 31 points , four rebounds , two assists and three steals on 11 - of - 21 shooting . JaMychal Green had a great performance in the starting lineup with 12 points , eight rebounds and an assist on 4 - of - 4 shooting in 31 minutes . Kemba Walker led the starting lineup in scoring for the Hornets , but failed to provide enough to get his team back in the game after contributing 17 points and two assists . Charlotte got strong productivity from the bench , where Frank Kaminsky dropped 23 points on 11 shots in 20 minutes , while Spencer Hawes added 14 points and 10 rebounds . Both teams play on Saturday , as the Hornets host the San Antonio Spurs , while the Grizzlies head to Philadelphia to take on the 76ers .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 24 - 16 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 23 - 16 ) 88 - 79 on Monday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . While both teams shot very similar percentages from the field , the Grizzlies took the upper had from behind the three - point line , going 38 percent from the field , while the Jazz went just 39 percent . The Grizzlies also forced the Jazz into 17 turnovers , while committing only 4 of their own . The Grizzlies were led by the duo of Marc Gasol and Mike Conley . Gasol shot 7 - for - 18 from the field and 0 - for - 3 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 17 points , while also adding four rebounds and three steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 23 points and 17 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 27 points and 18 rebounds on the year . George Hill had a strong showing as well , going 6 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 15 points . He also got to the free throw line nine times , converting on seven of those attempts . He 's now averaging 22 points and 7 rebounds on the season . George Hill was the only other starter to reach double figures in points , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) . The Grizzlies ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Jazz will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .
The Miami Heat ( 14 - 16 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 17 - 11 ) 101 - 91 on Friday . Miami is on a two - game win streak . They jumped out to a 30 - 27 lead after the first quarter and held the Cavaliers at a distance the rest of the game . With the win , Miami remains in third place in the Eastern Conference standings , owning tiebreakers over both Indiana and Charlotte with just 15 games left on the schedule . The Heat were led by Luol Deng 's 25 points ( 11 - 16 FG ) , and eight rebounds in 40 minutes of play . Luol Deng had 25 points ( 11 - 16 FG ) of his own , to go along with eight rebounds and eight assists in 40 minutes . Kyrie Irving had 25 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) , four rebounds , three assists and one steal in 42 minutes . The Heat are now eight and nine games out of the final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference . Up next , the Heat will stay home Wednesday and go up against the Pistons , while Cleveland will travel to Indiana Saturday to go up against the Pacers , and the Cavaliers will travel to Boston to go up against the Celtics on Wednesday . Cleveland has dropped two straight games , but the Heat have won four of their last five games . The Heat 's next game is on the road against the Boston Celtics on Saturday , while Heat will go on the road to Chicago to play the Bulls on Wednesday .
The Orlando Magic ( 28 - 36 ) defeated the visiting Sacramento Kings ( 25 - 39 ) 107 - 100 , Saturday evening at Amway Center . The Kings came into this game winners of four of their last five games and half a game ahead of the eighth place Dallas Mavericks , while the Kings came in losers of three of their last four , but just a few wins away from clinching a playoff spot . However , each team played as if they came in with the other 's streak , as the struggling Magic trounced the cruising Kings . The Kings managed to pour in 72 first - half points , which is the most points the Kings have given up in a first half all season . The Magic snapped a three - game losing streak and will look to add to their win streak as they play host to the Grizzlies on Sunday . The Kings ( 25 - 39 ) shot around the blistering 52 percent from the field and only 27 percent from the three - point line . Evan Fournier added 16 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , seven rebounds and six assists , in 38 minutes , while CJ Watson chipped in 17 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Kings will look to bounce back as they play host to the Nets on Sunday .

Defense has been optional for these teams all season and the 254 combined points in this game show just where their priorities are . Denver really took control in the third quarter , outscoring New York , 36 - 22 , and never relinquishing the lead from there . Both offenses were scoring at ease , with both teams shooting over 55 percent from the field . The Nuggets feasted down low , as they won the rebounding differential , 44 - 33 , and outscored the Knicks , 68 - 52 , in the paint . The Nuggets ( 24 - 29 ) have been one of the best offenses in the league this season and this 131 - point outing shows just how efficient they can be . Will Barton was the only bench player in double figures , as he totaled 15 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . Kyle O'Quinn led the bench , providing 16 points , six rebounds , three assists and four blocks .

However , that phrase seems to be carrying a little more weight these days , as Philadelphia , behind emerging star Joel Embiid , is starting to make some noise around the league . Atlanta won all four quarters by at least eight points and took a 15 - point lead into the fourth . Their defense was key for once , as they held Cleveland to 55 percent shooting and forced them to commit 14 turnovers . This was a tough situation for Cleveland and the effort - filled loss is still a good sign for the morale of this team . They 'll get a few days off and then play the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday . The Hawks carried a two - game losing streak coming into this game and put in quite the effort against the defending Eastern Conference champs . In the Hawks six wins this season , they have allowed under 90 points per game on average and that defense held true tonight . The 130 points is a season - low for Williams and they were lucky to escape with a win . LeBron James had one of his best games of the year though , as he tallied 38 points , 13 rebounds and eight assists in the loss . Dwight Howard also played well , as he amassed 15 points and 10 rebounds en route to a double - double . These teams will have a rematch on December 9th in Atlanta .
The Golden State Warriors ( 27 - 1 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 12 - 15 ) 103 - 85 on Monday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . After going into halftime down 62 - 41 , the Jazz came out firing in the third quarter , out - scoring the Jazz 26 - 20 to finish off the 13 - point victory on the road . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 41 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Klay Thompson led all scorers . He went 6 - for - 16 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding six assists and a blocked shot . Over his last four games , he 's now boasting averages of 27 points , 8 rebounds , 4 blocks and 2 blocks . Recently aquired from the Jazz , Draymond Favors continued his strong play , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) , nine rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's now pushed his season averages to 27 points and 3 rebounds per game . Stephen Curry also went a perfect 5 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 16 points . He also had nine rebounds and nine assists , as he did a little bit of everything Tuesday . The only other Timberwolve to reach double figures in points was Andrew Bogut , who scored 10 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) . The Warriors ' next game will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday , while the Jazz will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday .

As for the Jazz ( 40 - 41 ) , they got a heroic performance from their own All-Star , Gordon Hayward , as he put up a career - high 20 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting in 38 minutes as a reserve . It was the first time since late - November that the 41 - year - old Argentinian played 25 minutes in a single game and just the third time all season . More importantly , though , is the idea that when Matthews is finally healthy in his role , he is still averaging a double - double on the season . In his bid for the MVP trophy , Gordon Hayward produced 23 points , four assists and six rebounds in 40 minutes of action . The 12 points matched a season - high for him . The Jazz were led by the starting backcourt of Shelvin Mack and Shelvin Mack . Matthews scored a game - high 20 points , while Mack up 18 points off the bench in 35 minutes .

The Pelicans outscored the Suns 30 - 32 in the fourth quarter for a comeback win . The turnovers were the key difference , as Phoenix committed 16 turnovers to the Suns 13 . This loss cracked a five - game winning streak for the Suns , so losing in the second end of a back - to - back is nothing to be upset about . Anthony Davis was fantastic , as he amassed 34 points and nine rebounds on 12 - of - 21 shooting . T.J. Warren was second on the team , as he scored 20 points on an efficient 9 - of - 16 shooting . The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Dallas Mavericks 92 - 91 Monday at American Airlines Center . With just over three minutes remaining in Monday 's contest , the Thunder ( 42 - 31 ) looked dead in the water , as they were down 13 and the Mavericks ( 31 - 42 ) had control for majority of the game . Russell Westbrook , however , had other plans , as he led the team on a 140 run to end the game that was topped off by a game - winning jumper from the free throw line . Westbrook finished with yet another triple - double of 37 points ( 16 of which came in the final quarter ) , 13 rebounds and 10 assists in 36 minutes , and he did so while shooting an efficient 15 - of - 30 from the field . And the MVP-candidate carried the load for Oklahoma City , as Victor Oladipo ( 15 ) and Taj Gibson ( 13 ) were the only other players to score in double figures for the Thunder . As for Dallas , they played a strong 45 minutes before collapsing down the stretch and missing their final six shots from the field . Six different Mavericks players managed to score in double figures , but overall , it ended up being a subpar offensive performance from the team , as they shot just 41 percent from the field . It was , however , one of the better performances from Nerlens Noel since he was traded to Dallas , as he recorded 15 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting and eight rebounds - - both of which were team - highs - - in 28 minutes . Up next , the Thunder will head to Orlando on Friday to take on the Magic , while the Mavericks will look to avoid dropping their third straight game in New Orleans on Wednesday .

In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Rockets finished the game on a 28 - 8 run to open things up and win comfortably . They actually led for the majority of the game , as Houston 's only lead lasted less than two minutes in the second quarter . Shooting was the big difference in the game , with Houston hitting 51 percent of their shots , while 10 - of - 39 from the free - throw line . Defensive rebounding was decisive as well , with Houston winning that battle , 22 - 5 . The Rockets ( 33 - 22 ) had to play this game without Al Horford and Avery Bradley , as they did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal to hold off the Rockets . James Harden carried the load , as he collected 39 points , seven rebounds , 11 assists and four steals on 10 - of - 29 shooting . Will Barton was second on the team , accruing 24 points , seven rebounds , eight assists and two steals off the bench . Clint Capela recorded a double - double , totaling 12 points and nine rebounds . James Harden added another triple - double to his tally , collecting 39 points , seven rebounds and 11 assists . Will Barton matched his scoring total , dropping 24 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting .

The Mavericks were able to out - rebound the Mavericks 47 - 30 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . He did have four assists though , so it was n't all bad for the guard . Snell was able to record 10 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) and four rebounds in 31 minutes . The New Orleans Pelicans ( 35 - 29 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 33 - 30 ) 114 - 103 on Friday at the Smoothie King Center in Milwaukee . Fighting to get back into the playoff hunt in the stacked Western Conference , the Pelicans have started to hit their stride , notching their third straight victory in a row . They used their superior shooting in this game , going 59 percent from the field and 60 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 52 percent from the floor and a meager 27 percent from beyond the arc . To go along with the superior shooting , the Pelicans also secured a 34 - 25 rebounding advantage , further furthering their dominance in this one . The Pelicans were led by the duo of Giannis Antetokounmpo and Michael Carter-Williams . Antetokounmpo went 17 - for - 16 from the field and 7 - for - 7 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 29 points , while also adding five rebounds and three steals . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 37 points and 24 rebounds . He 's now pushed his season averages to 14 points and 8 rebounds per game . Michael Carter-Williams had a very well - rounded game , going 8 - for - 17 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 25 points . He also got to the free throw line 11 times , converting on nine of those attempts . He 's now averaging 25 points and 8 assists on the season . Khris Middleton was able to record a double - double of his own . He went 6 - for - 11 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while adding two assists in 40 minutes . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Buck reaching double - digits in points was Tyreke Evans , who posted 11 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the New York Knicks on Thursday , while the Bucks will travel to Dallas to play the Mavericks on Wednesday .

An argument could be made that the injuries the Heat continue to suffer are a blessing in disguise considering that it 's forcing the team to give their young talent run against top - flight teams . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Celtics did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Sixers into 11 turnovers , while committing just 14 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Defense was key for Phoenix , as they held Los Angeles to 42 percent shooting and forced them to commit 10 turnovers . The assisting margin was huge as well , with Phoenix recording 31 assists to the Lakers 13 . Los Angeles ( 15 - 56 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 15 tries . Devin Booker led the way for Los Angeles , as he tallied 25 points , eight rebounds and seven assists . D'Angelo Russell went just 6 - of - 18 from the field , but finished with 14 points , three rebounds and three assists . Mirza Teletovic was the only bench player in double figures , as he totaled 22 points and 14 rebounds . Devin Booker led the team in scoring , as he amassed 25 points , eight rebounds and seven assists . Jordan Clarkson was second on the team , collecting 13 points , two rebounds and two assists .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 16 - 8 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 10 - 12 ) 104 - 98 on Tuesday night . In a battle of two of the best defenses in the NBA , offense was on display . Both teams shot right around 44 percent from the field and the Thunder failed to record a block for the first time all year . The Jazz were led by Kevin Durant , who tallied 31 points , five rebounds and six assists in the victory . Russell Westbrook also had a good game , as he tallied 25 points , five rebounds and five assists in the defeat . The only other player in double figures was Derrick Favors , who totaled 14 points and 10 rebounds . Dion Waiters also had a nice game , as he totaled 13 points , three rebounds and four assists in the defeat . Up next for the Jazz is a date with the Oklahoma City Thunder on Monday . The Jazz got some great performances from their studs here , but it was one again the defense that let them down . Not only did they allow 104 points , they allowed Oklahoma City to shoot 53 percent from the field . Russell Westbrook was once again the best player , as he tallied 25 points , 11 rebounds , five assists and two steals in the win . Gordon Hayward also had a nice game , as he totaled 22 points , four rebounds and six assists . Up next for the Jazz is a favorable matchup against the Phoenix Suns on Friday .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 30 - 39 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 42 - 27 ) 98 - 93 on Friday . Charlotte came into this game as a double - digit favorite and simply couldnt hold off a bad Hornets team . The key for Charlotte was their shooting , as they shot 43 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range . They were extremely efficient as well , as they committed just seven turnovers to the Hornets 12 . Charlotte came into this game as a huge favorite , but couldnt muster up enough late to pull out the road win . The bench was the only reason they played so well , as they scored 41 bench points to go along with an impressive 28 rebounds . Marcin Gortat had his best game of the season , as he tallied 19 points , five rebounds , four steals and two blocks in the defeat . Otto Porter also played well , as he totaled 16 points , three rebounds and three steals . Frank Kaminsky also played well off the bench , as he amassed 14 points and four rebounds . The Wizards will look to keep up this good form against the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday . This is a downright bad loss for the Wizards and they continue to fall deeper and deeper out of the playoffs . Bradley Beal led the team with 18 points , but shot just 6 - for - 14 from the field and went just 2 - for - 7 from the free - throw line . Nicolas Batum was the only other starter in double figures , as he accumulated 8 points , three rebounds and five assists . The Wizards have a few days off until they play the Milwaukee Bucks on Saturday .

He was able to shoot 9 - for - 23 from the field and 1 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 30 points , while also handing out two assists . He was able to get to the free throw line 12 times and converted on nine of those attempts . He 's now averaging 21 points and 14 rebounds on the year . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going .
