The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 13 - 7 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 16 - 6 ) 105 - 101 on Wednesday . Cleveland has won six straight games , and in their last three games , they 've scored at least 118 points . Their offense is firing on all cylinders , and coach David Blatt is using unconventional lineups to get the work done . He 's regularly used LeBron James as the point guard . While James has always facilitated the offense , he has n't spent a lot of time at point guard , and using a 6 - 10 forward there is creating devastating matchup problems for the Cavaliers ' opponents . James scored 35 points Saturday and has averaged 35 points over the last three games . Cleveland will host the Denver Nuggets on Monday . They 've already played once this season . The Cavs defeated the Nuggets 110 - 101 in their first matchup . Toronto was on a four - game win streak before they ran into the monolithic Cavaliers . The Raptors gave up 40 points on 28 turnovers , all but handing over the game to the Cavaliers . Cleveland was up 62 - 34 at halftime and never looked back after that . In fact , the Cavaliers had a 29 - point lead by the end of the first quarter and that was evident after that . The key for Cleveland was their rebounding , as they snatched down 31 boards to the Raptors 35 . The Raptors were led by LeBron James , who totaled 16 points , four rebounds and 14 assists in the loss . The only other player in double figures was Jonas Valanciunas , who totaled 18 points and 15 rebounds . Toronto will look to build off this win on Wednesday when they take on the Portland Trail Blazers in their next game .

The Grizzlies offense was hot all night , as they shot 43 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range . The Miami Heat defeated the Indiana Pacers , 113 - 95 , at American Airlines Arena on Monday . The recent form of these teams would indicate a Miami blowout , but that simply was n't the case in this close - fought battle . A 18 - 1 run spanning between the second and third quarter was the decisive stretch , as that swung a double - digit lead for the Pacers into a 13 - point lead for the Heat . Despite there being just one ties and four lead changes , neither team led by more than 19 points , as it was a single - digit margin for well over 40 minutes . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with Miami going 14 - of - 24 from long range , while Indiana went just 5 - of - 24 . The Heat did dominate the rebounding though , winning that battle , 43 - 43 . It was a near wire - to - wire win for Miami , as they led for the final 50 - plus minutes . The Pacers ( 30 - 29 ) have now won three - straight games , as they continue to show how dangerous they can be . Goran Dragic was the player of the game , as he collected 21 points , two rebounds , four assists and two steals . Myles Turner totaled 18 points , seven rebounds and three blocks . James Johnson was huge off the bench , providing 15 points , seven rebounds , eight assists , two steals and two blocks . Up next , the Hawks will travel to Oakland Wednesday to take on the Warriors in a battle between the NBA 's best , while Utah will stay home and go up against the Clippers on Wednesday . The Jazz will head to Los Angeles to take on the Lakers in Sunday . Center Paul Millsap ( knee ) sat out Wednesday as he continues to work his way back from a groin injury . He shot a ridiculous 13 - for - 11 from the field to finish with 16 points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal in 29 minutes . Both teams have a tough day shooting the ball , as they will look to get back on track as they take on the Trail Blazers on Monday .
The Chicago Bulls ( 3 - 1 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 0 - 4 ) 98 - 90 on Saturday . Derrick Rose sat out the game as a precaution . He sprained his ankle in Friday 's loss to the Cavaliers . Rose was originally listed in the starting lineup before being removed just before tip - off . He said he could have played if the game was a must - win but that it 's more important to make sure he does n't injure himself further at this time of the season . Evan Fournier started at point guard and finished with 13 points and two assists in 40 minutes . Orlando has lost three straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Magic will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Magic have the right guys to build a winning team around . Jimmy Butler ( hamstring ) was originally ruled out but was given the green light by coach Jason Kidd to come off the bench and play limited minutes . Orlando is on a back - to - back set . They 'll host the Portland Trail Blazers on Saturday . Orlando has lost seven of their last eight games . They shocked the world Wednesday when they were able to steal a win from the Portland Trail Blazers 90 - 82 . The Magic continue to struggle on Tuesday , when they host the Milwaukee Bucks .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 34 - 19 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 21 - 33 ) 104 - 87 on Wednesday . San Antonio carried a six - point lead heading into halftime , but it was clear their tired legs let them down in the second half . The Spurs outscored the Pistons by 12 points over the final three minutes and that was truly the difference in the game . A key for the night was the rebounding , as they snatched down 45 boards to the Pistons 36 boards . Detroit 'll look to keep up this good form against the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . This is a downright bad loss for the Pistons and they continue to fall deeper and deeper out of the playoffs . D.J . Augustin led the team in scoring , as he tallied 22 points and six assists in the win . Tony Parker had his best game in a Pistons uniform , as he tallied 17 points , six assists and three rebounds in the defeat . Up next for the Pistons is a date with the Oklahoma City Thunder on Wednesday . The Pistons got some great performances from their studs here , but it was one again the defense that let them down . Not only did they allow 104 points , the Spurs forced the Pistons into 10 turnovers , while holding the Spurs to just 41 percent shooting . The Spurs have been playing better ball recently , but this loss guaranteed that they 'd miss the playoffs yet again . Danny Green was fantastic off the bench , as he amassed 19 points , eight rebounds and four assists in the win . Manu Ginobili also played well off the bench , accumulating 13 points , two rebounds and two assists . Detroit will look to build on this win Wednesday against the Orlando Magic in their next matchup .
The Golden State Warriors ( 36 - 7 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 30 - 7 ) 111 - 111 on Sunday . The recent form of these teams would have indicated a different result , but the Warriors played with some serious desperation . The big difference in the game were the benches , as Golden State got 0 - for - 28 from long distance and just 9 - for - 23 from the charity stripe . Both teams really struggled shooting , as they both failed to crack 31 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . The second quarter is where the Warriors won the game , as they outscored the Warriors 26 - 26 in that 21 - minute stretch . Golden State has been playing the best defense in the NBA over recent weeks and continued that form here . Derrick Rose scored a game - high 30 points in the loss , while also collecting seven rebounds , two assists and two blocks . David Lee also played well in the loss , as he tallied 24 points , nine rebounds and six assists in the defeat . The Warriors will look to get out of this rut on Saturday in a much better matchup against the Orlando Magic . The Splash brothers really took it to the Bulls here in what was definitely a revenge game . Derrick Rose led the team with 30 points and also snatched down seven rebounds . Steph Curry accumulated 21 points , four rebounds and nine assists in the defeat . The Bulls will look to exact revenge on Thursday in a rematch with the Warriors for their next game .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 21 - 21 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 44 - 45 ) 96 - 99 on Sunday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Thunder 21 - 21 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 43 percent from the field , while the Thunder went just 43 percent . The Thunder also out - rebounded the Timberwolves 54 - 54 , giving them a huge advantage in that category . That advantage may have given them just enough to steal the win on the road . The Thunder were led by Kevin Durant , who went 11 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding six rebounds . He was able to get to the free throw line 4 times , converting on a perfect 4 - of - 8 at the line . He 's now averaging 20 points , 8 rebounds and 8 assists on the season . Karl-Anthony Towns had a double - double of his own with 17 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) , 12 rebounds and three blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 38 points and 45 rebounds over his last two games . Enes Kanter was a big factor in the win as well , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and 14 rebounds . He 's now averaging 9 points and 3 rebounds on the year . The only other starter in double figures was Ricky Rubio , who posted 13 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and 12 assists in 36 minutes . The Thunder received most of their production from their duo of Andrew Wiggins and Ricky Rubio . Wiggins finished with 20 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and two rebounds , while Wiggins added 20 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and a pair of rebounds . The Timberwolves ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Timberwolves will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 3 - 3 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 3 - 3 ) 104 - 84 on Tuesday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . Despite out - scoring the Grizzlies 22 - 15 in the final quarter , the Thunder were able to hold off the late comeback , and secure a victory in front of their home fans . The Thunder were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies went 37 percent from the floor and just 21 percent from deep . The Thunder also did a solid job of the ball though , as they forced the Grizzlies into 10 turnovers , while committing just 13 of their own . The Thunder were led by Kevin Durant , who nearly recorded a triple - double with 36 points ( 11 - 23 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt , 14 - 15 FT ) , 10 rebounds and two blocked shots . The double - double marked his ninth of the season thus far . The only other Hawk to reach double figures in points was Tony Allen , who came off the bench to score 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) in 29 minutes . Coming off the bench , James Johnson continued his strong play with 15 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) , five rebounds and two steals in 18 minutes . The Thunder ' next game will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday , while the Grizzlies will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday as well .
The Portland Trail Blazers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 109 - 103 , at Target Center on Sunday . The Trail Blazers ( 9 - 12 ) checked in to Monday 's contest having experienced their share of shooting struggles this season , although they 'd shown signs of improvement in having won three of the prior four games . They heated up significantly from the field against the Timberwolves ( 8 - 11 ) , managing a 51 percent success rate from the floor and 33 percent from three - point range . They also suffocated the Timberwolves ' long - range attack , limiting them to just 33 percent shooting from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . Minnesota 's cause was significantly undermined by an atypically poor shooting night from Ricky Rubio , who posted only nine points on a 1 - of - 5 tally from the floor . Karl-Anthony Towns was a distant second on the Timberwolves with 27 points , 12 rebounds and two assists . Ricky Rubio followed with a near double - double of nine points , nine assists and six boards . Kevin Garnett turned in a 11 - point , 1 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and a steal . Allen Crabbe paced the second unit with 11 points , three boards and one assist . Allen Crabbe was productive in a reserve role as well with 11 points , three rebounds and one assist . Meyers Leonard led the bench with 14 points , two rebounds and one assist . The Timberwolves continue their trek through the Northeast with a trip to the Philadelphia 76ers on Wednesday night , while the Trail Blazers visit the Oklahoma City Thunder on Wednesday evening as well .
The Indiana Pacers ( 6 - 6 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 9 - 2 ) 103 - 93 on Friday . Indiana is on a three - game win streak , the first time they 've won back - to - back games this season . Kevin Love has struggled to find his place the Cavaliers ' offense so far this season , but he was the key cog for them Saturday as he put up 27 points and 16 rebounds in 33 minutes . Anderson Varejao sat out the game with a rib contusion . Tristan Thompson filled in as a spot starter at center and put up two points and 12 rebounds in 28 minutes . The Pacers have taken a bold stance by putting out some of their lesser - known players in the starting lineup over James George and Irving , but the gamble has largely paid off , as they 've won eight of their last nine games . Cleveland will stay home to host the Boston Celtics on Saturday . Cleveland has lost two straight games . They shot a woeful 41 percent from the field and 37 percent from beyond the arc . Jeff Teague scored a game - high 20 points on 7 - of - 18 shooting to go along with eight assists and two rebounds in 37 minutes . C.J . Miles played a game - high 23 minutes off the bench and recorded 10 points on 4 - of - 7 shooting from the field . Indiana will play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Milwaukee Bucks ( 6 - 25 ) on Wednesday .
The Utah Jazz ( 3 - 4 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 2 - 4 ) 97 - 96 on Tuesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . Collectively as a team , the Pistons shot just 34 percent from the field and limped to a brutal 26 percent clip from deep . The Jazz , on the other hand , stayed hot all game long , going 46 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons finished at 39 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from deep . The Jazz also forced the Pistons into 11 turnovers , while committing just 11 of their own . Brandon Jennings was the high - point starter in this one , going 8 - for - 15 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a team - leading of 17 points . It was a nice surprise for the Pistons , as he 's averaging only 13 points per game so far this season . Derrick Favors also had a solid showing , finishing with 16 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) , 12 rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's now pushed his season averages to 11 points and 2 rebounds on the year . Both Alec Burks ( 6 - 13 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and Alec Burks ( 6 - 13 FG , 2 - 4 FT ) also scored 14 points apiece . The Pistons ' next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Pistons will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .
The LA Clippers ( 47 - 27 ) earned a road win over the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 25 - 50 ) Thursday night at Target Center , 99 - 79 . The Clippers led for much of the first half and took a six - point advantage into the halftime break . But the Clippers exploded in the second and third quarters , where they outscored the Timberwolves 31 - 19 , allowed them to pull away and earn the victory in front of their home crowd . The Clippers were the superior shooters in this one , going 44 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Wolves finished at 35 percent from the floor and 35 percent from deep . With the win , the Clippers remain a half game ahead of the streaking San Antonio Spurs for the fifth projected playoff seed in the West , while the Portland Trail Blazers still own a game lead over the Clippers for the fourth spot . The Clippers ' frontcourt was a huge factor in the win . Karl-Anthony Towns led the way , going 7 - for - 13 from the field and 0 - for - 3 from the free throw line . He finished with 16 points and 11 rebounds , while Towns had a double - double of his own with 16 points and 11 rebounds . The only other Timberwolve to reach double figures was Shabazz Muhammad , who recorded 11 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 4 FT ) in 26 minutes . The Clippers ' next game will be on the road against the Toronto Raptors on Friday , while the Timberwolves will be at home against the Utah Jazz on Friday .

It was his second straight night recording 31 points , pushing his season scoring average to 16 points per game . The Thunder 's next game will be on the road against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Wizards will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Spurs were expected to win this game easily , but it took a monster second half to do so . In fact , San Antonio outscored Denver , 54 - 33 , in the second half . Defense was key for the Spurs , as they held the Nuggets to 40 percent shooting and forced them to commit 18 turnovers . Kawhi Leonard carried the load for San Antonio , as he tallied 25 points , seven rebounds , six assists and four steals . Danilo Gallinari went just 5 - of - 15 from the field to total 16 points and 10 rebounds . Will Barton was huge off the bench , providing 12 points , nine rebounds , two assists and two steals . Jonathan Simmons was a nice spark off the bench , dropping 12 points in 27 minutes . On deck for San Antonio is a home matchup against the Sacramento Kings on Sunday . The Spurs ( 13 - 3 ) have been one of the biggest disappointments this season and it 's a wonder when they 'll pull out of this hole . Emmanuel Mudiay did all he could for Denver , as he led the team with 13 points , three rebounds and five assists off the bench . LaMarcus Aldridge was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 16 points and four rebounds . The bench was huge , as they combined for 45 points , 17 rebounds and 18 assists .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Philadelphia 76ers 113 - 95 Wednesday at American Airlines Center . The Mavericks ( 19 - 30 ) steamrolled their way to a fourth straight victory as they continue to be much - improved since the start of the new year . They have now won five of their last six games and boast a 9 - 6 record in 2017 . A major part of this run has been the play of Seth Curry , who scored a game - high 22 points Wednesday on top of six assists , four steals and three rebounds . It was his ninth game since the start of the new year with at least 15 points . The surprise performance of the night , however , came off the bench from Salah Mejri , who played just 21 minutes as a reserve but recorded 16 points and a game - high 17 rebounds in that time . Devin Harris also had a solid day off the bench , scoring 14 points in just 19 minutes . As for the 76ers ( 18 - 30 ) , they 've cooled off a bit since their hot start to January , as they have now lost three of their last four games after Wednesday 's defeat . Jahlil Okafor put together a solid offensive performance in the loss , scoring 16 points in 24 minutes , but it 's clear that Philadelphia is missing the inside presence of Joel Embiid , who has now missed five of the last six games with a knee contusion . Ersan Ilyasova added a double - double of 13 points and 10 rebounds , but overall for the 76ers , it was a forgettable night offensively . The team ended up shooting just 46 percent from the field and 27 percent from behind the arc while committing 21 total turnovers . Up next , the Mavericks will look to continue their winning ways against Portland on Friday , while the 76ers will travel Thursday to San Antonio .
The Phoenix Suns ( 27 - 20 ) beat the Washington Wizards ( 31 - 16 ) 106 - 98 on Friday . Washington found out before the game that starting shooting guard Bradley Beal will miss a minimum of two weeks with what is being termed as an initial - stage stress reaction in his lower right fibula . The development thrust Marcus Morris into the starting lineup in Beal 's stead , a situation that the six - year pro had played well in earlier this season . It also figured to add more offensive responsibility to Beal 's backcourt mate John Wall and small forward Markieff Morris . Dragic poured in a game - high 20 points for the game , and also added three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Markieff Morris also made a strong return to his starting lineup , posting 16 points , seven rebounds and a block . Kris Humphries and Bradley Beal were next with a pair of 16 - point efforts . The former added three rebounds and four assists , while the latter dished out a game - high nine assists . The Suns remain in second place in the Western Conference 's Pacific Division . They head to Los Angeles to face off against the Lakers on Tuesday . Dragic paced the Suns with a 20 - point , 2 - assist double - double , and he also added three rebounds , two steals and a block . However , he also committed a game - high seven turnovers . Goran Dragic was next with 18 points , seven assists , a rebound and a steal . Bradley Beal registered 13 points , four assists , a rebound and a block in 36 minutes , and P.J . Tucker contributed another backcourt of 12 points , 10 rebounds , an assist and two steals . The Wizards are currently in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and they retain a rather tenuous hold on the eighth seed in the conference by one - and - one - half games over the Utah Jazz . They now head to Philadelphia to face off against the Sixers on Wednesday night .

The Kings continue to struggle and have now lost four of their last five games , after starting the season 2 - 4 . The Kings , on the other hand , have now lost four straight , but still comfortably hold a four and a half game lead over the Oklahoma City Thunder in the Southwest Division . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games . The Timberwolves were able to force the Timberwolves into 12 turnovers , while committing only four of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . He went 12 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding eight rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 60 points and 37 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 27 points and 17 rebounds on the season . The Indiana Pacers ( 37 - 33 ) upset the Philadelphia 76ers ( 9 - 62 ) 91 - 75 on Monday . The Pacers were able to prevent their first nine - game losing streak since the 2002 - 3 campaign by shocking Philadelphia on the Sixers ' home court . They accomplished the improbable feat with an outstanding all - around team effort , led by balanced scoring from four of their five starters , as well as from their sixth - man extraordinare , Jerami Grant . George Grant , managed to shoot 6 - of - 12 from the field , but still managed 12 points , four assists and four rebounds . Hollis Thompson was another productive outing off the bench for Philadelphia , managing a career - high 15 points and adding six rebounds , two assists and a steal over just 33 minutes . Indiana improved to 37 - 33 and remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Monday night . The Sixers were led by Paul George , who supplied 15 points , six rebounds , three assists and a pair of steals . George Hill was next with 12 points , four rebounds , four assists and a block . Indiana remains in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and are slotted in the sixth seed as well . They head to Boston to take on the Celtics on Monday night .

Portland is on a three - game win streak , but Wednesday 's win came with a special meaning for the Blazers as it was the first game they 've played this season without Robin Lopez . Lopez is expected to miss up to two months with a broken right hand . Julius Randle shifted over to the center position to put up a game - high 16 points , six rebounds and four assists in 30 minutes . Julius Randle had a double - double with 16 points and 6 rebounds . For the Lakers , this was the fourth game of a five - game road trip . Los Angeles came into this game on two days rest , but was unable to withstand a barrage from Portland . Mason Plumlee had a solid game with 16 points and six rebounds off the bench , but it was n't enough to get the win . The Lakers will look to bounce back at home Saturday against the Nuggets .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 121 - 114 , at Spectrum Center on Saturday . The Rockets ( 31 - 9 ) have been rightfully lauded for their considerable improvement this season , which has persisted even after the season - ending knee injury to star center Joel Embiid . Houston 's ongoing transformation to a winning team has not been as evident all season as it was Friday , when they thoroughly dominated a team that still has postseason aspirations in the Hornets ( 20 - 19 ) . Only one member of the Charlotte starting five managed to post double - digit scoring , and just barely , as Trevor Ariza and Ryan Anderson each tallied double digits in the scoring column . The visitors were led by Frank Kaminsky 's 22 points off the bench , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , an assist and a block . Kemba Walker and Williams contributed a pair of 25 - point efforts , with the former adding six assists , six rebounds , one steal and one block , and the latter providing seven rebounds and one assist . Corey Brewer led the bench with 15 points , five rebounds , one assist and one steal . Marvin Williams managed 16 points , eight rebounds and one block . Jeremy Lamb led the second unit with 15 points and five boards . James Harden 's 40 - point , 10 - assist double - double led the Hornets . Kemba Walker was next with 25 points , 10 assists , six rebounds and one steal . Frank Kaminsky III posted a 22 - point , 3 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one steal . Jeremy Lamb led the second unit with 11 points , five rebounds and one assist . The Rockets head back home to tangle with the Utah Jazz on Saturday night , while the Hornets head to New Orleans to face the Pelicans on Friday evening .
Youngsters were on display in this matchup of struggling teams and Andrew Wiggins shined the brightest . Wiggins finished the game with 36 points and eight rebounds on 13 - of - 29 shooting . He 's on quite the tear right now , as he has scored 111 points across his last three games . Karl-Anthony Towns played well too , as he accumulated 21 points and seven rebounds on 8 - of - 15 shooting . Zach LaVine recorded a double - double off the bench , totaling 15 points and nine rebounds . Bojan Bogdanovic was a nice spark off the bench , scoring 13 points on 3 - of - 9 shooting . Brooklyn will have a quick turnaround , as they host the Houston Rockets on Friday for their next game . Brooklyn ( 3 - 4 ) choked away a big lead in this game and that 's indicative of their recent form , as they 've now lost 12 of their last 12 games . Brook Lopez carried the load for Brooklyn , accumulating 26 points , three rebounds , two steals and three blocks in the defeat . The Golden State Warriors ( 56 - 14 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 40 - 30 ) 111 - 95 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Golden State . The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Thunder 25 - 22 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 48 percent from the field , while the Thunder went just 43 percent . The Warriors also out - rebounded the Thunder 46 - 40 , giving them an even greater advantage in the victory . Klay Thompson led the way , going 12 - for - 21 from the field and 7 - for - 15 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 34 points , while also adding six rebounds and two steals . He 's picked up his scoring of late as he 's averaged 17 points and 6 assists over his last three games . Enes Kanter was a big factor in the win as well , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and 10 rebounds . He 's now averaging 15 points and 16 rebounds on the year . Victor Oladipo was another player with a solid showing . He did n't have his best shooting performance on the season ( 4 - 16 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , but he still finished with 23 points , as he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the three games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 30 points , 11 rebounds and 16 assists , as he 's really stepped up his production with Ibaka sidelined . Like we 've grown accustomed to , Russell Westbrook came just shy of another triple - double . In 27 minutes , he finished with 15 points ( 4 - 16 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , eight rebounds and seven assists . He had a poor showing in Sunday 's game against the Heat , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Coming off the bench , Semaj Christon came off the bench . In 22 minutes , he had 10 points ( 4 - 4 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and two assists in 19 minutes . The Thunder 's next game will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday , while the Thunder will be at home against the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday .

The Golden State Warriors defeated the Sacramento Kings , 114 - 100 , at Oracle Arena on Thursday . The Warriors were heavy favorites headed into this matchup and they left no doubt who the better team was . It was n't lopsided throughout though , as there were 14 ties and 22 lead changes in the first half . That 's when Golden State turned it on though , outscoring Sacramento , 44 - 48 , in the fourth quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , with Golden State dishing out 37 assists to just 12 turnovers , while Sacramento committed 10 turnovers to just 27 assists . The Warriors shot 49 percent from the field and 32 percent from long range . Rebounding was also decisive , with the Warriors winning that battle , 44 - 37 . The Sacramento Kings ( 27 - 45 ) are battling for the eight - seed in the west and losses like this are devastating for that pursuit . In a game that was tight throughout , the Bucks used a balanced attack to pull out a wire - to - wire win . In fact , the Bucks led by 13 after the first quarter , as they never relinquished the lead from there . Defense was key for Milwaukee , as they held Utah to 41 percent from the field ( 34 - of - 83 ) and 34 percent from three - point range ( 4 - of - 19 ) . The assist differential was huge as well , with the Bucks recording 21 assists to just 13 turnovers , while Utah committed 23 turnovers to just 24 assists . Jabari Parker led the team in scoring , as he dropped 19 points . Rudy Gobert recorded a double - double , totaling 12 points , 14 rebounds and two blocks . Trey Lyles was a nice spark off the bench , scoring 14 points on 5 - of - 11 shooting . Milwaukee will be in action again on Saturday , as they travel to play the Orlando Magic for their next game . The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder 110 - 108 Monday at Chesapeake Energy Arena . Monday 's game came with no shortage of drama , as after plenty of back and forth in the final period , Paul Millsap sit a short jumper that put the Hawks ( 16 - 12 ) up by two with just 12 seconds remaining . The Thunder ( 16 - 12 ) , with one last opportunity remaining went to their star guard Russell Westbrook , who missed a jumper , got the rebound and got his shot blocked before Oklahoma City was able to call one last timeout . The Thunder inbounded it to Westbrook again , who missed a potential game - winning 3 - pointer , and while Steven Adams was able to get the rebound for Oklahoma City , his dunk at buzzer was ruled no good . In the end , it was a battle between the team 's two starting point guards , with Dennis Schroder and Westbrook putting together two of their very best performances of the season . Schroder scored 31 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting from the field - - his second 30 - point game of the season - - on top of eight assists and five rebounds . Meanwhile , Schroder posted 31 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 10 - 10 FT ) , five rebounds and eight assists in 40 minutes . It was the first time he 's scored less than 46 points in the last three games , but he hit the free throw line Monday night . In the end , the Thunder just could not get anything going offensively , especially in the first two games of the season . Up next , the Thunder will head home Wednesday to take on the 76ers , while the Thunder will stay home to take on the Pelicans on Friday .

The Houston Rockets defeated the Dallas Mavericks 93 - 92 at Toyota Center on Sunday . The Rockets ( 2 - 1 ) maintained a lead throughout most of the Western Conference clash with the Mavericks ( 0 - 3 ) , which included a 10 point lead at the half . Drama ensued down the stretch , started by Wesley Matthews , who was able to cap of a 70 run with back - to - back baskets , which cut the Rockets ' lead to two points with 3:2 remaining in the fourth quarter . Matthews ' heads up defense forced a turnover on Harden and transitioned the impressive scoring effort to give Dallas a chance to grab its first win of the season . Matthews continued to put the team on his shoulders after draining a 27 - foot three pointer to tie the game at 92 with four seconds left in the game , but he also committed a shooting foul on James Hardens ensuing drive to the hoop with just one - tenth of a second left to play . Harden missed the first free throw but sank the second and that was all that needed to ice the game for Houston . Harden went on to put up star numbers again , scoring 28 points to go along with seven rebounds and seven assists . Eric Gordon and Ryan Anderson joined Harden in double figures with 14 points each , while Clint Capela was strong on the glass , totaling 10 rebounds . Wes Matthews struggled from behind - the - arc , but not when it mattered most for Dallas . Matthews finished with 25 points , five boards and three assists on 9 - of - 25 shooting ( 3 - of - 15 from three ) . Harrison Barnes started 3 - of - 5 from the field but ended up missing his next six attempts on his way to a lowly 10 points in 38 minutes of action . The Mavericks will head to Cleveland to visit the reigning champion Cavaliers on Tuesday , while the Mavericks will visit the Utah Jazz on Wednesday .

Marvin Williams supplied 13 points , six rebounds and an assist . Spencer Sessions led the bench with 14 points , and Spencer Sessions led the bench with 14 on 4 - of - 6 shooting .
The Sacramento Kings ( 22 - 31 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 8 - 45 ) 114 - 110 on Sunday at Sleep Train Arena in Philadelphia . The Kings got out to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Sixers 24 - 30 in the first quarter alone . The 76ers were the superior shooters in this one , going 51 percent from the field and 25 percent from the three - point line , while the Sixers went 46 percent from the floor and just 43 percent from beyond the arc . The 76ers were also able to force the 76ers into 19 turnovers , while committing only 13 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Jahlil Okafor had his way with the Sixers ' bigs . He went 11 - of - 18 from the field to score a game - high of 26 points , while also adding 10 rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's combined for 0 - of - 29 from the field and 12 - of - 19 from the free throw line over his last two games , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . The only other Sixer to reach double figures in points was Nik Richards , who finished with 16 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 4 - 5 3Pt ) and three assists off the bench . The Kings ' next game will be on the road against the Boston Celtics on Friday , while the 76ers will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Tuesday .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 47 - 31 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 39 - 40 ) 107 - 104 on Monday in Dallas . A big fourth quarter gave the Mavericks a shot in the closing minutes , but the Mavericks proved to be just too much for them . Gerald Green led the way for the Mavericks , scoring a game - high 30 points on 10 - of - 19 shooting in 30 minutes . Markieff Morris added 19 points of his own , while Rajon Rondo was forced to leave the game in the third quarter with a foot injury . It did n't hurt that they turned the ball over just eight times and took incredible care of the basketball throughout the game . Point guard Eric Bledsoe also had a solid outing , posting 14 points on 5 - of - 7 shooting and three assists . Off the bench , Amar'e Stoudemire scored 10 points and grabbed six rebounds in 14 minutes , while Devin Jefferson scored 10 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting in 18 minutes . As a team , the Mavericks shot 48 percent from the field and recorded 18 assists on 48 made field goals . The loss knocks Phoenix back to a half game out of the final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference standings . Up next , the Mavericks will stay at home Wednesday to take on the Trail Blazers , while the Suns will stay home and go up against the Nuggets on Friday , as the Mavericks will travel to Boston to go up against the Celtics .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 31 - 22 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 14 - 40 ) 109 - 90 on Monday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 22 - 27 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Nets went 47 percent from the floor and a meager 50 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Grizzlies forced the Nets into 20 turnovers , while committing just 10 of their own . Continuing his dominance of late , Brook Lopez had another huge game for the Nets . He went 8 - for - 14 from the field and 4 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 20 points , while also adding four rebounds and four steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 28 points and 10 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 24 points and 13 rebounds on the year . Mike Conley was able to notch a double - double of his own with 18 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 3 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , two assists and two steals . Despite suffering the loss , the Nets had six players reach double figures in points . Wayne Ellington led the way , going 6 - for - 8 from the field and 4 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while Wayne Ellington and 18 points were the two double - double boards off the bench . It was a season - high in points for Ellington and a nice surprise , as he 's averaging only 8 points per game so far this season . Nearly recording a triple - double , Jeff Green finished with 18 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , four rebounds and two steals . He 's now averaging 15 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Wayne Ellington chipped in with 10 points ( 3 - 7 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and two rebounds in 24 minutes . The Grizzlies were led by Wayne Ellington , who went 6 - for - 8 from the field and 4 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding two rebounds . He 's now averaging 15 points and 12 rebounds on the season . Zach Randolph was one of the lone bright spots for the Nets . He went 6 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 15 points in 27 minutes . He had four steals off the bench , so it was good to see him get back on track . Also , coming off the bench , JaMychal Green chipped in with 13 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and four rebounds .

The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder , 114 - 80 , at FedEx Forum on Thursday . The Grizzlies ( 21 - 14 ) have a well - earned defensive reputation , but their thorough domination of the Thunder ( 20 - 13 ) was significantly helped by the ejection of Russell Westbrook for back - to - back technical fouls after 23 minutes for arguing a referee 's call . However , Memphis did earn the victory through their own strong offensive play as well , as they tallied superb 52 and 59 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively . Meanwhile , without their MVP , the Thunder 's offense was largely neutered , as only two reserves , Enes Kanter and Alex Abrines , managed to get into double digits in the scoring column . Westbrook led OKC in scoring despite the early exit , supplying 21 points to go along with five rebounds and two steals , although he notably did not record any assists . Kanter totaled 19 points and five rebounds , while Abrines managed 10 points and three boards . Steven Adams mustered only six points but did haul in 15 rebounds and added two assists and two blocks . However , Andre Roberson , Domantas Sabonis and Anthony Morrow could only register two points apiece . The Grizzlies were paced by Marc Gasol , who compiled 25 points , eight rebounds , two assists , a steal and five blocks . The next two highest point totals came from the bench , as Troy Daniels posted 22 points , along with three rebounds and two assists , and Zach Randolph went for 21 points , eight boards and two assists . JaMychal Green produced 17 points , four rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block , and Andrew Harrison , drawing another start for Mike Conley , tallied 10 points . Chandler Parsons returned after taking off the last game for rest purposes and produced two points , three assists and two steals over 15 minutes . The Thunder return home to face the Los Angeles Clippers on New Year 's Eve , while the Grizzlies are at Sacramento on Saturday afternoon as well .

The Orlando Magic ( 26 - 45 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 26 - 44 ) 112 - 109 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Magic did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 27 percent compared to the Sixers , who went 27 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Sixers into 16 turnovers , while committing just 18 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Nikola Vucevic had his way with the Sixers ' bigs . He went 10 - of - 19 from the field to score a game - high of 26 points , while also adding 13 rebounds in 37 minutes . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 16 points and 15 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 23 points and 6 rebounds on the year . T.J. Saric was the only other player to score in double figures for the Sixers . Like Vucevic , the Sixers ' bench was very impressive , with both Nik Stauskas and Terrence Ross reaching double figures in points . Stauskas scored 17 , respectively , but shot a poor 6 - of - 20 from the field in that effort .

The Kings were able to use a strong second half , where they out - scored the Suns 67 - 52 , to coast to a 9 - point victory on the road . The Kings were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 47 percent from the floor and just 25 percent from deep . The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Charlotte Hornets in overtime , 125 - 120 , at Spectrum Center on Saturday . The Timberwolves ( 6 - 14 ) may have looked like somewhat easy prey to the hometown Hornets , considering they came in with a 5 - 14 record despite their solid talent . The first quarter did nothing to dissuade those beliefs , as Charlotte ( 11 - 9 ) jumped out to a 29 - 19 lead after the first 12 minutes . However , Minnesota clawed back to trail by only three , 52 - 49 by intermission . The second half was a continuous see - saw battle that appeared like it might go the Hornets ' way in the closing seconds , until an Andrew Wiggins 31 - foot three - point jumper with eight seconds remaining knotted the score at 106 . He then sunk a pair of clutch free throws with 11 seconds remaining in overtime to give Minnesota some crucial breathing room at 123 - 118 . That five - point margin was the final separation between the two teams , as the Timberwolves secured only their third road win of the season . Wiggins totaled 29 points overall while leading the visitors , and he added four assists , a rebound and three steals . Karl-Anthony Towns was right behind him with 27 points , 15 rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . Zach LaVine supplied 17 points , three assists , two rebounds , two steals and a block . Ricky Rubio managed a modest seven points but did dish out 12 assists . Nemanja Bjelica and Shabazz Muhammad led the bench with a pair of 12 - point efforts , and also totaled eight rebounds between them . The Hornets were paced by Kemba Walker , who posted 22 points , eight assists and four rebounds . Frank Kaminsky III got another start at power forward in place of Marvin Williams and tallied 21 points , nine rebounds , five assists , a steal and a block . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist registered 15 points , six rebounds and an assist . Nicolas Batum matched his point total and made it a double - double with 12 assists , while also hauling in eight rebounds , recording three steals and posting a block . Marco Belinelli led the second unit with 15 points . The Timberwolves head back home to face the San Antonio Spurs on Tuesday evening , while the Timberwolves travel to Chicago to take on the Bulls on Monday evening as well .

The Chicago Bulls ( 11 - 6 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 6 - 9 ) 102 - 84 on Friday . Chicago has won four straight and seven of their last eight . Everything is looking good for the Bulls right now . They 're winning , and they were finally able to play back - to - back games with a fully healthy roster after struggling to have everyone available on the same night most of this season . Derrick Rose returned to action Monday against the Raptors , and in his two games back , he 's put up 26 points and 25 points . The early - season rust seems to be breaking off , and if Rose can stay healthy , a great performance on Christmas Day could be on tap for Thursday 's game against the Lakers . Brooklyn has lost five straight games , and while their prospects this season look dire at the moment , the team has faced off against plenty of formidable teams in the early part of their schedule , leaving the door open to hope for more wins going forward . Just as a team like the Cleveland Cavaliers is sturggling to find consistency due to having so many new additions , the roster turnover for the Nets can be pointed to as the source of their struggles thus far . The Nets will host the Los Angeles Clippers on Sunday .
The Houston Rockets ( 40 - 17 ) took care of business against the Phoenix Suns ( 17 - 38 ) on Thursday in a 133 - 102 win . The Suns have now won five - straight games , as they are reeling headed into the All-Star break . This was a wire - to - wire win for the Rockets , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 35 minutes . The Rockets were unconscious from deep , as they hit 49 percent of their shots from the field , 80 percent from the free - throw line and 36 percent from three - point range . The bench differential was huge as well , with the Rockets bench scoring 50 points to the Suns 20 . The Rockets also dominated the rebounding , as they won that battle 55 - 42 . These teams are going in opposite directions right now and this result is indicative of the two teams recent play . Houston has the second - best defense in the NBA and they did a heck of a job today if slowing down a potent Suns attack . Alex Len was a beast down low , as he totaled 13 points , five rebounds and two blocks in the defeat . James Harden continued his torrid form , as he accumulated 40 points , six rebounds and eight assists in the win . Jared Len was the only other player who played well , as he amassed 13 points and nine rebounds in the defeat . Houston 's next game will be on Friday against the Utah Jazz in Salt Lake City .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 122 - 109 , at FedEx Forum on Monday . This looked like an easy win for Memphis on paper , but Brooklyn had other ideas with this shocking win . The Nets really took it to the Grizzlies in the fourth quarter , winning it , 34 - 18 . Shooting was key , with Brooklyn hitting 53 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range . Memphis only shot 44 percent from the field and 40 percent from three . The 12 steals and five blocks from Brooklyn was huge as well , as Memphis could only muster up seven steals and two blocks . The Nets ( 11 - 51 ) have easily turned into the worst team in the league and this win over a gritty Grizzlies bunch is a shocking one to say the least . Sean Kilpatrick led Brooklyn , as he provided 23 points , five rebounds and three assists off the bench . Jeremy Lin led the starters with 18 points and four rebounds . Caris LeVert and Randy Foye scored 14 points apiece in starting roles , while Brook Lopez totaled just eight points and four rebounds . On deck for the Nets is a road matchup with the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday . The Grizzlies ( 36 - 28 ) are now below .500 across their last 11 games , with this loss being the worst of the season . Mike Conley did all he could for Memphis , as he accumulated 32 points , three rebounds and six assists . Marc Gasol finished second on the team , collecting 18 points , six rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Zach Randolph was the only bench player in double figures , accruing 10 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Memphis will look to play better in their next game on Thursday against the Los Angeles Clippers .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 137 - 101 Wednesday at Talking Stick Resort Arena . It did n't take long for the Suns to grab ahold of this game , as they managed to open the game on a 27 - 8 run and never looked back . After winning the opening quarter by 17 points , Phoenix continued to pile it on and effectively ended the game by halftime . The Suns ' backcourt was efficient and dominant offensively in the victory , with Eric Bledsoe leading the way with a triple - double of 25 points , 13 assists and 10 rebounds . Devin Booker added 23 points of his own on 9 - of - 14 shooting from the field and 4 - of - 7 shooting from behind the arc . In the end , all 13 Phoenix players managed to score against a struggling Lakers ( 19 - 39 ) defense . Those Lakers have now dropped two games in a row and three of their last four following Wednesday 's embarrassing defeat that ended with the team shooting just 38 percent from the field . Lou Williams was one of the lone bright spots for Los Angeles , as he increased his trade value yet again with 21 points off the bench on 7 - of - 13 shooting from the field . D'Angelo Russell added 21 points of his own , but he shot a subpar 7 - of - 20 from the field Wednesday . With the loss , the Lakers sit just a half - game behind the Suns for the worst record in the West but remain nine games behind the Nets for the worst record in the NBA . The teams will now both head into the All-Star break , with both resuming play on Friday , Feb. 24 .
The Boston Celtics ( 21 - 19 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 13 - 28 ) 117 - 103 on Monday at the TD Garden in Phoenix . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 36 - 29 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 39 percent from the floor and just 37 percent from beyond the arc . Starting at point guard , Avery Bradley led the way , going 5 - for - 11 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 19 points , while also adding two rebounds and five assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 32 points and 10 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 13 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Avery Knight was the only other starter in double figures for points . He finished with 16 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt ) , four assists and two steals . While he did n't reach his season average of 14 points per game , it was still a very positive all - around effort . They only other player to reach double figures was Amir Johnson , who recorded 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and three rebounds in 28 minutes . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Suns will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 115 - 107 , at American Airlines Arena on Thursday . Even though Miami trailed by 19 at times in the second quarter , they rallied to pull out a much needed win . The third and fourth quarters is when Miami did their damage , as they outscored Los Angeles . 62 - 47 in that stretch . The Heat 's offense was efficient as ever , as they shot 54 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . Rebounding and assists were lopsided as well , as Miami won the rebounding , 47 - 40 and the assist differential , 25 - 18 . The Heat 's first lead did not come until there was a minute left in the third quarter . Los Angeles ( 11 - 21 ) is in their worst stretch of the season right now and they continue to falter against bad teams . Lou Williams was once again the best player for the Lakers , as he dropped 27 points off the bench . Nick Young led the starters in scoring , as he scored 20 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting . D'Angelo Russell had his bets game in weeks , accumulating 17 points , four rebounds and seven assists . On deck for Los Angeles is a road matchup against the Orlando Magic on Friday . Miami ( 10 - 20 ) have been playing better than results would show , so a win here is just what the doctor ordered . Justise Winslow was the Heat 's most valuable player , as he accrued 23 points , 13 rebounds and four steals in 42 minutes of action . Hassan Whiteside matched Winslow , as he provided 23 points and 13 rebounds of his own . Goran Dragic was the only other starter in double figures , as he collected 21 points and seven assists . Nick Young led all bench scorers with 20 points .

It was the Wizards ( 15 - 16 ) who got hot at the right time , however , as they outscored the Pacers ( 15 - 18 ) by a 26 - 31 margin during the period . That included a 10 - point outburst over a three - and - a - half - minute stretch , helping Washington build a lead they would n't relinquish the rest of the way . Paul George led the way with 34 points , three rebounds , four assists and a steal . Jeff Teague was right behind him with a 19 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included two rebounds and a steal . Bradley Beal was right behind with 19 points , six assists , two rebounds and one steal . Marcin Gortat posted a 13 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one steal . C.J . Miles ( 15 points , three rebounds ) and Markieff Morris ( 10 points , seven rebounds ) rounded out the bench 's stellar night . Myles Turner posted a 15 - point , eight - rebound double - double that also included four assists and three blocks . C.J . Miles led the bench with 15 points , and C.J . Miles led the bench with 15 points .

They also forced 18 turnovers from the Hawks , and held them to a 42 percent success rate from the field and 34 percent from three - point range . The Detroit Pistons ( 3 - 6 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 3 - 7 ) 96 - 89 on Sunday . The Thunder were letting the Thunder hang around in the first half , but pulled away after that , out - scoring the Thunder 64 - 49 in the second half . This was a domination in every fashion for the Pistons , as they recorded more assists , rebounds , blocks and steals than the Thunder . It was a relatively clean game played all - around though , as there were only 41 combined turnovers between the two teams . The key for Oklahoma City was their defense , as they held the Thunder to 40 percent shooting and forced them to commit 14 turnovers . The assisting margin was huge as well , with Detroit recording 18 assists to the Thunder 23 . The Thunder also shot well from long distance , as they went 18 - for - 36 in their win . The Thunder have been playing better ball recently , but this loss guaranteed that they 'd miss the playoffs yet again . Serge Ibaka was fantastic off the bench , as he double - doubled in a 19 - point , 10 - rebound performance . Jeremy Smith played well off the bench though , as he amassed 18 points , four rebounds , six assists and two steals in the loss . Greg Monroe also had a nice game off the bench , as he totaled 12 points , nine rebounds and five assists . The Pistons will look to get out of this slide on Wednesday against the Atlanta Hawks .

The Trail Blazers ( 34 - 38 ) came into Saturday 's contest trying to keep the pressure on eighth - seeded Denver , which they could come within one game of catching with a win against the Timberwolves ( 28 - 44 ) . Portland was able to take advantage of what was likely a tired Minnesota squad that had just given up 130 points on Friday night in an overtime loss to the Lakers . The dynamic duo of Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum once again led the way for the Blazers , which collectively shot an outstanding 63 percent from the floor and 50 percent from three - point range . Their offensive proficiency and 35 - 27 rebounding advantage helped them overcome 14 turnovers to cruise to a relatively comfortable home victory . The Timberwolves were led by Andrew Wiggins , who supplied 20 points , two assists and one steal . Kris Dunn led the bench with 17 points , four rebounds , one assist and two steals . Karl-Anthony Towns and Ricky Rubio followed with matching 16 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds and a block , and the latter registering four rebounds , four assists and one steal . Gorgui Dieng totaled 13 points , seven rebounds , two assists , four steals and two blocks . Shabazz Muhammad matched Dieng 's scoring total and added two rebounds off the bench . McCollum 's 32 points led the Blazers , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , four assists and one steal . Damian Lillard tallied 21 points , eight assists , six rebounds and three steals . Jusuf Nurkic provided a near double - double with 14 points , nine rebounds , four assists and a block . Allen Crabbe paced the second unit with 10 points , three boards and two blocks . Evan Turner and Al-Farouq Aminu were productive as reserves as well with matching eight - point efforts . The Timberwolves head to Indiana to tangle with the Pacers on Tuesday night , while the Trail Blazers head to Los Angeles to take on the Lakers on Sunday evening .
The Utah Jazz defeated the New York Knicks , 114 - 109 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday . The Jazz ( 4 - 3 ) braced themselves for an offensive void when they lost Gordon Hayward to a finger injury in preseason , as he was slated to miss a minimum of six weeks . However , the standout forward beat the recovery timetable by at least two weeks , starting at the three on Sunday for Utah . He looked as if he had n't missed a beat , rattling off a team - high 28 points , along with five rebounds . While he only found the net on six of his 17 field - goal attempts , he impressively drained all 14 of his shots from the free - throw line . His effort spearheaded a highly productive day for the Jazz offense that saw all five members of the first unit hit double - digit scoring and Utah produce a collective 51 percent success rate from the field . George Hill , who 's helped pick up a good bit of the offensive slack in Hayward 's absence , continued to thrive despite the latter 's return to the court , totaling 23 points , six rebounds , four assists and a steal . Rodney Hood was right behind with 18 points , six rebounds , five assists and a steal . Rudy Gobert and Derrick Favors turned in a pair of 13 - point efforts from the frontcourt , with the former also contributing eight rebounds , an assist , three blocks and a steal , and the latter supplying six boards . Joe Johnson , who headed to the bench with Hayward 's return , tallied 10 points to pace the bench . The Knicks ( 2 - 4 ) were co - led by a pair of 28 - point outputs for Carmelo Anthony and Kristaps Porzingis . Anthony also registered nine rebounds and three assists , while Porzingis supplied eight boards , an assist and two blocks . Derrick Rose continued his strong stretch of play to open his tenure in the Big Apple , totaling 18 points , eight assists , four rebounds and a steal . Courtney Lee was the fourth member of the starting five to hit double digits in the scoring column , posting 10 points , six boards and three steals . The Jazz continue their trek through the Northeast with a Monday night visit to Philadelphia to face the Sixers , while the Knicks remain home to tangle with the inter - city rival Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday evening .

The Warriors were heavy favorites headed into this matchup and they left no doubt who the better team was . The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 115 - 106 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday . It 's rare to see Memphis dominated in their home building , but that was just the case here in this near wire - to - wire win for LA . The Clippers actually led by 10 after the first quarter and never relinquished the lead from there . Shooting was the difference in the game , with the Clippers shooting 51 percent , while they held the Grizzlies to just 43 percent . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the two teams matching in turnovers , while LA won the assist battle , 23 - 30 . Defensive rebounding was dominant for the Clippers as well , as they snatched down 0 defensive boards to Los Angeles ' 45 . The Clippers ( 24 - 14 ) have been playing terribly recently , but a road win against the Grizzlies is just what the doctor ordered . Marc Gasol was easily the player of the game , as he tallied 23 points , four rebounds , six assists and two steals on 9 - of - 16 shooting . Mike Conley finished second on the team , collecting 17 points , five rebounds and two assists .

The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 42 - 19 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 40 - 20 ) 98 - 103 on Friday . The Clippers found out earlier in the day that superstar forward Blake Griffin will be sidelined for much longer than originally anticipated , but his problematic quadriceps tendon is n't the cause . Instead , it 's a broken right hand allegedly suffered during an altercation with a team employee in Toronto that will apparently keep him out 1 - 12 additional weeks . His continued absence keeps the spotlight squarely on Chris Paul , who has more often than not already served as the team 's scoring leader during the time Griffin has already missed . The All-Star point guard did not disappoint in that role Tuesday , scoring a team - high 24 points and adding a pair of rebounds , a steal and a block . They now head to Philadelphia to face off against the Sixers on Wednesday night .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Miami Heat , 91 - 82 , at Spectrum Center on Thursday . The refrain is a familiar one for the Hornets ( 19 - 14 ) , but does n't seem to get old : The dynamic duo of Kemba Walker and Nicolas Batum supply a significant portion of the offense , and the complementary pieces around them step up in support as needed . The hosts also played superior team defense , holding the Heat ( 10 - 23 ) to 40 percent shooting overall and inducing 16 turnovers . The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Chicago Bulls , 116 - 96 , at United Center on Wednesday . The dynamic duo of Giannis Antetokounmpo and Jabari Parker were at it again for the Bucks ( 16 - 16 ) , as they posted over half of the team 's scoring total while each played at least 40 minutes . Their combined 23 - of - 34 effort from the field spearheaded a red - hot Milwaukee offense that drained their buckets at a 57 percent clip , and that also was successful on 60 percent of their 15 attempts from behind the arc . Meanwhile , the Bulls ( 16 - 18 ) could only get one such standout effort , which came from Jimmy Butler . The offensive imbalance ultimately left them unable to keep pace as the game wore on , and accordingly , the Bucks outscored their hosts by a 67 - 45 margin in the second half . Antetokounmpo tallied a game - high 35 points , and added nine rebounds , eight assists , seven blocks and two steals in a remarkable performance . Parker followed with 27 points , five rebounds , three assists , a steal and a block . Malcolm Brogdon continued his rapid development , as he managed 15 points , 12 assists and 11 rebounds , his first career triple - double . Greg Monroe led the bench with 15 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and a pair of steals . Butler 's 26 points paved the way for Chicago , and he complemented them with eight assists , seven boards and two steals . Robin Lopez provided a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . Taj Gibson contributed 11 points , five rebounds , an assist and a block . Michael Carter-Williams , who drew the start for the struggling Rajon Rondo , and Dwyane Wade both struggled , as they only supplied four and eight points , respectively . Doug McDermott ( 13 points , three assists , a rebound and a steal ) and Nikola Mirotic ( 10 points , four rebounds ) helped make up for some of the scoring void off the bench . The Bucks head back home to host the Oklahoma City Thunder on Monday night , while the Bulls remain home to face the Charlotte Hornets on Monday evening as well .

The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 101 - 92 , at Target Center on Monday . The Timberwolves ( 12 - 26 ) put an end to a four - game losing streak with Monday 's victory , and it was thanks in large part to the monster performance put on by Karl-Anthony Towns . After scoring 20 points in the first quarter and outscoring the entire Mavericks ( 11 - 27 ) team by himself , Towns finished with a game - high 34 points , 11 rebounds , four assists and three blocks in 37 minutes . The big man 's night was made even easier with Ricky Rubio shining as a facilitator , notching a double - double of his own with 13 points and 15 assists on top of five rebounds and five steals . The two helped the Timberwolves lead wire - to - wire Thursday , as the team overall shot a very impressive 56 percent from the field . As for the Mavericks , the loss leaves them alone at the very bottom of the Western Conference , but the defeat did n't come without a pair of great performances from their stars in the frontcourt . Harrison Barnes led the way with a team - high 30 points , while veteran Dirk Nowtizki posted 26 points , five rebounds and four assists in 31 minutes . Unfortunately for Dallas , they failed to get any other significant contributions elsewhere , with the other 10 Mavericks players who played combining to score just 36 points . And while Dallas managed to shoot an impressive 46 percent from behind the arc , their inability to get to the free throw line ended up hurting them , as they shot just 7 - of - 9 from the charity stripe . Up next , the Timberwolves will stay home Wednesday to play the Rockets , while the Mavericks will head home to take on the Suns on Thursday .
