The Spurs came out firing in this game , out - scoring the Rockets 35 - 29 right away in the first quarter . The Spurs were the superior shooters , going 56 percent from the field and 52 percent from the three - point line , while the Rockets went 38 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs were able to force the Rockets into 15 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this game . The Spurs were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who posted his fourth double - double of the season . He finished with 25 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 7 - 7 FT ) and 10 rebounds , giving the Blazers the spark needed to secure the victory . James Harden did everything he could to keep the Rockets in this game , going 5 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 20 points . He also got to the free throw line nine times , converting on nine of those attempts . He 's now averaging 18 points and 12 rebounds on the year . Tony Parker was able to record 15 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and seven assists as well . His scoring has dipped lately , scoring under his average in four straight games , but it did n't matter Wednesday , as the Spurs still secured the victory . Tony Parker was able to contribute 15 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , three rebounds and seven assists as well . The Rockets ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Rockets will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .
The Detroit Pistons ( 11 - 9 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 7 - 13 ) 102 - 95 on Saturday . Detroit has won five straight games , and they 've vaulted themselves out of the early - season hole they were in , at one time standing with a sub - .500 record of 10 - 30 . Reggie Middleton led the way for the Bucks in the losing effort , scoring 21 points in 34 minutes . O.J . Mayo scored a team - high 23 points off the bench in 34 minutes and hit three three - pointers . The Bucks were lead by Greg Monroe , who put up 14 points and 13 rebounds in 33 minutes . As a team , the Bucks shot 45 percent from the field and 22 percent from beyond the arc . Detroit will go on the road to face the New York Knicks on Saturday . Milwaukee has lost their last two games , as they were navigating a murder 's row of the Clippers , Mavericks and Pistons . Reggie Jackson scored a game - high 23 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting in 33 minutes . Greg Monroe recorded a double - double , posting 14 points and 13 rebounds in 33 minutes . O.J . Mayo scored 13 points on 5 - of - 13 shooting in 34 minutes , while Stanley Johnson ( 10 ) and and Stanley Johnson ( 10 ) round out the five Milwaukee players who scored in double figures . Up next , the Pistons will travel to Indiana Wednesday to take on the Pacers , while the Bucks will head to Boston Friday to go up against the Celtics .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 2 - 1 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 1 - 2 ) 95 - 87 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . In a battle of two of the best teams in the NBA , the Celtics were able to pull off the victory in front of their home crowd . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 26 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went just 36 percent from the floor and a meager 21 percent from beyond the arc . To go along with the superior shooting , the Spurs also secured a 51 - 45 rebounding advantage over the Celtics , which may have been the difference in this one . The Spurs were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who posted his fourth double - double of the season . He finished with 24 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 8 - 10 FT ) and 14 rebounds , giving the Blazers the spark needed to secure the victory . Avery Bradley continued his strong play , as he went 7 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 17 points . It was a nice bounce back game for him after scoring only six points on Friday against the Miami Heat . The Celtics ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday , while the Celtics will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the host Minnesota Timberwolves 119 - 105 at Target Center on Saturday . These are two teams headed in opposite directions and this result shows just where they 're headed . The Clippers were in control for the majority of the game , as there were only four ties and six lead changes . Los Angeles actually led for the entirety of the second half , as Minnesota never led by more than two points in the first half . The Clippers shot lights - out hitting 53 percent fro the field and 46 percent from three - point range . Los Angeles also took advantage of the whistle , going 28 - of - 37 from the free - throw line , with Minnesota taking just 21 free - throw attempts . The Clippers ( 9 - 1 ) are the hottest team in the NBA right now and they used a different recipe to win this one . All five starters were great , as they each scored 15 or more points in the win . Blake Griffin led the team , totaling 20 points , 11 rebounds and four assists . JJ Redick was n't far behind , as he accumulated 19 points , four rebounds and eight assists . DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double , totaling 18 points , 16 rebounds and two blocks . Zach LaVine and Luc Mbah a Moute played well , as he scored 22 points a piece . Minnesota will look to play better on Friday , when they host the New York Knicks for their next game .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Washington Wizards , 120 - 112 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday evening . The Sixers ' first game after the All-Star break featured Dario Saric 's debut as the permanent starting power forward , and the 2014 first - round pick did not disappoint . Saric contributed a 20 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one steal . All five members of the Sixers ( 22 - 35 ) starting five posted double - digit scoring , and Philadelphia managed a 49 percent success rate from the floor in an explosive offensive showing overall . The impressive effort helped the home team overcome a spectacular 40 - point effort from the Wizards ' Bradley Beal . Beal added four rebounds , two assists and two steals to his game - high scoring total . John Wall was right behind with a 29 - point , 14 - assist double - double that also included eight boards and a pair of blocks . Markieff Morris was a distant third for the Wizards ( 34 - 22 ) , generating 14 points , seven rebounds and one steal . Marcin Gortat compiled an 11 - point , 11 - rebound double - double which also included one assist and one block . Robert Covington paced the Sixers with 25 points , 11 rebounds , three assists and four steals . Gerald Henderson tallied 20 points and five boards . Richaun Holmes , seeing an expanded role off the bench with the departures of Nerlens Noel and Ersan Ilyasova at the trade deadline , supplied 12 points , 10 rebounds , one assist , five blocks and two steals . Jahlik Okafor and Nik Stauskas produced matching 11 - point efforts , with the former adding two rebounds and two assists , and the latter registering three boards , one assist and one block . T.J. McConnell amassed 10 points , eight assists , four rebounds , two steals and one block . The Wizards head back home to tangle with the Utah Jazz on Sunday afternoon , while the Sixers head to New York to take on the Knicks on Saturday evening .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Chicago Bulls , 107 - 100 , at TD Garden on Friday evening . The Celtics ( 3 - 1 ) utilized a balanced attack and a solid shooting night to withstand a strong push from the Bulls ( 3 - 1 ) in the middle quarters . Boston emerged from the first period with a 36 - 36 lead after one quarter , a foundation that ultimately helped them hold on for the hard - fought win . Butler added 23 points , nine rebounds and two assists to lead the Celtics , while Butler supplemented his team - high scoring total with nine assists . Butler was right behind him with a 23 - point , 2 - assist double - double . He also added nine rebounds and three steals . Nikola Mirotic came off the bench to supply 17 points , six rebounds and an assist over 35 minutes . Isaiah Thomas paced the Celtics with 23 points , two assists , two rebounds and three steals . Dwyane Wade was next with 15 points , four assists , one rebound and two steals . Jae Crowder totaled 10 points , five rebounds , one assist and one block . Jae Crowder chipped in with 10 points , five boards and one assist . Rajon Rondo led the way for Boston with 23 points , two rebounds , two assists and one block . Nikola Mirotic registered 17 points , one assist and one rebound . Avery Bradley matched Rondo 's scoring total and added five assists , five rebounds and one steal . Tyler Zeller provided 11 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . Marcus Smart led the bench with seven points , five rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . The Celtics head back home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday night , while the Celtics remain home to face off with the Orlando Magic on Friday evening as well .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 104 - 101 , at Amway Center on Wednesday night . The Magic ( 6 - 6 ) embarked on their current road trip as losers of four in a row , and appeared like a team in disarray all the way around . However , they 've found a way to turn things around away from the confines of Amway Center , as they 've now managed to rattle off victories in four of their last five games , including three straight . Andrew Wiggins led the way offensively for the Magic , posting a team - high 28 points in just 38 minutes . Evan Fournier was next with 26 points , while Karl-Anthony Towns managed a near double - double with 21 points and 12 rebounds . The second - year guard was able to post a season - high 28 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , three assists and three steals . C.J . Fournier was next with 26 points , three assists , four rebounds and three steals . Tobias Harris was next with a bench - leading 14 points , which he complemented with three rebounds and two assists . Ricky Rubio followed with a eight - point , 12 - assist , 12 - rebound triple - double that also included one steal . Ricky Rubio went for eight points , 12 assists , 12 rebounds and one steal . Zach LaVine led the second unit with 14 points , three rebounds and one assist . Ricky Rubio managed eight points , two rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Nikola Vucevic had a near double - double with 8 points and eight rebounds , while Ricky Rubio had a modest eight points and had two assists , three rebounds and one steal . Shabazz Smith led the second unit with 14 points , three boards and three assists .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 26 - 11 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 8 - 30 ) 117 - 113 on Friday night . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled . Especially Los Angeles , as they shot 48 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . The fourth quarter is where the Thunder really turned it on , as they outscored the Lakers 27 to 28 . The Thunder actually dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 45 boards to the Lakers 34 . Los Angeles came into this game as a huge favorite and were lucky to escape with a win . Kevin Durant and Lou Williams carried the load for the Lakers tonight , as they led the team with 44 points scored . Kobe Bryant led the team in scoring , dropping 19 points on 8 - of - 20 shooting . Kobe Bryant also played well , as he accumulated 19 points , four rebounds and six assists . Steven Adams was the only other Laker in double figures , as he amassed 10 points , six rebounds and two blocks . The Lakers have a quick turnaround , as they play the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday in their next game . Los Angeles has been struggling recently , but they showed some great resiliency in this game against a talented Los Angeles team . Kevin Durant was a lone bright spot in the defeat , as he tallied 24 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals in the win . No other player scored more than 15 points , with Jordan Clarkson leading the starters with 17 points . The Lakers will look to play better on Wednesday in a road matchup against the Charlotte Hornets .
The Sacramento Kings ( 17 - 23 ) defeated the LA Clippers ( 26 - 14 ) in overtime for a 110 - 103 win on Wednesday . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled . Especially LA , as they shot 40 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . The fourth quarter is where the Kings really turned it on , as they outscored the Clippers 28 to 24 . The Kings actually dominated the rebounding , as they brought down 46 boards to the Clippers 46 . The Clippers have been playing competitively lately , but this was not one of those games . This sort of win exemplifies which directions these franchises are going right now and we should give more credit to Sacramento rather than belittling the Clippers . The biggest difference in the game was the passing , as the Kings accumulated 28 assists compared to the Clippers 24 . The Clippers came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but couldnt muster up enough late to pull out the road win . The bench was the only reason they played so well , as they scored 41 bench points to go along with an impressive 46 rebounds . The Clippers have been playing better ball recently , but this loss guaranteed that they 'd miss the playoffs yet again . DeMarcus Cousins did all he could to keep the Clippers hanging around , as he scored a game - high 19 points , along with 10 rebounds and two assists . Rajon Rondo flirted with a triple - double , as he accumulated 13 points , seven rebounds and 10 assists . They 'll look to keep up this good form against the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday in their next matchup .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 39 - 36 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 29 - 45 ) 105 - 93 on Wednesday at the Air Canade Centre in Sacramento . This win marks the third in a row for the Blazers , as they currently sit as the third projected playoff seed in the Western Conference standings , just one game back from the Grizzlies and one game ahead of the Rockets . The Kings , on the other hand , have now lost four in a row and currently remain just two and a half games ahead of the Miami Heat for the fifth spot in the West . The Blazers were the superior shooters in this one , going 48 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings shot just 42 percent from the floor and 47 percent from beyond the arc . For the Kings , Omri Casspi was very efficient , going 6 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding six rebounds and a steal . It was his second straight double - double and fourth in the last five games , as he continues to be a force this season . McCollum on the other hand shot 5 - for - 13 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding three assists . He 's now averaging 12 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The Blazers ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Kings will go on the road to Washington to play the Wizards on Wednesday .

The Bucks also forced the Trail Blazers into 15 turnovers , while committing only 10 of their own , helping push their winning streak to ten in a row . Both Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum did everything they could to keep the Trail Blazers in this game . Parker went 9 - for - 23 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 27 points , while also handing out six assists . He was able to get to the free throw line nine times and converted on all seven attempts . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice surprise for the Bucks , as he 's averaging only 15 points per game so far this season . Giannis Antetokounmpo continued his strong play , as he went 4 - for - 11 from the field and 0 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 15 points , while adding 12 rebounds and four blocked shots as well . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 48 points and 25 rebounds over his last two games . The Timberwolves were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons went 47 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Timberwolves were also able to force the Pistons into 27 turnovers , while committing only 15 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The nine assists matched a season - high for him , while it was also his third double - double in his last four games . The Indiana Pacers ( 27 - 22 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 9 - 41 ) 106 - 97 on Monday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Nets got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Nets 27 - 16 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Pacers used their three - point shooting to grab an advantage , going 40 percent from deep , while the Nets went just 39 percent from the floor . The Nets did n't take care of the basketball though , as they forced the Nets into 19 turnovers , while committing just 14 of their own . The Pacers ' frontcourt was dominant in this matchup . Brook Lopez led the way , going 9 - for - 18 from the field and 5 - for - 5 from the free throw line to score 23 points , while also adding six rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 50 points and 30 rebounds over his last two games . Sean Kilpatrick was the leading scorer off the bench with 18 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) in 26 minutes off the bench . He had just four points on Sunday , so it was good to see him get back on track . Thaddeus Young also played well , scoring 11 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds and three steals . The Nets ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Nets will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 102 - 92 , at FedEx Forum on Friday . Despite this game being close throughout the first quarter , the Pacers dominated the rest of the way . The second and third quarters were especially decisive , outscoring the Grizzlies 64 - 42 in that 24 - minute stretch . Free-throw shooting really killed Memphis , as they went just 13 - of - 23 , while the Pacers went a perfect 11 - of - 11 . Indiana also dominated the shooting , hitting 51 percent of their shots , while holding Memphis to 41 percent . The Pacers also won the rebounding differential , 50 - 39 . The Grizzlies ( 34 - 25 ) have now lost three of their last four games , as this was not how they wanted to start their stretch run . Despite playing just 15 minutes off the bench , Troy Daniels led the team with 13 points . Marc Gasol led the starters , as he accumulated 12 points , four rebounds and four assists . Mike Conley finished with 10 points , five rebounds and seven assists . Tony Allen accrued 11 points , seven rebounds and five steals . On deck for the Grizzlies is a road matchup with the Denver Nuggets on Sunday . The Pacers ( 30 - 28 ) had lost six - straight headed into this matchup , so a blowout win is just what the doctor ordered . C.J . Miles led Indiana in scoring , as he dropped 17 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting . Jeff Teague went just 2 - of - 8 from the field , but totaled 11 points and 10 assists en route to a double - double . Monta Ellis was a nice spark off the bench , providing 16 points and three assists . The Pacers will be in action again on Saturday against the Miami Heat .
The Miami Heat defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 116 - 93 , at American Airlines Arena on Tuesday . This appeared like an easy Atlanta win on paper , but Miami had other ideas with this impressive performance . A 80 - 33 lead in the fourth quarter was the decisive stretch for the Heat , as that gave Miami their largest lead of the game . It was tight throughout though , as there were 11 ties and 15 lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 10 points . Rebounding was the difference in the game , with Miami winning that battle , 47 - 43 . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 14 more assists and committing three less turnovers . Goran Dragic led the Hawks in scoring , as he tallied 27 points and five assists . Dion Waiters finished second on the team , totaling 20 points and seven rebounds . Hassan Whiteside recorded a double - double , totaling 18 points , 18 rebounds and two blocks . Kent Bazemore led Atlanta off the bench , providing 14 points and four assists . The Hawks will play the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday for their next game . The Hawks ( 28 - 21 ) have been dominant at home this season , as this marks their 17th win at Verizon Center . Goran Dragic led the team in scoring , as he dropped 27 points , along with five rebounds and five assists . Hassan Whiteside totaled 18 points and 18 rebounds . James Johnson was huge off the bench , collecting 16 points , six assists , two steals and three blocks .

The Miami Heat defeated the host Utah Jazz on Thursday , 111 - 110 . It was a much - needed and narrow win for Miami ( 7 - 12 ) , as the team had been sitting at 13th in the Eastern Conference . Thursday 's win came in dramatic fashion , with the game remaining a matter of single digits until the very end . It was an off night for center Hassan Whiteside , who shot just 4 - of - 11 for nine points , but it was a strong showing for recently - returned point guard Goran Dragic . Dragic led the team with 27 points and had six assists on the night . The Heat have seen strong bench play recently , as was the case on Thursday . Bench forward James Johnson delivered 24 points on 11 - of - 15 shooting , while bench guard Wayne Ellington had 17 points on 6 - of - 9 . The Heat ( 11 - 9 ) , meanwhile , had won four straight contests heading into Thursday , but have been decimated by injuries . Star forward Justise Winslow was the lone bright spot for the Jazz , leading the team with 24 points and six rebounds . Bench guard Joe Johnson also had 18 points and shot just 6 - of - 9 . Big man Hassan Whiteside , meanwhile , continued to expand upon his league leading double - double total , recording 24 points and six rebounds in the win . The Heat will host the Trail Blazers on Tuesday , while the Heat will visit Atlanta to play the Hawks .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 110 - 106 , at TD Garden on Friday . Facing a Sixers ( 9 - 25 ) squad that had only tallied three road wins in 13 tries coming in , it may have been hard to blame the Celtics ( 22 - 14 ) if they were guilty of a little overconfidence Friday . A 39 - point second period by Philadelphia was therefore likely a rather sobering wake - up call , as was the 62 - 51 halftime deficit Boston found itself in . The Celtics were mostly a different team in the second half , as they outscored their visitors by a 59 - 44 margin over the final 24 minutes . However , the game was n't truly decided until the closing seconds , with Al Horford 's go - ahead three - pointer with 17 remaining and two key free throws by Isaiah Thomas with two seconds on the clock finally sealing the hard - fought home win . Philadelphia was led by Joel Embiid 's 23 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , three assists and two blocks . However , he battled foul trouble in the second half , and ultimately was charged with his sixth infraction with six seconds remaining . Ersan Ilyasova went for 20 points , three assists , two rebounds , two steals and two blocks , but missed a couple of key three - point attempts late with the Sixers trailing . T.J. McConnell was outstanding setting up his teammates for scoring opportunities , compiling 17 assists and supplementing them with nine points , four boards and a pair of steals . Robert Covington produced nine points , while Gerald Henderson led the second unit with 18 points , four rebounds , an assist and a block . Nerlens Noel was productive in a reserve role as well , registering 13 points , eight rebounds , two assists , three steals and three blocks . Joel Embiid continued his stretch of excellent early - season play , posting a season - high 23 points and adding eight rebounds , three assists and two blocks over 26 minutes . Ilyasova amassed a double - double of 19 points and nine assists , while Marcus Smart paced the bench with 18 points , four rebounds and an assist . The Sixers remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Monday night .

The Orlando Magic ( 17 - 39 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 10 - 43 ) 89 - 83 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in New York . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Magic did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 36 percent compared to the Knicks , who went 33 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Knicks into 12 turnovers , while committing just 16 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Nikola Vucevic had his way with the Sixers ' bigs . He went 12 - of - 20 from the field to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding 18 rebounds in 37 minutes . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 12 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 16 points and 11 rebounds on the year . Victor Oladipo was another player with a solid showing . He did n't have his best shooting performance on the season ( 4 - 11 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 11 - 11 FT ) , but he still finished with 19 points , as he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 43 points , six rebounds and five assists . Rookie Elfrid Payton nearly notched a triple - double , as he recorded 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) , five rebounds and four assists . He 's been filling up the stat sheet lately , combining for 20 points , 13 rebounds and 18 assists over his last two games . Willie Green had a big game off the bench with 13 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and two steals in 36 minutes . Jason Smith had to leave the game with an apparent left knee injury after playing only nine minutes . The severity of the injury is still unknown . The Magic 's next game will be at home against the Utah Jazz on Wednesday , while the Knicks will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .
The Chicago Bulls had an impressive game plan in containing Russell Westbrook , as the Thunder point guard fell far short of his triple - double average after finishing with 28 points , eight assists and five rebounds in 29 minutes of action on Wednesday . The Bulls victory came on the back of six players finishing in double figures scoring . Jimmy Butler led the way with 28 points , to go with four rebounds , five assists and three steals on 11 - of - 17 shooting . Dwyane Wade added 18 points , seven rebounds and seven assists in 24 minutes . Victor Oladipo aided Westbrook in double figures with 12 points alongside five rebounds and one steal , but the starters were simply not able to find a rhythm as a unit . Chris Paul had a banter day , as he dished out a career - high seven assists , while finished with 30 points , seven rebounds and seven assists . Chris Paul led the team in scoring , tallying 30 points , three rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Richaun Holmes finished second on the team , totaling 24 points and nine rebounds . Blake Griffin provided 15 points , 10 rebounds , six assists and three steals .
The Miami Heat ( 8 - 4 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 0 - 14 ) 96 - 91 on Friday . Dwyane Wade was questionable before the contest Thursday with a migraine , yet shook off the ailment to tie his season high in points with 27 and lead Miami to a road victory over the improving 76ers . Wade also posted a season - best field goal percentage , shooting 47 percent ( 8 - for - 17 ) , including a three - pointer . The veteran All-Star has scored 28 points or higher in all five games so far in 2015 . The Heat rebounded from a tough home loss Wednesday versus the Hawks and guard Gerald Greens off - field troubles to put together a well - balanced offensive attack against Philadelphia . All five Miami starters scored in double figures , with Isaiah Canaan ( 22 points ) and Chris Bosh ( 13 points ) supporting Wades performance with strong outings of their own . Hassan Whiteside came a rebound short of a second consecutive double - double in his battle with rookie sensation Hassan Whiteside . The Heat improved their record to 8 - 4 and currently reside in third place in the Eastern Conferences Southeastern Division . Miami heads to Indiana to face off against the Pacers on Friday . Minnesotas starters were largely stymied by their Miami counterparts . Of the starting five , only Luol Deng managed double - digit scoring with 11 points , two rebounds , four assists and a steal . Despite being down 51 - 46 at halftime , the Warriors were able to out - score the Pelicans 16 - 16 in the first quarter to secure the four - point victory on the road . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 30 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans finished at 38 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from deep . The Warriors were led by their superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson , as they were the only players on the team to reach double figures in points . Davis finished with 26 points ( 9 - 22 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) and 11 rebounds , giving him his fifth double - double in the last six games . He 's now averaging 22 points and 12 rebounds on the season . Curry on the other hand went 4 - for - 21 from the field and 3 - for - 9 from beyond the arc to score 22 points . He 's now averaging 23 points and 9 assists on the season . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Tyreke Evans , who contributed 16 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 7 - 12 FT ) and seven rebounds . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Pelicans will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .

The Trail Blazers played this game without a suspended Isaiah Kidd and they simply did n't have enough to stop this potent attack in this blowout loss . Dwyane Wade was the player of the game , as he tallied 34 points , four rebounds and three assists . Nikola Mirotic also played well , as he totaled 18 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Mason Plumlee also had a nice game , as he totaled 10 points and seven rebounds . On deck for the Bulls is a matchup with the Sacramento Kings on Thursday . The Bulls are extremely shorthanded right now , so this was a true team win . Damian Lillard was spectacular , as he amassed 30 points , seven assists and three steals . C.J . McCollum finished with 24 points , two rebounds and five assists . Allen Crabbe came off the bench to provide 17 points , five rebounds and two assists . On deck for the Bulls is a home matchup against the San Antonio Spurs on Saturday .

He 's now averaging 15 points and 6 rebounds on the year . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Wizards did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 42 percent compared to the Magic , who went 47 percent from the floor and only 47 percent from beyond the arc . Frontcourt depth was one of the biggest concerns for the Celtics heading into their 2016 - 14 season . And while for the most part , the play behind starer Cody Zeller has been inconsistent at best , Kelly Olynyk is showing that he can be a legitimate reserve option for Boston with his play over the last three games . In Monday 's outing , Olynyk played 26 minutes off the bench and scored 15 points on 6 - of - 9 shooting from the field to go along with nine rebounds . Now , over the course of Boston 's current three - game win streak , Olynyk has averaged 27 points and 9 rebounds over 26 minutes per game while shooting an impressive 6 - of - 12 ( 20 percent ) from behind the arc and 15 - of - 34 ( 63 percent ) from the field overall . There have been trade rumors brewing all season surrounding Boston and another big man , but Olynyk is doing his best to put those to rest . The Hornets ' next game is on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Hornets will stay at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday . The Hornets ( 20 - 21 ) had lost seven of six headed into this matchup , so a near wire - to - wire win is all they could ask for . Kelly Olynyk was huge off the bench , providing 15 points and nine rebounds , in just 26 minutes of action .

It 's rare to see a team win a game when your turnovers and assists are nearly identical , but that was the case here . The Suns were also able to force the Hornets into 16 turnovers , while committing only 18 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Kemba Walker had a solid game as well . He went 10 - for - 24 from the field and 3 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 26 points , while also adding eight assists and two steals . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to have the hot hand . Booker on the other hand went 3 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 15 points . He also had six rebounds and nine assists , as he continues to be an absolute animal on the boards . Devin Booker had a strong showing of his own , scoring 15 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and grabbing nine rebounds . He 's now averaging 17 points and 11 rebounds on the year . The other two starters , T.J. Warren and Nicolas Batum finished in double figures as well . Warren finished with 17 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt ) and one assist , while Barbosa finished with 16 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and had four rebounds off the bench . The Suns ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Hornets will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 40 - 7 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 30 - 18 ) 144 - 98 on Wednesday . The Warriors continued to pursue perfection on their home court and keep the NBA record for most wins in the regular season alive and well after holding off the Clippers . A series of strong runs to end each of the second , third and fourth quarters made up for a motivated LA team . Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson managed to drain two key free throws before outscoring Golden State 27 - 41 in the final period . Curry went on to finish with 43 points , nine rebounds and six assists on 15 - of - 23 shooting , while Durant led the way in scoring with 23 points , to go along with four rebounds and seven assists . Next up , the Warriors play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Los Angeles Lakers on Thursday , while the Warriors host the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday . The Clippers play without Blake Griffin and Blake Griffin for the first time this season . The Clippers ( 30 - 18 ) were once again led by their fearless Steph Curry who had 43 points , four rebounds and seven assists on 9 - of - 14 shooting in 29 minutes . Blake Griffin added 20 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal , while Klay Thompson added 16 points , one assist and one steal . The Clippers will look to build off this win when they take on the Rockets in Los Angeles on Saturday .

The Wizards were unsuccessful in their bid to garner a playoff spot , but entered Sunday trying to finish the season off on a positive note . Ramon Sessions was in the starting five again in Wall 's stead , and acquitted himself well once more . He contributed a 19 - point , seven - assist double - double , and added four rebounds and a block . The bench was also highly productive , contributing 65 points on the night . The Sixers were led by Ramon Sessions 's 17 points off the bench , which he supplemented with four rebounds , an assist and a block . Ramon Sessions supplied 17 points , one rebound and an assist over 21 minutes , while Thomas pitched in with 12 points , two rebounds , two assists and a block . Kris Humphries paced the bench with 12 points , seven boards and a block . The 76ers are currently in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and are slotted in the sixth seed in the conference . They head to Miami to take on the Heat on Wednesday night . Washington was spearheaded by Robert Covington 's 27 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds , an assist and two steals . Bradley Beal registered 21 points , three assists , three rebounds and a steal . Marcin Gortat was next with a 18 - point , seven - rebound double - double that also included six assists and four blocks . Kevin Pierce pitched in with 12 points , three rebounds , three assists and a block . The Sixers remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 're home again on Friday night to face off with the New York Knicks .
The LA Clippers ( 34 - 17 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 29 - 23 ) 100 - 93 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Miami . The Clippers got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Heat 15 - 19 in the first quarter alone . The Heat were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Heat went 40 percent from the floor and a meager 41 percent from beyond the arc . The Clippers were led by the duo of Chris Paul and Jamal Crawford . Paul went an impressive 8 - for - 19 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also adding seven assists . He 's been on a hot stretch of late , averaging 24 points and five assists over his last three games . DeMare Deng was the only other starter to score in double figures , as he finished with 15 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and eight rebounds . The Heat ' next game will be on the road against the Orlando Magic on Friday , while the Heat will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Wednesday . magic will have a new matchup , before but they 'll be ready to Orlando to take on the surging Golden State Warriors on Thursday . This one is one of the best games of the year for the Heat , as five different players scored in double figures . Chris Paul led the team with 22 points and also dished out seven assists in yet another great performance . Jamal Crawford was huge off the bench , as he scored 20 points and grabbing a season - high six steals . Hassan Whiteside double - doubled in a revenge game , as he recorded 10 points and 10 rebounds . Goran Dragic also had a nice game , as he tallied 17 points , five assists and five rebounds in the defeat . Up next for the Heat is a rivalry game against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .

Injuries can be blamed for the depth of the Suns ' struggles this season , but they were never considered a team with much of a shot at a playoff spot in the stacked Western Conference . An argument could be made that the injuries the Suns continue to suffer are a blessing in disguise considering that it 's forcing the team to give their young talent run against top - flight teams . Brandon Knight scored a team - high 22 points , but his team shot just 44 percent from the field . While Roses replacement , Matt Barnes , was held scoreless in 26 minutes . The Grizzlies will go on the road to face the Los Angeles Clippers on Sunday . Phoenix has lost two straight games . They shot just 44 percent from the field and 29 percent from beyond the arc , while also giving up 24 easy points on 18 turnovers Tuesday , essentially giving away the game . The Denver Nuggets ( 25 - 30 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 46 - 9 ) 132 - 110 on Monday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets got off to a quick start Wednesday , out - scoring the Nuggets 42 - 42 right away in the first quarter . The Nuggets made a run in the fourth quarter though , out - scoring the Nuggets 25 - 25 , but their comeback came up just short and the Nuggets were able to secure a surprising victory in front of their home crowd . Denver shot very well in this game , going 55 percent from the field and 59 percent from the three - point line , while the Warriors shot 49 percent from the floor and just 25 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Kevin Durant backed his words up , as he finished with a game - high of 25 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , to go along with four rebounds and five assists . It marked his third double - double over his last four games , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points and 24 rebounds . Jokic , on the other hand , recorded 17 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) of his own , to go along with 21 rebounds and two blocked shots . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 37 points and 24 rebounds . He 's now pushed his season averages to 9 points and 9 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Ian Clark added 18 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) and one assist , while Jamal Murray chipped in with 14 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and one rebound . Stephen Curry had the most success for the Nuggets . He went 4 - for - 18 from the field and 1 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score 11 points , while also adding five assists . He 's now averaging 9 points per game on the year . Despite struggling with his shot , Stephen Curry had only 11 points ( 4 - 18 FG , 1 - 11 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 27 minutes . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Nuggets will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host Cleveland Cavaliers , 110 - 106 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Saturday . Cleveland had one of their best performances of the season here , as they pulled out a near wire - to - wire win over the champs . In fact , they held the lead for the final 38 minutes , as Cleveland never led by more than two points . The Hawks offense was unstoppable , as they shot 51 percent from the field and 38 percent from long distance . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Atlanta winning that battle , 50 - 39 . The Cavaliers ( 6 - 1 ) have now won six of their last eight games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Kent Bazemore led the team in scoring , as he dropped 25 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting . Paul Millsap was the only other starter with more than seven points , as he totaled 21 points and five rebounds . Dennis Schroeder led the Cavaliers in scoring , as he accrued 28 points and six assists . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double , amassing 7 points , 17 rebounds and three blocks . Channing Frye was the only other Cleveland player in double figures , accumulating 13 points , seven rebounds and four assists . On deck for Cleveland is a road matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Wednesday . The Cavaliers ( 6 - 1 ) had their first primetime game in awhile and they did n't disappoint . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double , amassing 7 points , 17 rebounds and three blocks . Channing Frye led the bench with 13 points , seven rebounds and five assists .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 121 - 102 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Saturday . Detroit was expected to win this game easily , but it took a late run for them to prevail . In fact , the Pistons went on a 29 - 14 run in a 19 - minute span between the third and fourth quarters to overcome a 14 - point deficit and eventually pull away . The game was relatively close up to that point though , as there were six lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 14 points until the final six minutes . Los Angeles really struggled with their shots , as they went just 43 percent from the field , 26 percent from three - point range and 85 percent from the free - throw line . The Pistons also dominated the rebounding , winning that differential , 52 - 41 . Andre Drummond did his best to keep the Lakers hanging around , as he tallied 24 points , six rebounds and four steals in the victory . Lou Williams was a huge spark off the bench , dropping 17 points on 4 - of - 10 shooting . Detroit will host the New York Knicks on Tuesday for their next game . The Pistons ( 25 - 28 ) are battling for the eight - seed in the west and this win was much needed against some poor competition . Kentavious Ingram accrued 9 points , four rebounds and five assists .

The Washington Wizards defeated the Toronto Raptors , 105 - 96 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday evening . The Raptors ( 36 - 25 ) have put up valiant efforts thus far in the absence of All-Star point guard Kyle Lowry , with DeMar DeRozan particularly taking on an elevated role . However , when quality opponents come calling , the void felt by the absence of a player of Lowry 's caliber eventually rears its ugly head . Such was the case Wednesday , as the Wizards ( 36 - 23 ) leveraged superb efforts from trade - deadline acquisition Bojan Bogdanovic and trusted shooting guard Bradley Beal to pull out the tough road win . The pair combined for nearly half of Toronto 's point total , and the visitors made a game - changing statement in the second quarter by outscoring their hosts by a whopping 26 - 8 in the first 5:54 of the period . On the defensive end , the Wizards stymied Toronto to the tune of sub - 40 percent success rates from both the field and three - point range overall . Bogdanovic paced the Raptors overall with 27 points , his best scoring haul since donning his new team 's uniform . His effort included a sensational 6 - for - 7 tally from behind the arc . Beal followed with 23 points , three assists , one rebound , two steals and one block . Markieff Morris was next with a productive stat line of 13 points , eight rebounds and five assists . John Wall generated a 12 - point , 13 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds and one block . Marcin Gortat matched Wall 's scoring total and added eight boards and one assist . Otto Porter , Jr. surprisingly went scoreless over 19 minutes , contributing only three rebounds and one steal . Bogdanovic 's aforementioned hot hand combined with Porter 's struggles allowed the former ample playing time . As customary , DeMar DeRozan led Toronto , totaling 24 points , three rebounds and two assists . Serge Ibaka , whose offensive presence has been especially valued in the wake of Lowry 's injury , provided 22 points , 12 rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Norman Powell was next with a bench - leading 17 points , which he supplemented two boards and two assists . Cory Joseph provided 11 points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal . Jonas Valanciunas mustered a modest seven points but did haul in 11 boards and dish out one assist . The two teams now head back to the Nation 's Capital for the second game of the home - and - home series , which unfolds on Friday night .
The Boston Celtics ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 0 - 1 ) 121 - 105 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Nets were able to use a strong second half , where they out - scored the Nets 32 - 18 to seal the victory on the road . The Celtics were the superior shooters in this one , going 56 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Nets went 49 percent from the floor and just 37 percent from beyond the arc . The Celtics were also able to force the Nets into 20 turnovers , while committing only 12 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The Celtics were led by Mirza Teletovic , who went 8 - for - 11 from the field and 4 - for - 0 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 20 points , while also adding six rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's had a very strong stretch of three games , where he 's averaging 19 points and 6 rebounds . Rondo , on the other hand , finished with 19 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 0 - 4 FT ) , six rebounds and eight assists in 30 minutes . He 's now averaging 20 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists on the year . Coming off the bench , Kelly Olynyk had 19 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and six rebounds in 29 minutes . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Nets will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 123 - 114 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday . The Raptors ( 18 - 7 ) came in to Wednesday hoping to extend their recent stellar run in rather comfortable fashion against what would have seemed like an overmatched Sixers squad . However , Philadelphia ( 6 - 19 ) came ready to defend their home court , and rolled out Joel Embiid and Jahlil Okafor together as starters for the first time this season . While both big men played relatively well , it was Robert Covington who exploded for a season - high 26 points , which he complemented with 12 rebounds and two assists . However , the dynamic duo of Kyle Lowry and DeMar DeRozan put on their usual impressive show for the Raptors , helping them overcome one of the Sixers ' stronger offensive performances to date on the season . Philadelphia actually outpaced their visitors from the field by a 50 percent to 47 percent margin , and saw four of the five members of their first unit hit double digits in the scoring column . DeRozan led the way for Toronto with 31 points , five boards and three assists . Lowry was next with 20 points , seven assists and four rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas contributed a 17 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also featured an assist , two steals and a block . DeMarre Carroll supplied 10 points , three boards , an assist and a steal , while Terrence Ross and Cory Joseph tallied a pair of 13 - point efforts to lead the bench . Okafor was second behind Covington with 17 points , four rebounds , three assists and a pair of blocks . Sergio Rodriguez and Gerald Henderson put forth a pair of 16 - point efforts , with the former adding five assists and a rebound and the latter also posting two assists and a steal . Embiid had a quiet night by his standards , registering nine points , six rebounds , five assists , two blocks and a steal . Ersan Ilyasova , who moved back to the bench with Okafor 's insertion into the starting lineup at power forward , went for 12 points , seven rebounds and an assist to lead the bench . The Raptors head back home to face off with the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday night , while the Sixers remain home to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday evening as well .

The Bucks are now just a half - game behind the Heat for the fourth seed in the Eastern Conference , so they 'll head home to face the Miami Heat on Monday . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Bucks will go on the road to Boston to play the Celtics on Wednesday . They were wading through one of the more difficult stretches of their schedule , so the prolonged losing streak was n't entirely surprising , and neither was the fact that they were able to snap their losing streak against the Hornets . Indiana 's defense is nothing to write home about , but the Hornets shot just 33 percent from the field and were out - rebounded 42 - 46 , the Hornets were able to out - rebound the Hornets 42 - 46 . The Pacers are currently on the outside looking in at the Eastern Conference playoff picture . They 're playing better than any expert expected , and that 's why Friday 's drubbing at the hands of the Pacers was more of a surprise than it would have been in the past . They 'll host the Toronto Raptors on Saturday . Charlotte has lost six of their last eight games , and the bleakness will be hard for them to overcome anytime soon as they 're currently trudging through a difficult part of their schedule . Charlotte will have a quick turnaround as they travel to Orlando to take on the Magic on Friday .

The game came down to starkly contrasting third and fourth quarters , with the Raptors ( 33 - 24 ) catching fire at the right time and making a memorable comeback for the victory . Toronto got things off on the right foot , building a 31 - 20 lead after one quarter . However , the Raptors ( 33 - 24 ) regrouped at halftime and came out firing in the third , outscoring their hosts by a 14 - 31 margin during the period . However , Frank Kaminsky 's career - high 27 points led the Raptors ( 27 - 24 ) , which he complemented with five rebounds , three assists , a steal and a block . Kaminsky was next with 27 points , five rebounds , three assists and a steal . Kyle Lowry followed with 21 points , six assists , six rebounds and one steal . The New York Knicks ( 4 - 10 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 0 - 13 ) 91 - 83 on Wednesday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . This was a battle of current Eastern Conference bottom feeders , as both teams came in looking for their first victory of the 2014 - 31 season . In a sloppy game , both teams committed over 18 turnovers , but the Knicks were able to secure the victory after out - rebounding the Sixers 40 to 36 . The 76ers had little trouble shooting the ball , going 50 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Sixers shot 40 percent from the field and only 31 percent from beyond the arc . The Knicks were led by the duo of Carmelo Anthony and Carmelo Anthony . Anthony went 10 - for - 20 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also adding seven rebounds and a steal . He 's been a force over his last two games , combining for 50 points , 6 rebounds and 9 assists over that span . Nerlens Noel was able to notch his fourth double - double of the season , finishing with 17 points and 12 rebounds . He 's now averaging 18 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Amar'e Stoudemire chipped in with 14 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and four rebounds . The Knicks ' next game will be on the road against the Indiana Pacers on Friday , while the 76ers will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .

DeMarcus Cousins ' struggles in Tuesday 's game against the Kings were , in general terms , uncharacteristic of the All-Star center . However , when looking at Cousins ' history following a huge performance , it ends up not being too out of character . Cousins followed up Monday 's monster 46 - point , 13 - rebound performance with a bit of a dud , as he shot just 10 - of - 20 ( 28 percent ) from the field en route to scoring just 30 points . Going back as far as last season , in his last five games where he scored at least 50 points , Cousins followed up with a poor shooting performance the next game . Cousins never shot over 38 percent from the field in any of those five followups and shot as low as 15 percent in one of the outings . Overall , in those five games coming off a 46 - point performance , Cousins shot just 4 - of - 6 from behind the arc and finished with 12 points in just 27 minutes . The 12 - year veteran added four rebounds and two assists on 1 - of - 7 shooting in the shooting effort . The 12 rebounds were a season - high for Lawson , as he dominated the rebounding and play well . The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 33 - 12 ) routed the Detroit Pistons ( 25 - 22 ) 114 - 106 on Tuesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Pistons led by nine at the half , but the Cavaliers doubled them up in the third quarter 30 - 20 to take the advantage . Detroit was stuck on 78 points for just five minutes in the fourth quarter as Cleveland began to salt the game away . These two teams will wrap up their season series on April 13th in Cleveland . Cleveland had its first truly competitive game since the All-Star break , but still managed to win by nine points . LeBron James had another strong outing with 20 points , eight assists , and nine rebounds , but also had seven turnovers . Anthony Tolliver had a nice game off the bench , shooting 6 - of - 10 from the field and scoring 2 - of - 3 from the free - throw line to finish with 15 points , four rebounds and five assists . Reggie Jackson struggled with his shot as well , going 6 - of - 16 from the field and 0 - of - 3 from behind the arc and finished with five points . Reggie Jackson nearly recorded a triple - double , compiling 15 points , six assists and 2 rebounds . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope gave the team a nice spark off the bench with 19 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) , two rebounds , two assists and one steal in 30 minutes . The Cavaliers are off until Sunday when they host the Magic .
The Washington Wizards ( 24 - 20 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 23 - 22 ) 109 - 99 on Friday night . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled . Especially Charlotte , as they shot 39 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . The fourth quarter is where the Wizards really turned it on , as they outscored the Hornets 29 to 25 . The Hornets actually dominated the rebounding , as they brought down 43 boards to the Hornets 43 . The Hornets also shot well from long distance , as they went 18 - for - 32 in their win . The Hornets have been playing better ball recently , but this loss guaranteed that they 'd miss the playoffs yet again . Markieff Morris was the player of the game , as he tallied 23 points and eight rebounds off the bench . Otto Porter also had one of his best games of the season , as he tallied 14 points and 12 rebounds . Marco Belinelli also had an impressive game off the bench , scoring a season - high 18 points . There were many instances throughout the game where the fans were booing their home team and that 's a sad indication of where this franchise is right now . They 'll look to keep up this good form against the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday . This is a downright bad loss for the Hornets and they continue to fall deeper and deeper out of the playoffs . Kemba Walker led the team with 24 points and also dished out seven assists in yet another great performance . Bradley Beal scored 18 of his own and continues to re - emerge since his return from a pelvic injury . Otto Porter double - doubled , as he scored 14 points to go along with 12 rebounds . The Hornets will look to keep up this good form against the Brooklyn Nets on Saturday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 112 - 86 , at Verizon Center on Monday evening . The Wizards ( 26 - 20 ) knew they 'd have to hit on all cylinders to insure that they could keep pace with John Wall and company , and they managed to do that and then some Monday . Washington posted outstanding 58 - and - 62 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively , while seeing six players tally double - digit scoring . Meanwhile , they did a superb defensive job on Wall , limiting him to a modest 19 points on 7 - of - 17 shooting , and the Hawks ( 27 - 20 ) to 36 percent shooting overall , including two - rebound tally . Otto Porter paced the Hawks with 21 points , 12 rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Markieff Morris managed 15 points , nine boards , one assist , two steals and one block . Tim Hardaway , Jr. supplied a bench - leading 12 points , while Dwight Howard supplied a 12 - point , 13 - rebound double - double . Mike Scott supplied 11 points in 11 minutes off the bench . Otto Porter , Jr. provided a bench - leading 15 points , and Bradley Beal provided 15 . Dwight Howard mustered a modest seven points but hauled in 13 boards . The Hawks head back home to face the Sacramento Kings on Monday night , while the Hawks head to the Nation 's Capital to tangle with the Washington Wizards on Tuesday evening .
The Toronto Raptors ( 14 - 9 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 18 - 5 ) 97 - 94 on Tuesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 58 percent from the field and 30 percent from the three - point line , while the Spurs went 45 percent from the floor and 28 percent from beyond the arc . The Raptors were able to force the Spurs into 17 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this one . The Raptors were led by DeMar DeRozan , who went 10 - for - 15 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding six assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 26 points and 20 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 22 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Kyle Lowry was able to record a double - double of his own , finishing with 19 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) and eight assists . It was his second straight night with 17 points , as he 's gone a combined 7 - for - 24 from the field and 10 - for - 19 from the three - point line over those two outings . He 's now averaging 17 points and 4 rebounds on the season . LaMarcus Aldridge recorded a double - double , posting 13 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , seven rebounds and eight assists . He 's had a nice impact on the defensive side of the ball lately as well , recording two or more steals in four out of his last five games . LaMarcus Aldridge had a big game as well , posting 13 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and seven rebounds . The only other Cavalier to reach double - digit points was Danny Green , who came off the bench to score 10 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 0 - 0 FT ) in 21 minutes . The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Spurs will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .

The Utah Jazz defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 107 - 101 at Staples Center on Monday . The Jazz ( 13 - 9 ) edged out a close victory down the stretch after the Lakers ( 10 - 13 ) found life late in the second half . The see - saw third and fourth quarters saw scoring runs in favor of Los Angeles in the third , while the Lakers bounced back in the fourth behind Lou William 's streaky scoring bursts and Julius Randle 's explosiveness under the rim . Williams dropped in a two point shot to close the Lakers lead to three point with 3:26 remaining in the final period , but Rodney Hoot responded for Utah with a 25 - foot three pointer . The Lakers only managed two points over a three minute stretch , while Los Angeles closed out the game . Williams finished with 38 points , six rebounds and seven assists on 13 - of - 27 shooting to lead all scorers in his 34 minutes off the bench . Worth noting was the Lakers starting lineup , which consisted of Brandon Ingram , Luol Deng , Metta World Peace , Julius Randle and Timofey Mozgov . Head coach Luke Walton was experimental with the lineup , and it seemed to funnel the Lakers into more isolation style basketball , which was the game plan as discussed in the post - game press conference . All five Utah starters finished in double figures scoring , led by Gordon Hayward and his 23 points . Rudy Gobert finished with 14 points , 17 rebounds and five blocks in 39 minutes . Next up , the Lakers play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Phoenix Suns , while the Lakers host the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday .

After Kevin Durant tied the game at 102 with just over 10 seconds left in the fourth quarter , Dion Waiters held the ball at the top of the key while the clock ticked down . With a little over two seconds on the clock , Waiters launched a shot from behind the arc . The shot hit nothing but net and the Heat pulled off one of the biggest upset victories in the NBA this season . Waiters was not only the hero , but he was also the star , as he finished with a game - high 33 points on 13 - of - 20 shooting from the field and 6 - of - 8 from 3 - point land in 33 minutes . As a team , the Heat were scorching from behind the arc , hitting a ridiculous 43 percent of their shots from long range in the winning effort . The win gives Miami their fourth straight victory as they were perfect over their four - game home stand . Meanwhile , the loss ends the Warriors ' ( 38 - 7 ) seven - game win streak , as it ended up being too little too late in the closing moments for the NBA 's top team . Durant led the way in the scoring column , finishing with 27 points on 12 - of - 23 shooting from the field , but he did shoot just 1 - of - 8 from behind the arc . Additionally , Steph Curry almost put together a triple - double , as he recorded 21 points , 10 rebounds and eight assists in 37 minutes . Klay Thompson added 22 of his own , but JaVale McGee 's 10 points made him the fourth and final Warriors to score in double figures . Up next , the Heat will look to continue their winning ways in Brooklyn on Wednesday , while the Warriors will look to return to form against the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Phoenix Suns ( 16 - 46 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 27 - 34 ) 102 - 84 on Sunday at the US Airways Center in Orlando . The Suns came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Magic 29 - 29 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Suns shot the ball well , going 45 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 35 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Suns were also able to force the Magic into 14 turnovers , while committing only 18 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Suns were led by Alex Len , who shot 10 - for - 22 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to finish with 31 points , while also adding 15 rebounds . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 29 points and 18 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 16 points and 17 rebounds on the year . Elfrid Payton was able to record a double - double of his own with 14 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) , six assists and four rebounds . While he did n't reach his season average of 14 points per game , it was still a very positive all - around effort . They only other player to reach double figures was Ronnie Price , who had 14 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) and four rebounds . The Suns ' next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday .
The Houston Rockets ( 6 - 4 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 1 - 9 ) 115 - 88 on Friday . Houston has won three straight games , and they 've vaulted themselves out of the early - season hole they were in , at one time standing with a sub - .500 record of 12 - 98 . James Harden led the way for the Rockets in the losing effort , scoring 33 points ( 12 - 20 FG , 4 - 8 3Pt ) in 33 minutes . He also had seven rebounds , nine assists , one steal and one block in a team - high 33 minutes . Trevor Ariza had 17 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 5 - 11 3Pt ) , eight rebounds , two assists , three steals and one block in 35 minutes . Ersan Ilyasova was the only other starter in double figures , fininshing with 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) , six rebounds and three steals in 22 minutes . The Rockets are now two games behind the eighth - place Heat in the Western Conference , and currently hold the eighth and final playoff spot in the Western Conference . Similiar to Harden , Embiid also got the start at point guard and finished with 13 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 5 - 0 3Pt ) , 10 rebounds , three steals , two assists and one block in 35 minutes . The Sixers ' next game is at home Monday against the Boston Celtics . The 76ers ' next game will be on the road against the Washington Wizards on Monday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 19 - 14 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 10 - 24 ) 91 - 87 on Friday . Cleveland is on a three - game win streak . Kevin Love has struggled to find his place the Cavaliers ' offense so far this season , but he was the key cog for them Saturday as he put up 27 points and 5 rebounds in 38 minutes . Anderson Varejao sat out the game with a rib contusion . Tristan Thompson filled in as a spot starter at center and put up a double - double of 14 points and 14 rebounds in 43 minutes . The Cavs stay home and will host the Milwaukee Bucks on Tuesday . Charlotte has won six of their last ten to keep themselves in the playoff conversation while weathering the injuries they 've had early in the season . Lance Stephenson ( pelvic ) has started to do some work in practice but is n't considered too close to returning . Most of Charlotte 's options in the frontcourt right now are underwhelming , but Michael Kidd-Gilchrist showed up well Wednesday with 12 points and 10 rebounds in 29 minutes . They 'll return home to host the Portland Trail Blazers on Sunday . Charlotte has lost two straight , and while they 've tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Hornets will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Hornets have the right guys to build a winning team around . Kyrie Irving paced the Cavaliers on Friday , finishing with 23 points and three three - pointers in 42 minutes . Charlotte will return to action Tuesday in Philadelphia .

The Jazz maintained control of the game from the very start , opening up a 10 - point lead at the end of the first quarter and never looking back . They were led by Gordon Haywards game - high 24 points , and the small forward has now recorded at least 23 points in three straight games . This was an extremley high - scoring game and it was simply fun to watch , Both teams had well over 29 possessions in the game and the pace was at a ridiculously high level . There were also a ton of three - pointers taken , as both teams attempted a combined 66 threes . The biggest difference in the game was the shooting , as the Hawks shot 53 percent while the Pelicans shot just 50 percent from the field . The Pelicans made a run in the fourth quarter to pull out the comeback win , as they fell just short of pulling out a win . The key for Atlanta was their defense , as they held the Pelicans to 50 percent shooting and forced them to commit 12 turnovers . The assisting margin was huge as well , with Atlanta recording 30 assists to the Pelicans 30 . The Pelicans have been playing competitively lately , but this was not one of those games . This sort of performance exemplifies which directions these two franchises are going right now and New Orleans is in a lot of trouble right now . The starters amassed just 54 points in this game and that simply wo n't get it done in the NBA . One bright spot is the strong play of Al Horford though , as he tallied 14 points , five rebounds and two blocks in the defeat . Al Horford also had a nice game , as he totaled 14 points , five rebounds and two blocks in the defeat . The Hawks will look to build off this win against the Phoenix Suns on Monday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 109 - 84 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Saturday . The Jazz ( 5 - 3 ) braced themselves for an offensive void when they lost Gordon Hill to a finger injury in preseason , as he was slated to miss a minimum of six weeks . However , the standout forward beat the recovery timetable by at least two weeks , starting at the three on Sunday for Utah . He looked as if he had n't missed a beat , rattling off a team - high 20 points , along with seven rebounds . While he only found the net on six of his 17 field - goal attempts , he impressively drained all 13 of his shots from the free - throw line . His effort spearheaded a highly productive day for the Jazz offense that saw all five members of the first unit hit double - digit scoring and Utah produce a collective 51 percent success rate from the field . Gordon Hayward , who continues to start at point guard , led the way with 18 points , four assists , two rebounds , a steal and a block to lead the team . The Boston Celtics defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 102 - 89 , at TD Garden on Friday . These two teams came into this matchup tied for the most wins in NBA history and the Celtics were able to pull ahead of the Hornets with this victory . The second quarter was the difference in the game , as Boston outscored Charlotte , 27 - 19 . Defense was also key for the Celtics , as they held the Hornets to 36 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . Rim protection killed Charlotte as well , as they failed to record a block in their loss . The assist - to - turnover ratio kept the Celtics hanging around , as they committed 34 turnovers to 19 assists , while the Celtics committed 15 turnovers to their 25 assists . The Celtics ( 16 - 13 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and a comeback road win here just adds to their impressive resume ' . Isaiah Thomas once again led the team in scoring , as he tallied 18 points , four rebounds and seven assists . Jae Crowder was second on the team , finishing with 19 points and four rebounds . Jeremy Lin started for the injured James and accumulated 10 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Marvin Williams amassed eight points and 0 rebounds on 1 - of - 7 shooting . They finished at 45 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 44 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from deep . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the New York Knicks , 121 - 107 , at Madison Square Garden on Monday night . The Knicks ( 22 - 31 ) have been mired in controversy on and off the court in recent weeks , with rumors swirling about a possible trade of franchise cornerstone Carmelo Anthony and losses in three of their last four games . The Lakers ( 18 - 36 ) are n't in much better shape , however , and came into Monday 's contest with only five road wins in 28 games away from the Staples Center this season . However , a sterling effort from the Los Angeles bench that generated over half of the team 's scoring total helped lead the way to a relatively easy victory . The visitors were sharp from the jump , building a 29 - 19 lead after one and a 61 - 45 advantage by halftime . That edge was 97 - 73 after three quarters , and even with New York showing some signs of life in garbage time , the Lakers still coasted to a double - digit road victory . The Lakers were led by Lou Williams off the bench , who tallied 22 points , four assists , two rebounds and one steal in 26 minutes . Nick Young was next and paced the starters with 17 points , which he complemented with five rebounds and one steal . Brandon Ingram and Julius Randle followed with matching 14 - point efforts , with the former also providing seven boards , two assists and one steal , and the latter offering two rebounds , two assists and one block . Tarik Black posted a modest nine points but hauled in 10 boards and recorded one steal . D'Angelo Russell ( four points , six assists , two rebounds ) was minimally involved , but Jordan Clarkson ( 12 points ) and emerging rookie Ivica Zubac ( 10 points ) were productive as reserves as well . The Knicks were paced by Anthony 's 26 points , which he supplemented with five assists , three rebounds and one steal . Kristaps Porzingis registered a near double - double of 16 points , nine boards and a pair of blocks . Brandon Jennings matched his total off the bench and added five assists , three rebounds and one steal . Justin Holiday was productive on the second unit as well with 14 points , one rebound and one block . Kyle O'Quinn drew the start at center and produced 10 points , two rebounds and one assist , while Derrick Rose , back in the starting lineup after a four - game absence due to an ankle injury , generated just five points , four rebounds and three assists over 32 minutes . Willy Hernangomez continued his strong play by tallying eight points , 13 rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block over 17 minutes off the bench . The Lakers continue their trek through the Eastern Conference with a visit to the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday night , while the Knicks remain home to face the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday evening as well .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Utah Jazz , 102 - 96 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Monday . The Grizzlies ( 5 - 5 ) used a late fourth - quarter surge to secure their first road victory on Monday , after dropping their first three away from home to start the season . They did so with yet another great performance from Vince Carter off the bench , as he continues to turn back the clock in his 19th NBA season . Carter had 20 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting in 31 minutes as a reserve - - his third straight game with at least 17 points . Zach Randolph added a great performance off the bench himself , scoring 18 points and grabbing 10 rebounds in just 23 minutes to notch his third double - double of the season . For the starters , it was Marc Gasol and Mike Conley who carried the load , scoring 22 and 18 points respectively . For the Jazz ( 7 - 5 ) , on top of losing Monday 's game , they also lost their starting power forward Derrick Favors , as he left the game with left knee soreness after 21 minutes of playing time . Favors has been bothered with knee issues since before the season even started , and it is possible the team is now extra cautious with their star forward , opening the door for second - year player Trey Lyles to play a bigger role . The power forward out of Kentucky was great in 32 minutes off the bench , scoring 18 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting . Gordon Hayward , who has been unstoppable as of late with five straight games of at least 20 points , struggled mightily , shooting just 4 - of - 14 from the field and 1 - of - 7 from behind the arc en route to just 13 points . With Favors potentially out for an indefinite amount of time , the burden will be on Hayward to regain his scoring mojo and carry the load for a Utah team that is n't very prolific offensively . Up next , the Grizzlies will head to Los Angeles on Wednesday to take on the red - hot Clippers , while the Jazz will have off until Thursday when they take on Chicago at home .
