The Trail Blazers were also able to force the Pelicans into 35 turnovers , while only committing 11 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Trail Blazers were led by the duo of Anthony Davis and Damian Lillard . Davis went 14 - for - 20 from the field and 3 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and three steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 20 points and 11 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 21 points and 18 rebounds on the season . Damian Lillard also had a solid all - around game . He went 7 - for - 19 from the field and 2 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 24 points , while also adding seven assists . He 's now averaging 22 points per game on the season . Wesley Matthews had the most success for the Pelicans . He went 7 - for - 13 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding five rebounds and two assists . He 's now averaging 11 points , 5 rebounds and 4 assists on the season . LaMarcus Aldridge was the other starter to reach double - digit points , as he finished with 22 points . The Trail Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday , while the Pelicans will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 115 - 108 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Sunday . Indiana got out to a hot start in the first quarter and they never looked back after that . In fact , the Pacers took a 27 - 18 lead after the first quarter , as they never trailed after that . The Indiana offense was as efficient as ever , going 47 percent from the field , 36 percent from three - point range and 79 percent from the free - throw line . Defensive rebounding was huge as well , with Indiana winning that battle , 43 - 19 . The Lakers ( 1 - 3 ) have been playing terribly recently , but a road win against the Lakers is just what they need to get going . Paul George carried the load , as he tallied 30 points , seven rebounds , two assists and four steals . Monta Ellis was second on the team , finishing with 17 points , three rebounds and three assists . Julius Randle was the only other Laker in double figures , collecting 10 points , nine rebounds and two assists . On deck for Los Angeles is a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday . The Lakers ( 1 - 3 ) came into this game tied for the worst record in the west , so this win is a mixed result . Monta Ellis led Los Angeles in scoring , as he dropped 19 points . Thaddeus Young was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 14 points , six rebounds and three assists . Larry Nance Jr. recorded a 14 - point , 5 - rebound double - double off the bench . The Pacers will be in action again on Saturday against the Miami Heat .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 33 - 28 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 25 - 37 ) 104 - 85 on Wednesday . Portland was able to secure a win for the 16th time in the last 17 games on the strength of a typically stellar effort from offensive linchpin Damian Lillard , along with strong performances from two of their best bench players . After a dead - even first period , Portland forged ahead in the second quarter to build a seven - point lead by halftime . Both teams played relatively mistake - free basketball , with only 13 turnovers between them , but the Trail Blazers managed to stay a step ahead of the Knicks on the night to secure the relatively comfortable victory . Anthony Anthony posted a team - high 23 points , 10 rebounds , four assists , a steal and a block . Meyers Leonard and Arron Afflalo were next with a pair of 13 - point efforts , with the former adding six rebounds and an assist , and the latter posting six rebounds , an assist and a block . Kyle O'Quinn paced the bench with 11 points , nine rebounds and a block . The Blazers remain in second place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference . They head to Madison Square Garden to take on the Knicks on Saturday night . Portland was paced by a 23 - point effort from CJ McCollum , who also added three rebounds and two assists . Reserve guard Arron Afflalo put together a 13 - point , 6 - rebound double - double , while Arron Afflalo paced the reserves with 13 points and six rebounds . The Utah Jazz defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 88 - 83 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Monday . The Jazz ( 40 - 24 ) picked up their 40th win of the season and continue to rise in the Western Conference behind stellar play from Rudy Gobert . The elite center for Utah tipped in the buzzer beater for the win over the Kings on Sunday , and came up with another ridiculous stat line on Monday , as he finished with 15 points , 15 rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks across 36 minutes of action . The Pelicans simply could not find a rhythm shooting the ball , and finished with a season worst 36 percent as a unit . They allowed multiple Jazz scoring runs and did not have a single lead throughout the entirety of the game . The Pelicans picked up their first win with DeMarcus Cousins on Sunday , but were unable to do the same on the second game of a back - to - back . Cousins finished with 15 points , eight boards and three assists on 5 - of - 15 shooting , while Anthony Davis added 20 points and 12 rebounds across 37 minutes . He was the only efficient scorer amongst the starters , as Utah finished just 36 percent shooting from the field as a team . However , that phrase seems to be carrying a little more weight these days , as Philadelphia , behind emerging star Marc Gasol , is starting to make some noise around the league . The latest team to get an up - close look at their improving squad was the 76ers ( 4 - 11 ) , which suffered their eighth road loss of the season while seeing Gasol 's triple - double ( 27 points , 4 rebounds , four assists ) and Mike Conley ( 25 points , nine rebounds , two blocks ) and a pair of double - digit scoring efforts from Marc Gasol and Marc Gasol . Nik Stauskas generated 10 points , five rebounds , four assists and a steal . Gasol paced the Sixers with 27 points , four rebounds , four assists , three steals and three blocks . Covington had a near double - double with 19 points , 10 rebounds , two assists , three steals and three blocks .

The Mavs led 100 - 35 with 7:43 left in the fourth but then went cold , scoring only four points over the next two minutes , allowing the Grizzlies to bring the deficit down to four points with 38 seconds left . The Mavs were then able to seal the deal with clutch free throw shooting down the stretch , including a freebee thanks to a technical foul called on Memphis ' coach , David Fizdale . The Mavericks ( 15 - 12 ) shot 44 percent from the field , but struggled from long range , where they hit only 35 percent . All five starters scored in double digits for Dallas , while Mike Williams led the way with 16 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting , in 31 minutes off the bench . Deron Williams finished with 14 points , three assists , six rebounds and one steal , in 31 minutes . The Utah Jazz defeated the Orlando Magic , 114 - 107 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Saturday . The Jazz ( 26 - 16 ) have a well - earned defensive reputation , but they did a fine job lighting up the scoreboard on Saturday as well after falling behind early . All five members of their first unit tallied double digits in the scoring column , and Utah shot a stellar 49 percent from the field overall . The Magic ( 17 - 25 ) did a pretty good job of keeping pace , though , as they emerged from the first quarter with a 42 - 29 lead and managed a 49 percent success rate from the floor . However , Utah 's vaunted defense asserted its dominance following their disastrous first 12 minutes , limiting Orlando to just 65 points over the last three quarters . Elfrid Payton led all scorers with 28 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds , nine assists , two steals and a block . Aaron Gordon went for 21 points , four boards , two assists and a steal . Nikola Vucevic could n't quite duplicate his standout effort from Friday night versus the Suns , but did contribute a solid 15 points , eight rebounds , three assists and three steals . Jodie Meeks notched a spot start in place of Evan Fournier ( foot ) and collected 12 points , six assists , three rebounds and a steal . Jeff Green led the bench with 11 points and five rebounds . Gordon Hayward paced the Magic with 23 points , seven assists , five rebounds and a steal . Rudy Gobert was next with a monster 19 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two blocks . Derrick Favors registered 17 points , six rebounds and an assist . George Hill and Rodney Hood turned in matching 14 - point efforts , with the former also dishing out seven assists and recording two steals , and the latter posting four rebounds and two assists . Joe Ingles and Alec Burks led the second unit with a pair of eight - point tallies . The Magic continue their road trip with a Monday afternoon showdown against the Denver Nuggets , while the Jazz travel to Phoenix to take on the Suns on Monday evening .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 16 - 42 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 14 - 44 ) 116 - 106 on Wednesday at the US Airways Center in Phoenix . In a winning effort , the Nets finished the game shooting 49 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line . The Suns shot 49 percent from the field and 44 percent from beyond the arc to secure the Suns victory . The Nets were led by their starting backcourt of Bojan Bogdanovic and Bojan Bogdanovic . Bogdanovic went 8 - for - 16 from the field and 3 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 24 points , while also adding two rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 50 points and 16 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 18 points and 11 rebounds on the season . Donald Sloan was able to notch a double - double of his own , as he recorded 13 points ( 3 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 7 - 10 FT ) and nine rebounds in 24 minutes . It was his second straight night recording 11 points in 25 minutes . The only other Nugget to reach double figures in points was Alex Len , who chipped in with 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 7 FT ) and six rebounds . The Nets ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Suns will travel to Boston to play the Celtics on Friday .

Thompson scored a game - high 27 points ( 7 - 20 FG , 5 - 14 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) with three rebounds and three assists in 40 minutes of action . Draymond Green had a double - double with 17 points ( 7 - 20 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and 14 rebounds . The Warriors now try to get their first win of the 2014 season at home against the Toronto Raptors . For the Warriors , it 's a sigh of relief getting to put one in the win column . They had a well - rounded team effort in this game , with six players scoring in double figures , and nine players scoring in total . C.J . McCollum scored 22 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , to go along with two assists , two rebounds and one steal , while Iguodala scored 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) to go with six rebounds and two assists off the bench . Portland will go on the road to play the San Antonio Spurs on Wednesday . The Trail Blazers will head straight to Oklahoma City for a contest on Thursday .
The Houston Rockets ( 1 - 1 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 1 - 1 ) 115 - 109 on Tuesday at the Toyota Center in Houston . At the end of the third quarter , this was a tight game as the Rockets led by just four points . The Rockets were able to go on a run in the fourth quarter though , as they out - scored the Clippers 32 - 24 to steal the victory on the road . The Rockets were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 19 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 45 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from beyond the arc . The Rockets also secured a 54 - 40 rebounding advantage . For the Clippers , Blake Griffin was one of the few bright spots for the Clippers . Griffin went 13 - for - 23 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 34 points , while also adding 15 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 41 points and 27 rebounds over his last two games . Trevor Ariza was dialed in with his shot , going 4 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 15 points . The Rockets ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Tuesday , while the Clippers will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
The Chicago Bulls ( 42 - 28 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 41 - 28 ) on Wednesday , 108 - 92 , moving to a half game from clinching the playoffs . A Chicago win has been the eighth - worst record in the league this season for the Bulls ( 43 - 28 ) , who remain in the midst of a four - game losing streak . Chicago has now won six of its last seven games , and are quickly establishing position in the Eastern Conference playoff picture . All-Star guard DeMar DeRozan elevated his own for a team - high 27 points to go with seven rebounds , three assists , and four blocks . Mirotic has been an absolute beast thus far this season , and is now averaging 21 points per game in March . Center Nikola Mirotic has been the only bright spots for the Raptors this season , as he posted a team - high 29 points and pulled down 11 rebounds . The Raptors , meanwhile , have now lost four in a row after a hot month of March . Friday 's loss came in heartbreaking , down - to - the - wire fashion , as the two teams were almost inseparable on the night . Star forward DeMar DeRozan did everything he could to keep the Raptors in the game , scoring a game - high 27 points on 8 - for - 21 shooting . Chicago , meanwhile , is looking to take hold of the top spot in the Eastern Conference down the stretch . The Raptors remain within striking difference of the Cleveland Cavaliers for the conference 's first seed . However , Wednesday 's 38 percent shooting performance did them no favors , as Chicago was able to pull away in the final seconds . Per usual , the Wiz were led by the backcourt of Mike Dunleavy and Mike Dunleavy . Dunleavy added 21 points , eight assists , three rebounds , and three steals . As a team , the Raptors shot a highly impressive 53 percent from the floor and knocked down 11 threes .
The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 119 - 108 , at Staples Center on Sunday . The Lakers ( 4 - 3 ) notched their third straight win and remain undefeated at home after another strong performance by their young , talented core . Los Angeles built upon an eight - point first quarter lead in the second period , where a series of scoring runs capped off the first half . The Suns made the game a heated contest in the fourth quarter . Devin Booker buried a 10 - foot jump shot with 6:39 left in the final period and drew a foul , sinking a free throw to pull the game within one point . The Lakers were able to outlast the Phoenix comeback attempt and did not let up their lead , even after it dwindled to just one possession . Nick Young and D'Angelo Russell nailed much needed back - to - back three pointers to put the game out of reach and secure the rest of the victory from the charity stripe . Devin Booker had a standout performance , as his sophomore season continues where he left off from his rookie year . Booker finished with 39 points , seven assists and three rebounds on 13 - of - 29 shooting . T.J. Warren added 22 points , while Eric Bledsoe finished with 19 points , two assists and two boards . Nick Young provided his best game of the young season with 22 points and seven rebounds , in addition to three buckets from behind the arc . Jordan Clarkson and Lou Williams were impressive off the bench , adding a combined 32 points on 13 - of - 28 shooting in 26 minutes and 30 minutes , respectively . Julius Randle had the most well - rounded game for the Lakers on his way to 18 points , five rebounds , four assists and one steal . Both teams play on Tuesday , as the Suns host the Portland Trail Blazers , while the Lakers host the San Antonio Spurs .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 53 - 9 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 25 - 36 ) 104 - 94 on Wednesday . The Spurs came in to the game with a simple mission ; prevail over a significantly undermanned Kings squad and by doing so , clinch the final Western Conference playoff spot . The outcome was seemingly never in question , as San Antonio jumped out to a 29 - 22 lead after one quarter . The veteran trio of DeMarcus Cousins , Manu Ginobili and Rudy Gay were the only two members of the first unit to reach double - digit scoring , but the rest of the starters combined for just 32 points . Reserve guard Quincy Acy pitched in with 16 points , seven rebounds and a steal . Manu Ginobili paced the Kings bench with 22 points , a rebound and an assist in 15 minutes , his third straight game with at least 33 points . Quincy Acy paced the Kings with 16 points , seven rebounds , an assist and a steal , while Darren Collison rounded out the stat sheet with 12 points , seven rebounds , seven assists , two steals and a block . Boris Diaw led the reserves with 11 points , three rebounds , six assists , two steals and two blocks . The Spurs are currently in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and they retain a rather tenuous hold on the eighth seed in the conference by one - and - one - half games over the Utah Jazz . They now head to Philadelphia to face off against the Sixers on Wednesday night . For a change , the Kings were led once again by DeMarcus Cousins , who totaled 31 points , nine rebounds , three assists and a steal . Manu Ginobili followed with 22 points , one rebound and an assist . Acy followed with a 16 - point , seven - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a steal . Darren Collison filled out the stat sheet with 12 points , three rebounds , seven assists , two steals and a block . Boris Diaw paced the reserves with 11 points , three rebounds , six assists , two steals and two blocks . The Spurs remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They 're home again against the Magic on Thursday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 120 - 105 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday evening . The Sixers ( 3 - 10 ) have been mocked for some time for the `` Trust the Process '' slogan that has become associated with their seemingly never - ending string of losing seasons . However , that phrase seems to be carrying a little more weight these days , as Philadelphia , behind emerging star Joel Embiid , is starting to make some noise around the league . The latest team to get an up - close look at their improving squad was the Suns ( 4 - 10 ) , which suffered their eighth road loss of the season while seeing Embiid tally 26 points , seven rebounds , two assists , two blocks and a steal . Philadelphia still has plenty of room for improvement despite notching their seventh win in 15 games , as they turned the ball over a whopping 15 times . However , they played superb defense , limiting Phoenix to a 42 percent success rate from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . On the defensive end , they were able to contain the prolific Suns to 42 percent and 49 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively . Joel Embiid 's 26 points led the Sixers . He was right behind him with 26 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Sergio Rodriguez got the start at point guard and registered eight points , 11 assists and eight rebounds . Eric Rodriguez led the way for the Sixers with 27 points , six assists , five rebounds and a block . Nik Stauskas was productive in a reserve role as well with 21 points . Embiid was next with 26 points , seven rebounds , two assists , two blocks and a steal . Sergio Rodriguez followed with a eight - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included five rebounds and a block . Sergio Rodriguez managed eight points , 11 assists and eight rebounds .

The Pelicans shot well in this game , going 60 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Timberwolves went 46 percent from the floor and just 22 percent from beyond the arc . The Timberwolves were able to force the Timberwolves into 13 turnovers , while committing only 21 of their own . Anthony finished with 42 points ( 16 - 22 FG , 8 - 11 FT ) , 13 rebounds and two blocked shots , while Towns recorded a game - high of 36 points ( 13 - 22 FG , 9 - 9 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds and three blocked shots . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 22 points and 21 rebounds . Holiday , on the other hand , finished with 25 points ( 10 - 14 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , six assists and five steals in 39 minutes . Considering he 's averaging only eight points per game on the season , it was a nice surprise for the Timberwolves . Both Ricky Rubio and Dante Cunningham reached double - digit points as well with 12 and 12 points respectively . The Timberwolves were led by Andrew Wiggins , who came off the bench to score 29 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , while also adding four rebounds . He 's now averaging 13 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The Pelicans ' next game will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday , while the Timberwolves will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday .
The Houston Rockets dominated the Los Angeles Lakers 134 - 95 Wednesday at Target Center . This game appeared to be over after the first quarter , as the Lakers ' ( 10 - 14 ) leaky defense had no answered for the Rockets ' ( 15 - 7 ) high - powered offensive attack , as Houston won the quarter 43 - 27 . And while Los Angeles managed to pull closer before halftime , the Rockets absolutely poured it on in the second half . Houston was led by shooting guard Eric Gordon , who has really adjusted to his new role off the bench , as he scored a game - high 26 points in just 24 minutes on a scorching 9 - of - 13 from the field . Early MVP-candidate James Harden was not too far behind , scoring 25 points on top of eight rebounds , six assists and four steals . To round off a terrific performance from the Rockets ' backcourt players , Patrick Beverley put together his best performance since returning from injury , recording 10 points , 12 assists , seven rebounds and three steals in 32 minutes . As a team , the Rockets made a living at the 3 - point line , shooting an impressive 27 - of - 36 from long range . For the Lakers , it was a night to forget , as the team shot a dreadful 39 percent from the field and 25 percent from behind the arc . Julius Randle led the way with a double - double of 21 points and 10 rebounds in 29 minutes , while Lou Williams continued to campaign for a Sixth Man of the Year award , posting an efficient 24 points in 25 minutes . Meanwhile , Jordan Clarkson made his first start at point guard this season and posted a lowly seven points on just 3 - of - 13 shooting from the field . Up next , the Rockets will head to Oklahoma City on Friday to take on the Thunder , while the Lakers will head home Wednesday to play the Suns .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 113 - 107 , at TD Garden on Friday . These two teams came into this matchup tied for the most wins in NBA history and the Celtics were able to pull ahead of the Lakers with this victory . The second quarter was the difference in the game , as Boston outscored Los Angeles , 33 - 21 . Defense was also key for the Celtics , as they held the Lakers to 39 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range . Boston shot 48 percent on their end and recorded 28 assists on their 39 made baskets . The Lakers ( 17 - 36 ) have now lost 10 of their last 12 games , as they ca n't get out of their own way . Lou Williams led Los Angeles in scoring , as he provided 21 points , four rebounds and four assists off the bench . D'Angelo Russell led the starters , collecting 20 points , six rebounds and six assists . Nick Young was the only other starter with more than four points , as he dropped 17 points to add to his three rebounds and three assists . Larry Nance Jr. recorded an 18 - point , 11 - rebound double - double off the bench . The Celtics ( 32 - 18 ) have rode Isaiah Thomas ' absurd fourth quarter numbers all season and he was at it yet again here . Thomas scored 17 of his 38 points in the fourth quarter , to go along with two rebounds and four assists . Al Horford flirted with a triple - double , accumulating 11 points , eight rebounds and eight assists . Jae Crowder was second on the team in scoring , totaling 18 points , six rebounds and two steals . Marcus Smart was a spark plug off the bench , accruing nine points , seven assists and five steals .
The Golden State Warriors ( 64 - 7 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 43 - 27 ) 114 - 98 on Friday . Golden State came into this game as a six - point underdog and walked away with a huge road win . This game kept the Warriors within two games of the final playoff spot in the east and it took some dominating fourth quarter defense to prevail . The Warriors held the Clippers to just 26 points in that after a final quarter . The key for the Warriors was their defense , as they held the Clippers to 42 percent shooting and forced them to commit 10 turnovers . The assisting margin was huge as well , with Golden State recording 23 assists to the Clippers 21 . Los Angeles did a good job of hanging around , but their weak bench really hurt them down the stretch . Four starters scored at least 13 points , but no bench player scored more than seven . Stephen Curry was especially good , as he tallied 33 points , four rebounds and five assists in the defeat . DeAndre Jordan had a nice game as well , as he totaled 12 points and 12 rebounds . The Clippers have a quick turnaround , as they play the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday in their next matchup . The Warriors continue to surprise and these sort of wins are a credit to their resiliency and grittiness . Chris Paul also played well , as he accumulated 13 points , eight assists and six rebounds . The Warriors ' next game is on Monday against the Los Angeles Clippers .

The Boston Celtics defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 117 - 108 , at TD Garden on Wednesday . The Celtics ( 23 - 14 ) learned earlier in the afternoon that they 'd play without Avery Bradley , who 'd tallied a team - high 26 points on Friday versus the Sixers . Marcus Smart entered the starting five in his stead and did n't disappoint , producing 22 points , six assists , five rebounds , two steals and a block . However , the high - scoring affair was a showcase for two of the game 's brightest stars , as Isaiah Thomas ( 38 points ) and Anthony Davis ( 36 points , 15 rebounds , two assists , two blocks ) put on a spectacular show on opposite ends of the court . Ultimately , a 36 - point third quarter by Boston did in the Pelicans ( 14 - 24 ) , which suffered their 13th road loss in 17 games this season . Jrue Holiday was next with 13 points , five assists , two rebounds , two steals and a block . Rookie Buddy Hield totaled nine points , five rebounds and two assists , with all three of his baskets coming from three - point range . Donatas Motiejunas made his season debut and supplied 11 points , five boards , four assists and a steal over 20 minutes . Thomas added three rebounds , two steals and a block to his game - high scoring total , and was also notably 6 - of - 11 from behind the arc . Al Horford and Jae Crowder had matching eight - point efforts , with the former adding eight assists , seven rebounds and a pair of blocks , and the latter providing six rebounds , two assists and a steal . Gerald Green paced the bench with 15 points and three boards , while Kelly Olynyk offered 12 points , four assists and four rebounds in a reserve role as well . The Pelicans continue on their trek through the Northeast with a visit to the New York Knicks on Monday night , while the Celtics tangle with the Toronto Raptors north of the border on Tuesday evening .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 27 - 16 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 18 - 24 ) 109 - 99 on Saturday . The New Year 's Eve showdown between the two Central Division rivals was atypical in a number of ways . To begin with , one of the rarest sights in the NBA this season , a Spurs road victory , came to pass , and against a quality opponent to boot . The Nuggets had entered Thursday 's contest sporting an impressive 10 - 2 home record and playing quality basketball overall . Meanwhile , San Antonio had managed a paltry three wins in 13 tries away from the Bradley Center , including consecutive road losses to the Mavericks and Thunder preceding Thursday 's game . They 'd also struggled offensively the majority of the year , often failing to even reach 75 points over the first 26 games of the season . However , the light has seemingly come on for San Antonio , and their side of the scoreboard , over their last two outings . After tallying 123 points in the loss to Oklahoma City on Wednesday , the Spurs roared right back with another outstanding night on offense , shooting a stellar 45 percent from the field and 41 percent from beyond the arc . They also managed 42 of their points off 38 bench turnovers . As a team , the Nuggets posted respective success rates of 47 percent from the field and 41 percent from three - point range , while also outrebounding them 44 to 42 . Their biggest advantage came down in the paint , where they outscored the visitors by the sizable margin of 67 - 47 . Denver was led by Arron Afflalo , who tallied 21 points , two assists , four rebounds and three steals . Tim Duncan and Tim Duncan followed with a pair of 10 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block , and the latter posting seven assists , four rebounds and a steal . Manu Ginobili paced the reserves with 11 points , eight rebounds , eight assists and a steal . The Nuggets head back home to face off with the Houston Rockets on Monday night , while the Nuggets head to Chicago to take on the Bulls on Monday evening as well .

The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Denver Nuggets 111 - 108 at Target Center on Sunday . Karl-Anthony Towns led the way for Minnesota 15 - 28 ) after putting up 32 points , to go with 12 rebounds , seven assists and four blocks in the impressive all around effort . The back and forth affair came down to the wire , as the Nuggets ( 16 - 22 ) were within striking distance until the final seconds of regulation . Following a pair of Tyus Jones free throws , Jameer Nelson answered for Denver with a driving layup to bring the score within one point . Andrew Wiggins went on to miss one of the free throws on the following possession , but Nelson was unable to hit the 17 - foot jumper and the Timberwolves came away with the win . Wiggins knocked down 10 shots and finished with 24 points , while Kris Dunn added 10 points , nine assists , eight rebounds and three steals across 34 minutes . Shabazz Muhammad contributed 20 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting to lead the Minnesota bench . As for the Nuggets , Gary Harris led the way with 22 points , while Jamal Murray had an efficient outing across 20 minutes , as the rookie posted 17 points , five rebounds and three assists . Both teams play on Tuesday , as the Nuggets visit the Utah Jazz , while the Nuggets host the Utah Jazz . Meanwhile , the Nuggets visit the Los Angeles Lakers on Tuesday night in what was just the second game of a five - game road trip .
The Phoenix Suns ( 10 - 13 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 12 - 10 ) 107 - 104 on Wednesday at the US Airways Center in Phoenix . Phoenix was down 70 - 49 at the half but were able to comeback in the second half and finished the game scoring 23 in the fourth quarter . They were also able to out - rebound the Magic 44 - 32 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Suns were led by Brandon Knight , who went 8 - for - 16 from the field and 0 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also grabbing six rebounds . It was a season - high in points for Knight and a nice surprise for the Suns , as he 's averaging only 18 points per game so far this season . Brandon Knight had a very solid performance as well , posting 21 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , five rebounds and five assists . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 21 points , as he 's had the hot hand for the Suns . Coming off the bench , Evan Fournier shot 5 - for - 14 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 14 points . He 's now combined for 37 points , five rebounds and five assists in the past two days . The Suns ' next game will be at home against the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday , while the Suns will play the Phoenix Suns on Friday .

The Phoenix Suns defeated the host Chicago Bulls , 115 - 97 , at United Center on Friday . These are two teams going in opposite directions and this result shows which way they 're heading . The second half is when Phoenix really turned it on , as they outscored Chicago , 59 - 42 in that 20 - minute span . Prior to that , there were 18 lead changes and six ties , as it was close throughout the first half . Defense was key for the Suns , as they held the Bulls to 43 percent shooting , while forcing them to commit 11 turnovers . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with Phoenix recording eight more assists than Chicago , while committing five less turnovers . The Bulls ( 26 - 28 ) had a tough task here against a hot Suns team and they fell just short in this tight battle . Devin Booker led the way for Chicago , as he tallied 27 points and five rebounds . Dwyane Warren was n't far behind , totaling 16 points and five rebounds . Alan Williams recorded a double - double off the bench , totaling 14 points and 11 rebounds . Devin Booker was the Bulls best player , as he accumulated 18 points , six rebounds and three assists . Jimmy Butler was the player of the game , as he accumulated 20 points , three rebounds and six assists . Dwyane Wade was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 18 points , six rebounds and three assists . The Bulls will be in action again on Saturday against the Utah Jazz .

In fact , the Heat won the two middle quarters , 61 - 37 , while the Suns could never get within double - digits in the second half . Rebounding was a huge factor , with Miami winning that battle , 51 - 40 . They also destroyed the Suns through three - point shooting , as the Heat hit 11 - of - 27 , while Phoenix went just 4 - of - 16 from long range . Tyler Johnson was huge off the bench , providing 17 points , six rebounds , four assists and five steals . The Heat will look to keep rolling on Monday against the Toronto Raptors .

The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the host Toronto Raptors , 123 - 102 , at Air Canada Center on Thursday . It 's rare to see Toronto dominated in its home building , but that was just the case here . In fact , this was a wire - to - wire win for Oklahoma City , as they led by at least 19 points for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Shooting was key , with the Thunder shooting 53 percent from the field and 56 percent from three - point range . The Raptors could only muster up 46 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was decisive as well , with Oklahoma City winning that battle , 47 - 32 . The 33 assists recorded by the Thunder dominated the 15 dished out by Toronto too . The Thunder ( 39 - 29 ) have now won five - straight games , as they continue to ride Russell Westbrook 's heavy shoulders . Westbrook picked up his 34th triple - double of the season in this win , as he collected 24 points , 10 rebounds and 16 assists . Victor Oladipo was just behind Westbrook , totaling 23 points , five rebounds and two assists . Enes Kanter was a huge spark off the bench , providing 14 points and seven rebounds . Taj Abrines and Andre Roberson each scored 10 points a piece . On deck for the Thunder is a home matchup against the Sacramento Kings on Saturday . The Raptors ( 39 - 29 ) continue to struggle without Kyle Lowry and home losses like this show just how much his absence hurts this team . DeMar DeRozan carried the load . as he tallied 22 points , three rebounds and three assists . Cory Joseph accrued 11 points , six assists and two steals . Norman Powell finished second on the team in scoring , dropping 13 points and four rebounds off the bench . Toronto will be in action again on Friday , as they play the Detroit Pistons on the road for their next game .

The Golden State Warriors defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder , 121 - 118 , in Game 2 of the Western Conference first - round playoffs Saturday at Oracle Arena . It was a fair and foul game for reigning MVP Steph Curry . Though the superstar scored 46 points and nailed a pair of three - pointers after going 4 - for - 8 from long range in the final period , it was enough to dent the Warriors lead . With less than a second remaining , it was the Warriors ' ability to get back into the game again . Kevin Durant scored a game - high 37 points , while Draymond Green added a team - high 37 points to go with 12 rebounds . As for the Thunder , they were led by Russell Westbrook , who put together his best performance of the season against the Warriors . Westbrook exploded for 26 points , seven rebounds , 13 assists and two steals on 10 - of - 29 shooting . He was , however , a bit careless with the basketball , managing 12 turnovers and nearly matching the Warriors ' team total of 11 . As a team , the Warriors had an astonishing 22 turnovers , which led to plenty of empty possessions that ultimately left them with little chance to win Wednesday 's contest . On the bright side , each of the five Oklahoma City starters scored in double figures , but Andre Iguodala was the only other player to score in double digits , finishing with 12 points in 34 minutes . Up next , the Warriors will travel to Minnesota on Friday to take on the Timberwolves , while the Thunder will head home Wednesday and play the Heat .

The third quarter was the decisive one for the Hawks , as they outscored the Celtics , 33 - 24 . In fact , Boston won or tied the other three quarters , but could n't quite make the full comeback in the fourth . Defense was key for Atlanta , as they held Boston to 39 percent shooting and outrebounded them 53 - 44 . Points in the paint was a huge factor as well , with the Hawks recording 74 paint points to the Celtics ' 27 . Many people pegged the Hawks as a subpar team , but they showed some resiliency in an impressive opener . Paul Millsap was the player of the game , as he tallied 17 points , 10 rebounds and four assists on 7 - of - 18 shooting . Paul Millsap finished second on the team , totaling 17 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and two steals . Al Horford collected six points , six rebounds , five assists and one steal . These are two teams who will battle to sneak into the playoffs , but the Knicks looked like the far superior team in this game . Both teams played relatively mistake - free basketball , with only 20 turnovers between them , but the Trail Blazers managed to stay a step ahead of the Suns on the night to secure the relatively comfortable victory . Robin Lopez continued his recent stretch of solid offensive play , posting 11 points , 12 rebounds , a steal and four blocks in just 31 minutes . The Suns improved to 34 - 16 and remain atop the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . They are off until Thursday , when they square off against the Suns in Phoenix .
The Toronto Raptors ( 19 - 8 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 12 - 17 ) 109 - 79 on Friday . Toronto has won four straight games , knocking down most of the Eastern Conference 's lottery contingent over the last week . Six players scored in double figures for the Raptors . Jonas Valanciunas scored a team - high 16 points and pulled down seven rebounds . They continue to win even without DeMar DeRozan ( adductor ) in the lineup , maintaining their seat atop the Eastern Conference standings , but a scary injury happened to D.J Augustin . Gordon Joseph returned to action for Orlando , as he led the team with 31 points on 13 - of - 21 shooting , five rebounds , four assists and one steal in 30 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas recorded a double - double of 16 points and 13 rebounds in 26 minutes , and the effort was his third double - double in four outings . Jonas Valanciunas put in a solid performance , recording 16 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting and 13 rebounds in 26 minutes . Evan Fournier struggled shooting from the field , but still managed 15 points and three assists in 26 minutes . Terrence Ross ( 11 ) , and Terrence Ross ( 11 ) round out the five Raptors who scored in double figures . The win leaves Toronto all alone in third place in the Eastern Conference with just a half - game lead over Chicago for that spot , and they are still three games behind the Bulls for second place . The Magic will start a four - game road trip against the Nets on Saturday .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 4 - 15 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 5 - 15 ) 102 - 103 on Friday . Charlotte has won two straight and four of their last five games . Matt Barnes missed a second straight game with a sore calf , giving sophomore Jose Calderon into the starting lineup . Calderon put up a game - high 22 points in 31 minutes . The Hornets will go on the road to face the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday . Charlotte has lost two straight , and with Al Jefferson ( groin ) expected to miss at least the next four weeks , it 's getting hard to find reasons to think the Hornets could climb back into the playoff conversation this season . Jannero Acy moved into the starting lineup at power forward , pushing Iman Shumpert to the starting lineup . Stephenson had a double - double with 13 points and 6 assists , including 3 - for - 2 from behind the three - point line . The Knicks are on the losing end of a back - to - back , but they 'll host the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday . The Hornets are in the midst of a three - games road trip that will face off against the Memphis Grizzlies on Saturday . Charlotte had lost three of their last five games after starting the season 11 - 3 . They have now won 10 of their last 10 , while the Hornets have been eliminated from playoff contention for the season . They 'll go on the road to face the Denver Nuggets on Saturday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 3 - 0 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 0 - 3 ) 105 - 99 on Tuesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic had a strong first half where they out - scored the Magic 53 - 56 , allowing them to coast to a 31 - point victory on the road . The Cavaliers were the superior shooters in this game , going 41 percent from the field and 30 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 45 percent from the floor and 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Cavaliers were led by the James James , who went off for a team - high of 23 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 7 - 11 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and nine assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 29 points and 9 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 19 points and 18 rebounds on the year . Kevin Love was able to record a double - double , as he finished with 19 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) , 5 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 39 points and 22 rebounds over his last two games . The only other Hornet in double figures was Elfrid Payton , who posted 10 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) and five assists in 34 minutes . Coming off the bench , D.J . Augustin had 13 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) of his own , while also adding two steals . The Magic ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Monta Ellis , 110 - 106 , at AT & T Center on Tuesday . While this game was close throughout the first half , the Spurs were able to prevail in the second half and outscored them , 39 - 30 in the fourth . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with the Spurs recording 18 assists to 11 turnovers , while the Pacers committed 11 turnovers to just 21 assists . Three-point shooting was a big key as well , with San Antonio hitting 16 - of - 21 from long distance , while Indiana went just 10 - of - 31 . The Spurs also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 49 - 37 . Kawhi George led Indiana in scoring , as he tallied 27 points , six rebounds and three assists . Myles Turner was second on the team , finishing with 22 points and six rebounds . Jeff Teague started at point guard and provided 15 points , five rebounds and five assists . The bench was huge , as David Lee , Rodney Stuckey and Rodney Stuckey all scored in 12 points a piece . On deck for the Pacers is a home matchup against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday . The Pacers ( 29 - 26 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to battle for the top - spot in the east . Kawhi Leonard led the way for San Antonio , as he tallied 32 points , six rebounds and three assists . Jeff Teague finished second on the team , amassing 15 points , five rebounds and five assists . LaMarcus Aldridge collected 19 points , seven rebounds and three blocks . David Lee came off the bench to provide 12 points , 11 rebounds and five blocks .
The Houston Rockets ( 29 - 13 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 15 - 28 ) 110 - 98 on Monday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . After winning seven games in a row during the start of March and pushing themselves into the seventh seed in the Eastern Conference standings , the Pacers have now turned completely in the opposite direction and have gone on to lose four straight games . The loss does n't take them out of the playoff race though , as they sit just a game back from the Oklahoma City Thunder for the eighth and final projected playoff seed in the West . The Rockets , on the other hand , are currently in the eighth spot in the Eastern Conference standings , a half game behind the Brooklyn Nets . The Pacers , on the other hand , have now lost four in a row and currently remain just two and a half games ahead of the Miami Heat for the sixth spot in the Eastern Conference standings . If they do n't get things turned around soon , they could end up getting knocked out of the playoffs by the end of the regular season . C.J . Miles was the high - point man for the Pacers , finishing with 23 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 4 - 11 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) . He was able to get to the free throw line 15 times and converted on 14 of those attempts . He 's now averaging 18 points and 6 rebounds on the year . The Rockets ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Pacers will go on the road to Washington to play the Wizards on Wednesday .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 2 - 3 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 3 - 2 ) 94 - 88 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . After suffering a tough 99 - 92 loss in game number one on Monday , the Bucks were able to bounce back with a convincing 11 - point victory in game two . The Bucks got off to a really strong start , out - scoring the Bulls 23 - 22 right away in the first quarter . The Bulls were able to out - score the Bulls 18 - 18 in the third quarter , giving them enough of an edge to get the victory on the road in Chicago . The Bucks also out - rebounded the Bulls 48 - 45 , giving them a huge upperhand and contributing even further to the win . As he 's done all season long , Pau Gasol did most of the damage for the Bucks . Gasol went 9 - for - 15 from the field and 7 - for - 9 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 25 points , while also adding 10 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second straight double - double and tenth on the year . He has combined for 54 points and 24 rebounds in his last two games as he continues to put together a solid season . Jimmy Butler continued to score in bunches as he finished with 20 points . Butler also had 10 rebounds , six assists and four steals , but it was n't enough to keep the Bulls in contention for the victory . Coming off the bench , O.J. - 2 - of - 5 from the three - point line , O.J . Mayo came off the bench to score 10 points ( 2 - 8 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) in 26 minutes . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Bulls will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
In a game with 12 ties and 31 lead changes , neither of these squads led by more than nine points . The key for San Antonio was the rebounding , as they won that battle , 41 - 39 . Free-throw shooting was a big factor as well , with the Spurs hitting 73 percent to the Spurs 48 percent . The Spurs ( 52 - 15 ) had a tough task here against a hot Spurs team , as they simply did n't have enough in the arsenal to win this game . Damian Lillard led the team with 36 points , three rebounds and four assists . C.J . McCollum finished with 26 points , four rebounds and four assists . Jusuf Nurkic was the only other player in double figures , as he tallied 16 points , nine rebounds , four assists and three steals . David Lee led the bench with 12 points and five rebounds . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to have the hot hand . That 's a recipe for disaster , especially when you 're not shooting the three - ball well . In any case , they still pulled out a win in impressive comeback fashion and got back to .500 . James Harden played well though , as he tallied 32 points , 12 assists and five rebounds in the win . Eric Bledsoe also played well , accumulating 24 points , four rebounds and four assists . The Rockets have a good chance at another win in their next game , when they play the Oklahoma City Thunder on Thursday . The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Chicago Bulls , 95 - 69 , at United Center on Friday . Fresh off a double - digit home victory over the Bulls ( 13 - 13 ) on Thursday night , the Bucks ( 13 - 12 ) bounced back with an even more dominating effort Friday . Chicago 's offense had no answer for a stifling Milwaukee defense that held them to a season - low scoring total , while also limiting them to a 30 percent success rate from the field . Giannis Antetokounmpo once again proved to be a thorn in the side of the visitors , leading the way with a 22 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included seven boards , three steals and a block . Jabari Parker could n't come close to his 26 - point effort from Thursday , but he managed 12 points , seven rebounds , an assist and a steal . John Henson and Tony Snell posted a pair of 10 - point efforts , supplemented by four rebounds , a steal and a pair of blocks by Henson , to go along with five rebounds and a pair of dimes from Snell . Greg Monroe came off the bench to tally a 14 - point , 12 - rebound double - double over 23 minutes , while Mirza Teletovic compiled 13 points for the second straight night in a reserve role , and also hauled in eight boards . A nightmarish outing for the Bulls saw Dwyane Wade pace them in scoring with a modest 12 points , which he complemented with five boards , an assist and a steal . Taj Gibson and Robin Lopez posted a pair of eight - point efforts on a combined 7 - of - 20 shooting , although they at least managed 11 boards between them . Jimmy Butler and Rajon Rondo had matching seven - point contributions as well , with the former also supplying seven boards , six assists and a steal , and the latter dishing out four dimes and recording four rebounds . Bobby Portis actually served as the second - leading scorer on the team despite coming off the bench , posting 10 points and eight rebounds in 19 minutes . The Bucks are now off until Tuesday night , when the Cleveland Cavaliers will come calling to the Bradley Center . The Bulls are home again Monday night , when the Detroit Pistons come to town .

The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 56 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Heat went 47 percent from the floor and a meager 48 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Hawks forced the Heat into 14 turnovers , while committing just 13 of their own . The Hawks ' frontcourt did most of the damage in this game . Paul Millsap went 7 - for - 19 from the field and 0 - for - 3 from the three - point line to finish with 20 points , while also adding eight rebounds and a pair of steals . He 's shot well over his last two games , combining to go 19 - for - 40 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from deep in the game . Shawne Williams was the third starter in double figures , as he recorded 21 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt ) and six rebounds . The Hawks ' next game will be on the road against the New York Knicks on Wednesday , while the Heat will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday as well .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 29 - 6 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 16 - 19 ) 121 - 103 on Sunday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . Quite unexpectedly , the Spurs were able to keep their winning streak alive and extended it to six games in a row Tuesday . After the Spurs came out of the third quarter leading 82 - 77 , the Spurs went on a fourth quarter run , out - scoring the Rockets 25 - 31 . It was n't enough though , as the Spurs caught fire in the fourth , out - scoring the Rockets 31 - 31 . It was a sloppy game all - around though , as both teams struggled to get things going . The Spurs finished the game shooting 52 percent from the field and 54 percent from the three - point line , while the Rockets shot 50 percent from the field and only 41 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs were led by the duo of LaMarcus Aldridge and Kawhi Leonard . Leonard went 8 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from the three - point line to finish with 22 points , while also adding six rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 67 points in the last three games . The Washington Wizards defeated the Portland Trail Blazers , 125 - 124 , at Moda Center on Saturday . While this appeared to be a blowout at halftime , the Wizards heard something in the locker room that completely turned this game around . Portland took a 70 - 49 lead headed into the half , but they completely collapsed by allowing the Trail Blazers to outscore them , 63 - 42 , in the second half to send it to overtime . Markieff Morris then played hero , as he hit the game - winning shot with 0 seconds left , despite the fact that it appeared he stepped out of bounds prior to the shot . Both offenses were efficient , with Washington shooting 52 percent to Portland 's 51 percent . Fastbreak points was the only noticeable difference in the stat sheet , with the Wizards winning that battle , 15 - 7 . The Wizards ( 41 - 24 ) overcame a huge halftime deficit to send this game to overtime , as this marked their second game in three nights in which they overcame a double - digit halftime deficit . John Wall was fantastic , as he led the team with 39 points , two rebounds and nine assists . Bradley Beal finished second on the team , totaling 26 points and six assists . Marcin Gortat and Markieff Morris each recorded a double - double , combining for 28 points and 26 rebounds . Otto Porter provided 18 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . On deck for the Wizards is a road matchup with the Utah Jazz on Sunday . The Blazers ( 28 - 36 ) are battling for the eight - seed in the west and blown leads like this wo n't help that pursuit . C.J . McCollum led Portland with 34 points , adding six assists to an otherwise empty line . Damian Lillard collected 33 points , three rebounds and seven assists . Maurice Harkless amassed 15 points and five rebounds . Allen Crabbe was the best bench player , as he accrued 14 points , six rebounds and two assists . Al-Farouq Aminu also came off the bench to tally 11 points and eight rebounds . Portland will look to bounce back on Sunday in a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans .

The Thunder had a strong first half where they out - scored the Rockets 22 - 29 , to coast to a 15 - point victory on the road . The Thunder shot 48 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Rockets shot just 38 percent from the floor and a meager 23 percent from beyond the arc . To go along with the superior shooting , the Thunder also secured a 57 - 40 rebounding advantage . Kevin Durant had a big game as well . He went 11 - for - 18 from the field and a perfect 9 - for - 9 from the free throw line to finish with a game - high of 33 points , while also adding 12 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 36 points and 24 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 18 points and 16 rebounds on the year . Dion Waiters was the other player to score in double figures for the Rockets . He went 6 - for - 9 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 16 points in 32 minutes . Both Dion Waiters and Corey Waiters reached double figures as well with 16 and 16 points respectively . The Rockets ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Tuesday , while the Rockets will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Tuesday .

The Golden State Warriors defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 114 - 95 , at Oracle Arena on Saturday . The Warriors ( 54 - 13 ) had rolled in to the Volunteer State riding high , with victories in 24 of their last 54 games . That impressive streak was harshly halted Saturday , however , as a defensive - minded Warriors squad managed to hold Atlanta to a season - low point total . They also forced 15 turnovers from the Hawks , and held them to a 36 percent success rate from the field while draining 15 three - pointers . The reigning MVP shot 52 percent from the field and 2 - of - 6 from three - point range , but his two clutch free throws with 8 seconds remaining ended up giving the Warriors a key cushion in their lead . Despite being outrebounded 33 to 44 , the Raptors were able to force the Pacers into 32 turnovers , which allowed them to finish with the victory . It was his second double - double in the past three games , and fourth on the year as the Pacers just did n't have an answer for him . He 's really picked up his play of late and is averaging 21 points over his last five games . The Sixers ( 1 - 7 ) had taken the Pacers ( 4 - 5 ) to the limit just two nights prior before succumbing in overtime , 122 - 115 . However , their second consecutive foray into an extra period against Indiana went much better , culminating in Philadelphia 's first victory of the season . The Pacers ( 29 - 28 ) came in to Thursday 's contest hoping to snap a five - game losing streak , but were also running on fumes after two games in the previous three nights . The second half was much tighter , but Washington eventually pulled away on the strength of a highly productive night for their starting five . The host Los Angeles Lakers took down the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , 130 - 119 . Friday also marked the unveiling of Los Angeles 's new Shaquille O'Neal statue . Los Angeles ( 21 - 51 ) snapped a six - game losing streak on Friday , though it may not have been in their best interest . LA will lose its draft pick if it falls outside of the top three , and the Phoenix Suns remain on the Lakers ' tail for the second - worst record in the NBA . Still , there was a lot to like on Friday for Lakers fans . Guard Jordan Clarkson had a career - high 35 points while shooting 8 - of - 10 from three - point range . It was the team 's first overtime game of the season , and they seemed to respond well to the extra period . LA outscored Minnesota 29 - 10 in overtime , immediately establishing an eight - point advantage at the start of the OT . The team finished with staggering shooting splits of 52 percent from the field , 61 percent from three - point range , and 86 percent form the line . Minnesota ( 28 - 43 ) , meanwhile , extended its own losing streak to four games . While production from the starting five was solid , the Timberwolves struggled once again with finding points off the bench . The team saw just 23 bench points versus 39 from LA . There was no issue for Minny 's starters , though , as third - year forward Andrew Wiggins exploded for an efficient 36 points . Reigning Rookie of the Year Karl-Anthony Towns recorded a double - double with 25 points and 13 rebounds , and point guard Ricky Rubio had 19 points while dishing out a whopping 15 assists . The Timberwolves will visit Portland on Saturday , while LA will host the Blazers on Sunday .

That 's been a scary trend for the Rockets this season , as their five losses have been by a combined 109 points . This is one of the worst offensive teams in the league right now and they 'll have to figure something out on that end of the floor if they want to dig out of this hole . Houston will look to keep up the good form against the Houston Rockets on Saturday in their next game . The Chicago Bulls ( 22 - 12 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 19 - 17 ) 101 - 92 on Friday at the United Center in Chicago . The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Celtics 57 - 49 in the first half . Along with their quick start , the Bulls also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 42 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went just 36 percent from the floor and a meager 20 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Bulls forced the Celtics into 11 turnovers , while committing just 16 of their own . Continuing his dominance of late , Pau Gasol had another huge game , finishing with 17 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) , 18 rebounds and four assists . Over his last three games he 's averaging 27 points and 19 rebounds , as he 's really stepped up his production with Ibaka sidelined . Like we 've grown accustomed to , Jimmy Butler came just shy of recording a triple - double . He finished with 19 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , five rebounds and 10 assists . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . This game was close throughout , as there were nine ties and six lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 12 points . Three-point shooting was a big part of that , with the Knicks going just 6 - of - 29 and the Knicks hitting 9 - of - 14 from long distance . Andre Drummond recorded another double - double , totaling 19 points and 19 rebounds . Marcus Morris finished second on the team , totaling 15 points and six rebounds . Ish Smith was a huge spark off the bench , providing 11 points , five rebounds and eight assists . The Pistons will play the Cleveland Cavaliers on Saturday for their next game . The Nuggets ( 2 - 3 ) have been one of the biggest disappointments this season and it 's a wonder when they 'll pull out of this hole . Emmanuel Mudiay did all he could though , as he tallied 11 points , five rebounds and eight assists . Marcus Morris was second on the team , as he provided 15 points and six rebounds off the bench . Ish Smith was a huge spark off the bench , providing 11 points , five rebounds and eight assists . The Pistons will be in action again on Saturday against the Utah Jazz .
The Denver Nuggets ( 11 - 14 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 9 - 15 ) 112 - 100 on Sunday . Denver has won two straight and seven of their last eight games . Injuries can be blamed for the depth of the Timberwolves ' struggles this season , but they were never considered a team with much of a shot at a playoff spot in the stacked Western Conference . An argument could be made that the injuries the Timberwolves continue to suffer are a blessing in disguise considering that it 's forcing the team to give their young talent run against top - flight teams . Andrew Wiggins scored a career - high 23 points in 34 minutes off the bench . Gary Harris scored a career - high 19 points in 25 minutes off the bench . Gorgui Dieng recorded his second double - double of the season , recording 19 points and 10 rebounds in 25 minutes . Randy Foye played 25 minutes off the bench and put up 19 points and two assists . Denver will go on the road to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . Minnesota has lost seven of their last eight games . They shocked the world Wednesday when they were able to steal a win from the Portland Trail Blazers 90 - 82 . The Timberwolves continue to try and navigate the season with an injury - depleted roster that is missing three of their starters . Ricky Rubio ( ankle ) , Karl-Anthony Towns ( knee ) and Nikola Jokic ( ankle ) are out Friday . The Timberwolves will look to extend their win streak on Friday when they host the Suns .
The Golden State Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 2 - 4 ) , 108 - 95 , on Tuesday at the Moda Center in Memphis . The Grizzlies had a strong first half where they out - scored the Grizzlies 32 - 19 . With the strong start , they were able to use that momentum and coast through the rest of the game to finish with an 20 - point victory . The Warriors out - rebounded the Celtices 48 - 43 , giving them a huge advantage in that category . That advantage may have given them just enough to steal the win on the road . The Warriors were led by their superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson , as they were the only players on the team to reach double figures in points . Curry finished with a game - high 32 points ( 11 - 25 FG , 8 - 13 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and 10 assists , while Thompson had 13 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , five rebounds and three assists . Warriors will go on the road and play the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday night . The Grizzlies just could n't get it going offensively , and have now lost five straight games , including back to back losses to the Warriors . Memphis was led by its backcourt duo of Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson . Curry went 11 - for - 25 from the field and 8 - for - 13 from the three - point line to score 32 points , while also adding 10 assists and three blocked shots . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to have the hot hand . Thompson on the other hand went 7 - for - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from beyond the arc to score 20 points of his own . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Grizzlies will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 3 - 0 ) defeated the Jrue Holiday ( 10 - 10 ) , 123 - 100 , on Tuesday at the Moda Center to take a three - game lead in the Eastern Conference finals . Much like in the opening game of the series , the Warriors had control of the game through the first three quarters . A nip - and - tuck battle came down to the last shot , with Eric Evans missing a 26 - foot three - point jumper at the buzzer to give the Warriors the win . The Warriors , who shot 40 percent from the field this season , were led by 19 points , four rebounds and eight assists from Klay Thompson . Draymond Green added 12 points and 17 rebounds , and Draymond Green had a double - double of 12 points and 5 assists . Harrison Barnes ( 11 ) was the only other starter to score in double figures , while Shaun Livingston and Shaun Livingston scored 12 points in 20 minutes off the bench . The Warriors were led by Anthony Davis , who put up 29 points , 15 rebounds , three assists , three blocks and two steals in 46 minutes of action . Tyreke Evans also came up big in his second game back from a lower back injury , and finished with 19 points , four rebounds and eight assists on 10 - of - 29 shooting . Draymond Green scored 12 points and added five rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block in 40 minutes . Both teams play on Tuesday , as the Warriors host the Portland Trail Blazers , while the Pelicans host the Toronto Raptors .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 44 - 38 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 33 - 49 ) 107 - 99 on Tuesday at the Pepsi Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got out to an extremely quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 27 - 31 right away in the first quarter . They were the superior shooters as well , going 44 percent from the field and 31 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets finished at 43 percent from the floor and 28 percent from deep . What really made the difference though was turnovers . The Trail Blazers forced the Nuggets into 20 turnovers , while committing just 15 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Trail Blazers were led by the duo of Nikola Jokic and Emmanuel Mudiay . Jokic went 11 - for - 10 from the field to score 18 points , while also grabbing 13 rebounds . The only other Nugget to reach double figures in points was Gary Harris , who finished with 16 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and four assists . Despite averaging just 6 points per game , he 's now posted double figures in points in three straight games , after previously hitting that mark only once so far this year . Gary Harris also had a solid outing . He went 6 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding four rebounds . He 's now averaging 11 points and 4 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Allen Crabbe had a strong showing and posted 16 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) and three rebounds in 25 minutes as a starter . It was a new season - high in points for him and a nice bounce back outing , after posting only six points in Sunday 's loss to the Grizzlies . Nikola Jokic also played well , as he posted 18 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) , 13 rebounds and three blocked shots . He 's now averaging 20 points and 7 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Allen Crabbe had a strong showing and posted 16 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) and three rebounds in 25 minutes as a starter . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Thursday , while the Nuggets will travel to Memphis to play the Grizzlies on Wednesday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 7 - 5 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 8 - 4 ) 103 - 88 on Sunday . This game was much closer than most people would have anticipated , as the Kings had their worst shooting night of the season . The still ended up prevailing with the victory despite shooting 11 - for - 37 from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game , as the Kings recorded 23 assists and 13 turnovers , while the Kings committed 14 turnovers to their 26 assists . It 's rare to see a team win a game when your turnovers and assists are nearly identical , but that was the case here . The Kings won the rebounding total 40 to 42 and that very well may have been the decisive factor . The Bulls were outscored by 10 in the fourth quarter and just couldnt hold off the Kings in overtime for a devastating loss . Jimmy Butler wasnt the hero , as he hit the game - winner . He provided 23 points , eight rebounds and six assists in a great all - around performance . Darren Collison also had a nice game , as he pitched in 17 points and 12 assists . Up next for the Bulls is a matchup with the New York Knicks on Monday . The Bulls got some great performances from their studs here , but it was one again the defense that let them down . Not only did they allow 103 points , they allowed Sacramento to shoot 51 percent from the field . The Bulls have three days off before they 'll host the Toronto Raptors on Wednesday .

The Warriors dominated in nearly every category , as they recorded more turnovers , assists , blocks and steals than the Sixers . It was a relatively clean game played all - around though , as there were only 32 combined turnovers between both teams . It was a much closer game than expected and the credit has to go to this winless Raptors team to put in a strong effort night - after - night despite losing every single game . Luckily for Toronto , this will be the only time they 'll have to face the Warriors in Golden State this season . This was probably the best performance from the Raptors all year , as they rank in the bottom - five in points allowed . Much of that can be credited to their ridiculously high - pace , but they need to play some defense to win . DeMar DeRozan had a nice all - around game , as he tallied 28 points , five rebounds and six assists in the defeat . Klay Thompson also made his return from a one - game absence and that 's a silver lining in a tough result . The 28 - game winning streak is over , but it 's time to reflect and appreciate how special of a run that actually was . Toronto wo n't play again until Wednesday , when they take on the Atlanta Hawks in their next scheduled game .

The Toronto Raptors defeated the Detroit Pistons , 109 - 90 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday . The Raptors ( 0 - 1 ) invested heavily into their star two - guard DeMar DeRozan in the offseason , inking the 27 - year old to a five - year , $ 139 million contract . He began paying immediate dividends on that hefty sum Wednesday , tallying a game - high 40 points and adding four rebounds , an assist and a steal . While the stellar showing was n't necessarily a surprise from a player of his caliber , the fact that Jonas Valanciunas , and not Kyle Lowry , checked in as Toronto 's second - leading scorer was a tad more unexpected . The veteran big man dominated in his showdown with Andre Drummond , posting a 32 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included an assist . The dominant Raptors , which outscored Detroit in every quarter , did n't need much else , with Lowry the only other player to hit double digits on the scoreboard . The Pistons ( 0 - 1 ) were led by Tobias Harris ' 22 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , an assist and a steal . Marcus Morris supplied a near double - double with 17 points , nine boards , three assists and a steal , but struggled from long range , draining only a pair of his eight three - point attempts . Drummond tallied 16 points , six rebounds and a steal , while the starting backcourt of Ish Smith and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope only managed 10 combined points on 5 - for - 19 shooting . In addition to the combined 72 points they received from DeRozan and Valanciunas , the Raptors saw Lowry pitch in with 10 points , eight assists , five boards and a steal . Accuracy was the All-Star point guard 's biggest issue , as he could only manage a 3 - for - 13 tally from the field , including 1 - for - 5 from behind the arc . DeMarre Carroll registered eight points , seven rebounds , an assist and a steal , while rookie Pascal Siakam went for four points , nine boards and a steal over 22 minutes . Detroit next takes on the Magic in their home opener on Friday , while Toronto remains home for an Eastern Conference Finals re - match with the Cavaliers on Friday as well .
