The 36 points were a season - high for Brooklyn . Brook Lopez led the charge , finishing with a team - high of 17 points ( 6 - 7 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) , while also adding 14 rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's combined for 0 - of - 14 from the field and 2 - for - six from the three - point line over his last two games , as he 'll look to continue with his hot shooting moving forward . Recording his second double - double in his last three games , Deron Williams finished with 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and two assists . It was n't his best day shooting the ball , but he still did enough to help secure the victory , even with both Dwyane Wade ( hamstring ) and Luol Deng ( calf ) sitting out with injuries . Coming off the bench , Jarrett Jack was the only player to score over 16 points , as he shot 5 - for - 8 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 13 points . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , while the Nets will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 110 - 85 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Thursday . Indiana came into this game as a sizable favorite and they did n't disappoint . The Nets had just two leads in this game that lasted less than a minute and the final one at the end of the second quarter was followed up by a 33 - 13 run by the Pacers to open things up . The Pacers offense was hot all night , as they shot 51 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Pacers , as it was a double - digit margin for the majority of the second half . Brooklyn ( 13 - 16 ) had to play this game without Dwyane Wade and Rajon Rondo , as they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal for this matchup . Jarrett Jack carried the load , as he tallied 22 points , six rebounds and two assists . Joe Johnson was second on the team , scoring 18 points off the bench . George Hill finished with 20 points , six rebounds , eight assists and two steals . George Hill went just 5 - of - 9 from the field , but finished with 12 points , six rebounds and five assists . C.J . Watson was a nice spark off the bench , providing 17 points , nine rebounds and five assists on 7 - of - 10 shooting . Indiana will look to keep rolling on Friday against the Cleveland Cavaliers .
The Rockets erupted for 47 points in the fourth period to put an exclamation point on the rout . Six Houston players posted double - digit scoring , and the Rockets also forced 15 turnovers from the Clippers while limiting them to a paltry 39 percent success rate from long range . Raymond Felton followed with 29 points , while Marreese Speights provided 15 points over 20 minutes off the bench . DeAndre Jordan had a 20 - point , 13 - rebound double - double . Marreese Speights led the bench with 15 points and added seven rebounds , four blocks and one steal . Eric Gordon managed 19 points , one rebound and three assists . Marreese Speights led the second unit with 15 points , two rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Eric Gordon went for 19 points , while Trevor Ariza and Patrick Beverley followed with matching 15 - point efforts . Corey Brewer and Corey Brewer led the bench with matching 10 - point efforts . Corey Brewer 's 10 points led the bench . The Rockets were led by James Harden , who totaled 30 points , 10 assists , a rebound and five steals . Trevor Ariza registered 18 points , four rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Patrick Beverley registered 15 points , three rebounds , three assists and a steal . Alan Anderson led the bench with 10 points , three boards , three assists and a block . The Rockets head back home to take on the Los Angeles Lakers on Monday night , while the Rockets head to the Big Easy to face off with the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday evening as well .
This was a wire - to - wire win for Miami , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 12 minutes . Shooting was key , with the Heat hitting 59 percent of their three - pointers and 74 percent of their free - throws . Ersan Ilyasova led the way , as he collected 21 points , five rebounds and two assists . Goran Dragic finished with 16 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Tyler Johnson was huge off the bench , providing 16 points and six rebounds . Hassan Whiteside recorded another double - double , totaling 30 points , 20 rebounds and three blocks . Richaun Holmes was second on the team in scoring , dropping 12 points off the bench . Wayne Ellington was the only bench player in double figures , providing 11 points , two rebounds and three assists . On deck for Philadelphia is a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday . The 76ers ( 21 - 30 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to battle for the top - spot in the east . Goran Dragic led the way for Miami , as he collected 21 points , seven assists and two steals . Ersan Ilyasova finished second on the team , totaling 21 points , five rebounds and two assists . Tyler Ilyasova was huge off the bench , providing 21 points , five rebounds and two assists on 7 - of - 15 shooting . Goran Dragic finished second on the team , accruing 16 points , four rebounds and eight assists . T.J. McConnell accumulated 11 points , two rebounds , four assists and two steals .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 30 - 21 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 20 - 33 ) 113 - 86 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 35 - 24 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 35 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks were able to force the Magic into 13 turnovers , while committing only 15 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Hawks were led by the duo of Paul Millsap and Dennis Schroder . Hardaway went 8 - for - 14 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding five rebounds and two steals . He 's been on a roll over his last two games , shooting a combined 15 - for - 12 from the field and 5 - for - 14 from deep to score 35 points . Dwight Howard did everything he could to keep the Magic in this game . He went 5 - for - 6 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the free throw line to score 11 points , while also grabbing 13 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 31 rebounds over his last two games . Aaron Gordon had a solid showing as well , going 5 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 16 points . He 's now combined for 37 points , five rebounds and five assists in the past two days . The Hawks ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Tuesday , the magic will play at home against the Boston Celtics on Tuesday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 34 - 16 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 24 - 27 ) 110 - 103 on Monday at the Moda Center in Toronto . The Raptors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Trail Blazers 37 - 25 in the first quarter alone . They were superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field , while the Trail Blazers went just 47 percent . The Raptors also out - rebounded the Trail Blazers 45 - 40 , giving them just enough of an advantage to take a victory on the road . The Raptors were led by DeMar DeRozan , who went 11 - for - 25 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 29 points , while also adding five rebounds and four assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 22 points and 14 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 28 points and 20 rebounds on the season . Damian Lillard also had a solid all - around game . He went 8 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding 11 assists . He 's now averaging 14 points per game on the year . Despite struggling with his shot , CJ McCollum had a solid contribution from the bench , scoring 12 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 26 minutes . The Trail Blazers ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Trail Blazers will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 97 - 79 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Sunday . The Sixers ( 6 - 18 ) came in to the contest short - handed , as Joel Embiid was given the night off to tend to elbow inflammation , while starting point guard Sergio Rodriguez sat out with an illness . That opened the door for Jahlil Okafor and T.J. McConnell to enter the starting five , and both parlayed their opportunities into highly productive performances . McConnell came within an assist of a triple - double , tallying 12 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists , while also adding three steals . Meanwhile , Okafor stepped up with 14 points , nine rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . The two players combined to go 12 - of - 18 from the field , and the Sixers shot an outstanding 56 percent from the field overall , keying what was only their second road win of the season . Robert Covington actually led Philadelphia in scoring , posting 16 points , seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Ersan Ilyasova was right behind with 15 points , eight boards and a pair of steals . Nik Stauskas received some extra run off the bench as a residual effect of Rodriguez 's absence , and he turned in 10 points , four assists , two rebounds and a steal to lead the second unit . Nerlens Noel , making his season debut after recovering from a knee injury , was only able to log 10 minutes off the bench before being held to only eight points on 3 - of - 9 shooting .
The Miami Heat ( 26 - 32 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 32 - 25 ) 108 - 90 on Friday night . There wasnt much that was going to stop Miami tonight , as they were clicking on all cylinders . The offense was especially good , as they shot 40 percent from the field and 85 percent from the free - throw line . The Heat won nearly every battle in the stat sheet , as they outassisted the Hawks by 14 and held them to under 82 points in the first half . Atlanta was led by Tyler Johnson , who tallied 23 points , five rebounds and five assists in the loss . Willie Reed had a nice game off the bench , as he scored 12 points and grabbed four rebounds in the win . Up next for the Hawks is a matchup with the New Orleans Pelicans on Monday . The Hawks got a ton of production from their bench in this matchup , as they all scored in double figures in all five quarters . Paul Millsap was the star , as he tallied 21 points , four rebounds and three blocks in the loss . Goran Dragic also played well , accumulating 17 points , six assists and six rebounds . Hassan Whiteside made his return from a one - game suspension and put up a ridiculous 30 - point , 22 - rebound line off the bench . Miami 's next game will be on Tuesday when they host the Toronto Raptors . Miami was coming off a grueling overtime loss to the Golden State Warriors on Saturday and it was clear they simply didnt have their legs tonight in a back - to - back set . They really struggled in the fourth quarter and allowed way too many easy baskets in the closing minutes . This was Paul Millsap 's best outing and he led the team with 21 points , four rebounds and three blocks . Atlanta will look to build off this win when they take on the Philadelphia 76ers in their next game on Monday .
The Denver Nuggets blew out the Los Angeles Lakers 129 - 101 at Staples Center on Monday . Denver ( 32 - 35 ) inches closer to a .500 record for the season and more importantly , show cased their ability to blow out the bottom tier teams while also staving off the Portland Trail Blazers for the 8 - seed in the Western Conference playoffs picture . Depth was on display for the Nuggets in the rout , as they went up 67 - 43 at the half and handed over much of the work to the bench , who also flexed their scoring prowess in the win . The Lakers ( 20 - 47 ) were unable to match the shooting efficiency the Nuggets had going , and finished 30 percent from three point range and 43 percent from the field , compared to the lights out 54 percent effort by Denver . Nikola Jokic and Danilo Gallinari each scored 18 points , and combined for 12 rebounds and nine assists . Mason Plumlee scored 15 points and added 10 rebounds across 36 minutes . Jamal Murray and Will Barton each pitched in 22 points and each played 30 minutes , and combined for nine three - pointers . Lakers Ivan Zubac drew the start at center and offered a bright spot in the box score . Zubac scored 25 points , grabbed 11 rebounds and dished out an assist in 30 minutes . Jordan Clarkson added 19 points on 7 - of - 18 shooting , while Brandon Ingram pitched in 14 points , one rebound and two assists . Next up , the Lakers visit the Houston Rockets on Wednesday , while the Nuggets host the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Phoenix Suns , 121 - 116 , at Target Center on Sunday . The Timberwolves ( 25 - 49 ) came into Saturday 's contest trying to keep the pressure on eighth - seeded Denver , which they could come within one game of catching with a win against the Suns ( 25 - 54 ) . Minnesota was able to take care of business on the second night of a back - to - back set after playing the first game of a back - to - back set after Tuesday 's tilt in the stead . Their effort was largely due to All-Star forward Alex Len , who had tallied 14 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 1 - 0 FT ) , nine rebounds and two steals over 37 minutes . Mirza Teletovic was the only other member of the starting five with double - digit scoring ( 15 points ) , while also hauling in a rebound and a steal . As a team , Minnesota shot 51 percent from the field and 27 percent from three - point range , while seeing six players hit double digits in the scoring column . The T-Wolves were actually paced by Andrew Wiggins , who managed 32 points , five rebounds , two assists , a steal and three blocks . Mirza Teletovic was next with a bench - leading 19 points , along with four rebounds and two assists . Ricky Rubio followed with 17 points , 11 assists , seven rebounds and three steals . Ronnie Dieng posted a 14 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , two steals and a block . Shabazz Muhammad matched Len 's point total while leading the bench and supplemented it with four rebounds and two assists . Ricky Rubio managed a 17 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included seven rebounds and three steals . Ronnie Price managed 12 points and one assist . Shabazz Muhammad paced the bench with 10 points .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 0 - 2 ) 112 - 94 on Saturday . Portland is on a three - game win streak , but Wednesday 's win came with a special meaning for the Blazers as it was the first game they 've played this season without Robin Lopez . Lopez is expected to miss up to two months with a broken right hand . Anthony Davis pitched in 25 points and 10 rebounds in 41 minutes . The Pelicans will go on the road to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . New Orleans has had a tough schedule to start the season , so the fact they 're still able to breathe above the .500 mark is impressive . They had six players finish in double - digits , but the team shot just 40 percent from the field , making it hard to secure the win . The Pelicans were lead by Anthony Davis , who put up 25 points , 10 rebounds , and two blocks in 41 minutes . The Pelicans will look to bounce back at home Saturday when they host the Bucks . Portland had its five - game win streak snapped with the loss . Playing on the second night of a back - to - back , the Pelicans did n't seem to have enough spring left in their legs , as they shot just 40 percent from the field and were out - rebounded 39 - 39 , putting up just nine of the game . The Pelicans will return to action Tuesday against the Nuggets .
The Golden State Warriors ( 25 - 4 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 18 - 11 ) 104 - 74 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Warriors got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 19 - 15 in the first quarter alone . The Jazz were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 36 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Warriors were also able to force the Jazz into 23 turnovers , while only committing 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Warriors were led by their superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson , as they were the only players on the team to reach double figures in points . Curry went a ridiculous 8 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also adding four assists and three steals . It was his second straight double - double and fourth in the last five games , as he continues to be a force this season . Thompson on the other hand went 5 - for - 13 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 17 points . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 18 assists over his last two games . Joe Johnson was dialed in as well , going 5 - for - 9 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 14 points . The only other Timberwolve to reach double figures in points was Trey Lyles , who scored 11 points . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Jazz will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 23 - 16 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 31 - 6 ) 128 - 119 on Friday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . In a meeting of Southwest Division foes , the Grizzlies were able to push past the Warriors in a tough overtime victory and move to the top of their division standings . Despite turning the ball over 12 times , the Grizzlies used superior shooting from the free throw line , going 49 percent from the floor and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Warriors shot 49 percent from the field and only 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Grizzlies were led by the duo of Kevin Gasol and Mike Conley . Randolph went 7 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 27 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 56 points and 48 rebounds over his last two games . It was the first time he 's surpassed the 16 - point mark since the beginning of January . The only other Cavalier to reach double - digit points was Chandler Parsons , who came off the bench for 10 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) and one rebound in 16 minutes . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Portland Trail Blazers on Thursday , while the Warriors will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
